Input.seg9: کوئٹہ میں سوئی سدرن گیس کمپنی کے جنرل مینیجر مشتاق صدیقی نے بتایا ہے کہ اس پائپ لائن سے گیس کی ترسیل دوپہر کے بعد شروع کر دی جائے گی۔
Input.machine_translation9: Mushtaq Siddiqui, General Manager of Sui Southern Gas Company in Quetta, has said the gas supply through this pipeline will be opened in the afternoon.
Input.seg10: یہ پائپ لائن سبی کے راستے کوئٹہ آتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: This pipeline comes to Quetta by way of Sibbi.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.18) Gecko/2010020220 Firefox/3.0.18 GTB6
Answer.translation1: On Thursday in the reputed daily newspaper of Pakistan "The News", it was written about the residing terrorist groups in Pakistani Kashmir that Lashker-e-Tayyaba and Hizb-ul-Mujahideen has made the decision about considering the Kashmir policy.
Answer.translation2: Be clear that the policy of both groups until now was that Kashmir problem can be solved with the armed opposition.
Answer.translation3: Dera Bugti: Blast on the gas pipe line.
Answer.translation4: According to the police officials, 18 inch Qatar pipe line going from Loti gas field was destroyed in a bomb blast on Monday.
Answer.translation5: This pipe line goes towards the Sui plant.
Answer.translation10: This pipeline comes to Quetta through Sibbi.
Answer.translation6: A man named Sarbaz Baloch representing himself as a represtor of his invalidate party "Baloch republican army" has accepted the responsibility for this attack on the telephone on behalf of his party.
Answer.translation7: In four days, fourth gas pipe line was destroyed in a bomb blast.
Answer.translation8: On Friday, in Dera Allah Yar, an 18 inch Qatar pipe line was destroyed whose maintenance was continued until Sunday morning.
Answer.translation9: The general manager Mushtaq Siddiqui of the Sui Southern Gas company in Quetta said that gas supply through this pipeline would begin after noon.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: کوئٹہ زیارت اور دیگر مصافاتی علاقوں میں تین روز سے گیس کی شدید قلت ہے جہاں ایک طرف برف باری کا سلسلہ جاری ہے اور درجہ حرارت نقطہ انجماد سے نیچے گر گیا ہے اور دوسری طرف ہیٹر اور چولہے ٹھنڈے پڑ گئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: There has been a severe shortage of gas for the past three days in Quetta, Ziarat, and other surrounding areas, where, on top of the continuous snowfall and temperature which has fallen below the freezing point, heaters and stoves are now no longer working.
Input.seg2: اس کے علاوہ ڈیرہ بگٹی شہر میں مال منڈی میں موٹر سائیکل میں دھماکہ ہوا ہے لیکن پولیس کے مطابق اس دھماکے سے کسی قسم کا جانی نقصان نہیں ہوا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: In addition, there was a bomb blast from a motorcycle in Mal Mandi in the city of Dera Bugti, but according to police there has been no loss of life due to the blast.
Input.seg3: جماعت الدعوۃ  کے لیے ایڈمنسٹریٹر
Input.machine_translation3: Administrator for Jamaat-ud-Dawa
Input.seg4: جماعت الدعوۃ  کا ہیڈاکواٹر مرکز طیبہ لاہور سے تقریباً پچیس کلو میٹر دور مرید کے میں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: The Tayaba Center, headquarters for Jamaat-ud-Dawa, is in Mureedkay, about twenty-five kilometers from Lahore.
Input.seg5: اس مرکز میں ہسپتال ، سکول اور  طلباء کے ہاسٹل بھی شامل  ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: This Center includes hospitals, schools and student hostels.
Input.seg6: وزیر قانون پنجاب رانا ثناء اللہ خان کا کہنا ہے کہ جماعت الدعوۃ  کے مرکز میں نگران  کی تعیناتی اس لیے عمل میں لائی گئی ہے تاکہ وہاں موجود فلاحی اداروں کا کام متاثر نہ ہو۔
Input.machine_translation6: Punjab Law Minister Rana Sanaullah Khan says that the appointment of a supervisor in Jamaat-ud-Dawa's Center has taken place so that the work of its welfare organizations will not be hindered.
Input.seg7: جماعت الدعوۃ  کے امیر حافظ سعید کے داماد خالد ولید  کے مطابق مرکز میں واقع ہسپتال ، سکول اور دیگر فلاحی اداروں کی نگرانی کے لیے ایک اعلٰی سرکاری افسر خاقان بابر کو ایڈمنسٹریٹر مقرر کیا گیا ہے جبکہ ان کے بقول  مرکز میں پولیس کی نفری میں بھی اضافہ کیا گیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: According to Khalid Waleed, son-in-law of the head of Jamaat-ud-Dawa Hafiz Saeed, high government official Khaqan Babar has been appointed as an administrator for the supervision of hospitals, schools and other welfare organizations located in the Center, while the Center's police staff has also been increased.
Input.seg8: اقوام متحدہ کی سلامتی کونسل نے جماعت الدعوۃ پر پابندی عائد کی ہے جس کے بعد پاکستان کی وفاقی حکومت نے ملک بھر میں جماعتالدعوۃ کے خلاف کارروائی کی اور جماعت کے امیر حافظ سعید سمیت دیگر رہنماؤں کو نظر بند کردیا گیا ہے۔ حکومت پنجاب کی طرف سے مرکز طیبہ میں ایڈمنسٹر مقرر کرنا بھی وفاقی حکومت کی جانب سے جماعت الدعوہ کے خلاف کی جانے والی کارروائی کا تسلسل ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: The United Nations' Security Council placed a sanction on Jamaat-ud-Dawa, after which Pakistan's federal government has taken action throughout the country against Jamaat-ud-Dawa, and head of Jamaat-ud-Dawa Hafiz Saeed, along with other leaders, has been placed under house arrest. The appointment of an administrator in the Tayaba Center by the Punjab government is another of the actions being taken on behalf of the federal government against Jamaat-ud-Dawa.
Input.seg9: خاقان بابر کا تعلق ڈی ایم جی یعنی ڈسٹرکٹ مینجمنٹ گروپ  سے  ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Khaqan Babar is from the DMG or District Management Group.
Input.seg10: حافظ خالد ولید نے بتایا کہ  کمشنر لاہور ڈویژن خسرو پرویز خان اتوار کو پولیس اور سول انتظامیہ کے ہمراہ مرکز طبیہ  میں آئے اور مرکز کے مختلف حصوں کا معائنہ کیا۔ خالد ولید نے حکومت کی طرف سے جماعت الدعوۃ  کے مرکز میں ایڈمنسٹریٹر مقرر کرنے کی مذمت کی ہے اور کہا کہ پہلے ہی حکومتی کارروائیوں کی وجہ سے  مرکز میں واقع ہسپتال میں مریضوں اور سکول میں بچوں کی تعداد میں کمی ہوئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Hafiz Khalid Waleed said that Khusro Pervez Khan, Commissioner of the Lahore Division, came to the Tayaba Center on Sunday along with police and civil administrators and inspected different parts of the Center. Khalid Waleed has condemned the appointment of an administrator in Jamaat-ud-Dawa's Center and said that the number of children in the schools and patients in the hospitals of the Center had already shrunk due to the actions of the government.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.1.8) Gecko/20100202 Firefox/3.5.8 GTB6 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Answer.translation1: Quetta: Zyarat and other surrounding areas have extreme shortage of natural gas for three days. Where on one side, the snowfall continues and the temperature has dropped below freezing, the other side  is where the stoves and heaters are gone cold.
Answer.translation2: Besides this, there was a bomb blast in a motor cycle in Mal Mandi in the city of Dera Bugti. But according to the police, there was no fatal damage due to this blast.
Answer.translation3: Administrator for Jamat-ud-Dawa
Answer.translation4: The headquarter of Jamat-ud-Dawa, Tayyaba Center, is almost 25km away from Lahore near Mureedkay.
Answer.translation5: This center has hospital, school and also hostel for students.
Answer.translation10: Hafiz Khalid Waleed has informed that Lahore division commissioner Khusro Parvez Khan came to the Tayyaba Center on Sunday with the police and civil authority and inspected several parts of the center. Khalid Waleed has disapproved of placement of an Administrator from the government in the Jamat-ud-Dawa Center. And said that earlier operations of the government has already decreased the number of patients in the hospital and students in the school.
Answer.translation6: Law minister Punjab, Rana Sanaullah Khan says that assignment of a superintendent in the Jamat-ud-Dawa center came in to being so that the work of the welfare organizations present there is not disturbed.
Answer.translation7: According to Khalid Waleed, the son in law of Chief of Jamat-ud-Dawa Hafiz Saeed,  a qualified government official Khaqan Babar is appointed as an administrator to monitor the hospital, schools and other welfare organizations located in the center. Although according to them, there has also been an increase in the police staff.
Answer.translation8: Security Council of the United Nations has placed restrictions on Jamat-ud-Dawa after which, Pakistan's federal government did operation against Jamat-ud-Dawa in the entire country. And house arrested many leaders including Ameer Hafiz Saeed. Assignment of an administrator in the Tayyaba Center from the government of Punjab was also part of the series of actions by the federal government against Jamat-ud-Dawa.
Answer.translation9: Khaqan Babar is related to DMG ( District Management Group).

Input.seg9: خاقان بابر کا تعلق ڈی ایم جی یعنی ڈسٹرکٹ مینجمنٹ گروپ  سے  ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Khaqan Babar is from the DMG or District Management Group.
Input.seg10: حافظ خالد ولید نے بتایا کہ  کمشنر لاہور ڈویژن خسرو پرویز خان اتوار کو پولیس اور سول انتظامیہ کے ہمراہ مرکز طبیہ  میں آئے اور مرکز کے مختلف حصوں کا معائنہ کیا۔ خالد ولید نے حکومت کی طرف سے جماعت الدعوۃ  کے مرکز میں ایڈمنسٹریٹر مقرر کرنے کی مذمت کی ہے اور کہا کہ پہلے ہی حکومتی کارروائیوں کی وجہ سے  مرکز میں واقع ہسپتال میں مریضوں اور سکول میں بچوں کی تعداد میں کمی ہوئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Hafiz Khalid Waleed said that Khusro Pervez Khan, Commissioner of the Lahore Division, came to the Tayaba Center on Sunday along with police and civil administrators and inspected different parts of the Center. Khalid Waleed has condemned the appointment of an administrator in Jamaat-ud-Dawa's Center and said that the number of children in the schools and patients in the hospitals of the Center had already shrunk due to the actions of the government.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: In Quetta, Ziyarath and other far off regions, there is an acute shortage of gas for the last three days. On one hand, it is continuously snowing and the temperature has fallen below freezing point and on the other hand, the heaters and stoves have gone cold.
Answer.translation2: Apart from this, in Derahbagti town, there was a motorcycle blast in the market, but according to the police, there was no loss of life in the blast.
Answer.translation3: Administrator for Jamaa'athud Da'wah
Answer.translation4: The central headquarters of Jamaa'athud Da'wah is in Taibah, about 25  kilometers from Karachi.
Answer.translation5: This center includes a hospital, a school and a hostel for students.
Answer.translation10: Hafiz Khalid Waleed said that the Commissioner of Lahore division, Khusroe Pervez Khan along with police and the civil government came on Sunday and inspected the Taibah center. Khalid Waleed spoke ill about the appointment of an administrator, by the government in Jamaa'athud Da'wah, and he said that the number of patients in the hospital and children in the school had already dropped due to government actions.
Answer.translation6: The law minister of Punjab, Rana Sanaullah Khan says that supervisors were appointed in the center of Jamaa'athud Da'wah, so that the work of social institutes there goes on unaffected.
Answer.translation7: According to Khalid Waleed, son in law of the Jamaa'athud Da'wah chief, Hafiz Saeed, a high ranking government officer, Khaqan Babar, was appointed for the supervision of the hospital, school and other social institutes, based in the center, as the administrator, while according to him, the posting of police at the center was also increased.
Answer.translation8: The Security Council has passed a ban on Jamaa'athud Da'wah, after which the Pakistani government has started taking action against Jamaa'athud Da'wah across the country, and has put the chief of the Jamaa'ath, Hafiz Saeed along with other leaders under house arrest. The appointment of the administrator in the Taibah center by the Punjab government was also a part of the action being taken against Jamaa'athud Da'wah by the joint government.
Answer.translation9: Khaqan Babar belongs to the DMG, i.e. District Management Group.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ادھر جماعت الدعوۃ  کی ایک پریس ریلیز کے مطابق جماعت کے امیر حافظ سعید نے اقوام متحدہ کے جنرل سیکرٹری بان کی مون اور  کمیٹی برائے طالبان کے نام ایک خط لکھا ہے جس میں ان سے سلامتی کونسل کی طرف سے جماعت پر عائد کی جانے والی  پابندی ختم کرنے کی اپیل کی گئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: According to Jamaat-ud-Dawa's press release, Jamaat's head Hafiz Saeed has written a letter to General Secretary of the United Nations Ban Ki-Moon and the Committee for the Taliban in which an appeal has been made to lift the sanction placed on the Jamaat by the Security Council.
Input.seg2: خط میں یہ کہا گیا  کہ سلامتی کونسل کی طرف سے جماعت الدعوۃ پر پابندی کا یکطرفہ فیصلہ ناانصافی ہے اور جماعت الدعوۃ کا دہشت گردی سے کوئی تعلق نہیں بلکہ یہ رفاہی کاموں میں مصروف  ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: In the letter it is stated that the Security Council's unilateral decision for a sanction on the Jamaat-ud-Dawa is unjust and that Jamaat-ud-Dawa has no connection with terrorism, but is busy doing welfare work.
Input.seg3: ایدھی غزہ کے امدادی مشن پر
Input.machine_translation3: Edhi on Relief Mission to Gaza
Input.seg4: غزہ میں داخل ہونے کے لیے درکار اجازت حاصل کرنے کے کئی مراحل سے گزرنے کے بعد وہ اب تک نیو یارک سے مصر پہنچنے میں کامیاب ہو سکے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation4: He has just now been able to reach Egypt from New York after passing through several stages for acquiring the needed permission to enter Gaza.
Input.seg5: قاہرہ سے بی بی سی اردو سروس سے بات کرتے ہوئے انہوں نے کہا کہ وہ ابھی تک غزہ نہیں پہنچ پائے کیونکہ مصر اور اسرائیل نے بہت رکاوٹیں کھڑی کی ہوئی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: When talking to the BBC Urdu Service from Cairo, he said that he has not yet been able to reach Gaza because Egypt and Israel have set up many barriers.
Input.seg6: انہوں نے کہا کہ مجھے یہاں آئے آٹھ دن ہو گئے ہیں اور ابھی تک غزہ جانے کی اجازت نہیں ملی۔
Input.machine_translation6: He said, "I have been here for eight days and have not yet received permission to go to Gaza.
Input.seg7: ’میں اس وقت قاہرہ میں ہوں اور امید ہے کہ کل غزہ جانے کی اجازت مل جائے گی۔
Input.machine_translation7: I am in Cairo right now and hope that tomorrow I'll get permission to enter Gaza."
Input.seg8: انہوں نے تفصیل بتاتے ہوئے کہا: ’مجھے پہلے غزہ جانے کے لیے صرف سات دن کا ویزہ دیا گیا تھا اور بعد میں میرے اصرار پر پاکستانی حکام نے میری مدد کی اور اسے بڑھوا کر ایک مہینے کا کروایا لیکن اس شرط پر کہ میں صرف ایک مرتبہ غزہ جاؤں گا یعنی سنگل اینٹری۔
Input.machine_translation8: Going into more detail, he said, "At first I had only been given a visa to go to Gaza for seven days but later, as I insisted, the Pakistani officials helped me and got it extended to a one-month visa, but on the condition that I go to Gaza only once, making a single entry."
Input.seg9: انہوں نے کہ ان کے ساتھ ان کا بیٹا اور بیٹیاں ہیں اور وہ غزہ میں امدادی کام کرنا چاہتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: He said that his son and daughters are with him and they want to do relief work in Gaza.
Input.seg10: ’میں کچھ پیسے لے کر آیا ہوں۔
Input.machine_translation10: "I have brought some money with me.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: According to a press release by Jama'athu Da'wah, here, the Jama'ath chief, Hafiz Saeed is said to have written a letter to the United Nations General Secretary, Ban Ki Moon, and the Committee on Taliban, appealing to remove the ban on Jama'athud Da'wah, passed by the Security Council.
Answer.translation2: In the letter, he mentioned that the passing of the ban by the Security Council on Jama'athud Da'wah, was a one-sided and unjust decision, and that Jama'athud Da'wah has no connection with terrorism, and rather is busy in social work.
Answer.translation3: Aidhi's Gaza humanitarian mission
Answer.translation4: After passing many stages involved in getting the permissions required for entering Gaza, he has been successful in reaching Egypt from New York.
Answer.translation5: Speaking to BBC Urdu service from Cairo, he said that he was not able to reach Gaza yet, as Egypt and Israel have placed many barriers.
Answer.translation10: "I have brought some money".
Answer.translation6: He said "It has been eight days since I got here, and I have still not got the permission to enter Gaza."
Answer.translation7: "I am now in Cairo, and hopefully I will be permitted to reach Gaza tomorrow".
Answer.translation8: Giving details, he said: "At first, I was given a seven day visa to enter Gaza, and later on, upon insisting, the Pakistani officials helped me out and increased it to a one month visa, but on the condition that I would go only once, i.e. it would be a single entry visa.
Answer.translation9: He said that he had brought his son and daughters with him, and that they wanted to do some social work.

Answer.translation1: Here, according to one press release of the council party, the council's prince Hafiz Saeed has written a letter to to the United Nations General Secretary Ban Ki Mon and to members of the committee he asked to end the regularity made on the council by the peace convention.
Answer.translation2: In the letter it has said that the one sided decision of the peace convention on making the regularity on the council party was not fare and there is no connection of the council party with the terrorism hence they are busy in peace making work.
Answer.translation3: On the Edhi Ghaza's relief mission

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: مصر کی ریڈ کراس کو ایک لاکھ ڈالر کا چیک دیا ہے اور دس ہزار ڈالر نقد بھی دیے ہیں تاکہ وہ غزہ میں امدادی سامان بھیج دیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: I have given a $100,000 check to the Red Cross in Egypt and also gave $10,000 in cash so that they can send relief supplies to Gaza."
Input.seg2: کابینہ میں چار مزید وزراء، کل تریسٹھ
Input.machine_translation2: Four More Ministers in Cabinet; Sixty-Three Total
Input.seg3: چار نئے وفاقی وزراء میں دو متحدہ قومی موومنٹ اور دو جمعیت علمائے اسلام فضل الرحمان گروپ کے ارکان شامل ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: The four new federal ministers include two from the Muttahida Qaumi Movement and two from the Fazl-ur-Rehman group of Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam.
Input.seg4: نئے وزراء سے صدر آصف علی زرداری نے حلف لیا۔
Input.machine_translation4: President Asif Ali Zardari administered the oath to the new ministers.
Input.seg5: حلف برداری کی تقریب میں وزیر اعظم یوسف رضا گیلانی، وفاقی کابینہ کے ارکان بھی موجود
Input.machine_translation5: Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gilani and the members of the Federal Cabinet were also present in the oath-taking ceremony.
Input.seg6: چار نئے وزراء کی وفاقی کابینہ میں شمولیت کے ساتھ وفاقی وزیر، وزیر مملکت اور مشیران کی کُل تعداد تریسٹھ ہو گئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: The total number of federal ministers, ministers for state, and advisers, including the four new ministers in the Federal Cabinet, is 63.
Input.seg7: ایم کیو ایم کے دو وزراء میں فاروق ستار اور بابر غوری ہیں جبکہ جمیعت علمائے اسلام فضل الرحمان گروپ کے اعظم سواتی اور مولانا عطا الرحمان شامل ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: The two ministers from MQM are Farooq Sattar and Babar Ghauri, while Azam Swati and Maulana Atta-ur-Rehman are from the Fazl-ur-Rehman group of Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam.
Input.seg8: تاحال ان وزراء کے محکموں کا اعلان نہیں کیا گیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: The portfolios of these ministers have not yet been announced.
Input.seg9: فاروق ستار ایم کیو ایم کے کنوینر ہیں جبکہ بابر غوری ایم کیو ایم کے سینیٹر ہیں اور ان کی مدت دس مارچ کو ختم ہو رہی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Farooq Sattar is the convener of MQM, while Babar Ghauri is MQM's senator, and his term ends on March 10.
Input.seg10: اعظم سواتی آزاد حیثیت میں سینیٹر منتخب ہوئے تھے اور ان کا شمار امیر ترین سینیٹر میں ہوتا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Azam Swati was elected senator as an independent candidate and is among the wealthiest senators.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: A one million dollar check has been given to Red cross of Egypt and ten thousand dollar cash is also given in order to send aid to Gaza.
Answer.translation2: four more ministers in the cabinet, total of sixty three
Answer.translation3: four new federal ministers include two from Mutahida Qaumi Movement and Two from Jamiat Ulamae Islam Fazalur Rehman Group.
Answer.translation4: president Asif Ali Zardari took oath from the new ministers.
Answer.translation5: in the oath taking ceremony, the Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani and members of cabinet were also present.
Answer.translation10: Azam Swati was elected as a free senator and is considered to be one of the richest senators.
Answer.translation6: after the inclusion of four new ministers to the federal cabinet, the number of Federal ministers, ministers for state and advisors has reached a total of sixty three.
Answer.translation7: two minister from MQM include Farooq Sattar and Babar Ghouri whereas ministers from Jamiat Ulamae Islam Fazalur Rehman Group include Azam Swati and Molana Ataur Rehman.
Answer.translation8: the departments of these ministers have not been announced yet.
Answer.translation9: Farooq sattar is the convener of MQM whereas Babar Ghouri is a senator from MQM whose term wil expire on tenth March.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: مولانا عطا الرحمان رکن قومی اسمبلی ہیں اور مولانا فضل الرحمان کے چھوٹے بھائی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: Maulana Atta-ur-Rehman is a member of the National Assembly and is the younger brother of Maulana Fazl-ur-Rehman.
Input.seg2: یاد رہے کہ اہم عہدوں پر فائز چار مشیران قومی اسمبلی کے اراکین نہیں ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: It should be noted that the four advisers holding important positions are not members of the National Assembly.
Input.seg3: واضح رہے کہ تین نومبر دو ہزار آٹھ کو کابینہ میں بائیس نئے وزراء  اور اٹھارہ وزرائے مملکت شامل کیے گئے تھے تو اس وقت خیال کیا جا رہا تھا کہ کابینہ میں ایم کیو ایم کے ارکان کو بھی شامل کیا جائے گا تاہم وزارتوں کی تقسیم میں اختلافات کے باعث ایم کیو ایم شامل نہیں ہوئی۔
Input.machine_translation3: When twenty-two new ministers and eighteen ministers of state had been included in the Cabinet on November 3, 2008, at that time it was thought that MQM members will also be included in the Cabinet, but due to disagreement about the distribution of ministries, MQM was not included.
Input.seg4: بلوچستان، پائپ لائن اڑا دی
Input.machine_translation4: Balochistan: Pipeline Exploded
Input.seg5: پولیس کے مطابق یہ اٹھارہ انچ قطر کی پائپ لائن ہے جو پیر کوہ کے مختلف کنوؤں نے سوئی میں گیس پلانٹ کو جاتی ہے اور اس کو نامعلوم افراد نے صبح سویرے دھماکے سے اڑا دیا۔
Input.machine_translation5: According to police, unidentified individuals ruptured the 18-inch diameter pipeline that runs from different wells in Pir Koh to the Sui gas plant with an explosion in the early morning.
Input.seg6: اس کے علاوہ گزشتہ روز سوئی میں کنواں نمبر تین کو مکمل طور پر دھماکے سے تباہ کر دیا گیا اور ڈیرہ اللہ یار کے قریب ایک گیس پائپ لائن کو دھماکے سے نقصان پہنچایا گیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Yesterday, Sui well number 3 was completely destroyed by an explosion, and a gas pipeline near Dera Allah Yar has been damaged by an explosion.
Input.seg7: ان دھماکوں کی ذمہ داری کالعدم تنظیم بلوچ ریپبلکن آرمی کے ترجمان  سرباز بلوچ نے اپنی تنظیم کی جانب سے قبول کی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: Sarbaaz Baloch, spokesman of the banned organization, the Baloch Republican Army, has accepted responsibility for these blasts on behalf of his organization.
Input.seg8: بلوچستان میں سال دو ہزار نو شروع ہوتے ہی تشدد کے واقعات میں اضافہ ہوا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Since the beginning of 2009, there has been an increase in incidents of violence in Balochistan.
Input.seg9: اس ماہ اب تک درجنوں گیس پائپ لائنوں کو دھماکوں سے اڑایا گیا ہے جبکہ ریل گاڑیوں اور صوبہ پنجاب سے تعلق رکھنے والے افراد پر حملوں میں اضافہ ہوا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: To date this month, dozens of gas pipelines have been ruptured, while attacks on trains and people from the province of Punjab have increased.
Input.seg10: وزیر اعلٰی بلوچستان نواب اسلم رئیسانی نے اگرچہ ان واقعات پر تشویش کا اظہار کیا ہے اور پولیس کو خفیہ اداروں کے ساتھ معلومات کے تبادلے کے احکامات جاری کیے ہیں لیکن اب تک ان واقعات کی روک تھام ممکن نہیں ہو سکی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Although Nawab Aslam Raisani, Chief Minister of Balochistan, has expressed concern over these incidents and issued orders to the police to exchange information with the secret services, preventing these incidents has not yet been possible.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: Moulana Ataur Rahman is a member of the National Assembly and is Moulana Fazlur Rahman's younger brother.
Answer.translation2: It should be remembered that four important officeholders are not members of the National Assembly.
Answer.translation3: It should be clear that on 3rd December, 2008 28 new ministers and 18 ministers of state were taken into the cabinet. At that time it was believed that members of the MQM would also be included in the cabinet, but due to a difference in the distribution of ministries, MQM was not included.
Answer.translation4: Balochistan pipe line blown up.
Answer.translation5: According to the police, this was an eighteen inch wide pipe line that goes to the various wells in the gas plant of Peer mountain, and it was blown up by unidentified individuals in the morning.
Answer.translation10: Though the Chief Minister of Balochistan, Nawab Aslam Raeesani, expressed distress over these incidents, and the police were instructed to share information with intelligence agencies, but it was still not possible to stop these incidents.
Answer.translation6: Apart from this, yesterday, well number three was destroyed in a blast and a gas pipe line was harmed by a blast near Allah Yaar hill.
Answer.translation7: The responsibility for these blasts were claimed by the spokesperson for the banned organization, Baloch Republican Army, Sarbaz Baloch.
Answer.translation8: From the beginning of the year 2009, there was an increase in the number of extremist incidents.
Answer.translation9: In this month, there were dozens of incidents of gas pipes being blown up, and there were also an increase in attacks on trains and people from the state of Punjab.

Input.machine_translation8: Since the beginning of 2009, there has been an increase in incidents of violence in Balochistan.
Input.seg9: اس ماہ اب تک درجنوں گیس پائپ لائنوں کو دھماکوں سے اڑایا گیا ہے جبکہ ریل گاڑیوں اور صوبہ پنجاب سے تعلق رکھنے والے افراد پر حملوں میں اضافہ ہوا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: To date this month, dozens of gas pipelines have been ruptured, while attacks on trains and people from the province of Punjab have increased.
Input.seg10: وزیر اعلٰی بلوچستان نواب اسلم رئیسانی نے اگرچہ ان واقعات پر تشویش کا اظہار کیا ہے اور پولیس کو خفیہ اداروں کے ساتھ معلومات کے تبادلے کے احکامات جاری کیے ہیں لیکن اب تک ان واقعات کی روک تھام ممکن نہیں ہو سکی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Although Nawab Aslam Raisani, Chief Minister of Balochistan, has expressed concern over these incidents and issued orders to the police to exchange information with the secret services, preventing these incidents has not yet been possible.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: Moulana Ata-ur-Rahman is a member of National Assembly and also Moulana Fazal-ur-Rahman's younger brother.
Answer.translation2: Remember that, four statesmen holding posts in important ministries are not the members of the national assembly.
Answer.translation3: Note that the cabinet was expanded on 3rd November, 2008 with 22 new ministers and 18 national ministries. So, at that time it was thought that the members of MQM would also be included but due to disagreements on the distribution of the ministries, MQM stayed away.
Answer.translation4: Bolochistan, Blasted Pipeline
Answer.translation5: According to police, this is a 18 inch diameter pipeline which  connects different wells of Parekoh and meets Suyi gas pipeline. This was blasted my some unidentified men in early morning.
Answer.translation10: Though the Prime Minister of Baluchistan, Nawab Aslam Rayisani, has expressed concern over such activities and ordered the police to exchange information from intelligence agencies, but,stopping such incidents has not been possible yet.
Answer.translation6: Apart from this, yesterday, well number 3 near Suyi had been totally destroyed by a blast and also a gas pipeline near Dera-allayar was also damaged due to a blast.
Answer.translation7: Militant organization Baloch republican army's spokeperson, Saryaz Baluch accepted the responsibility of these blast on the behalf of his organization.
Answer.translation8: As the year 2009 started, the was increase in violent incidents in Baluchistan.
Answer.translation9: This month, till now, several gas pipelines have been blasted.  Also, Attacks on trains and on people belonging to the Punjab region have also increased.

Input.seg1: مولانا عطا الرحمان رکن قومی اسمبلی ہیں اور مولانا فضل الرحمان کے چھوٹے بھائی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: Maulana Atta-ur-Rehman is a member of the National Assembly and is the younger brother of Maulana Fazl-ur-Rehman.

Input.machine_translation2: It should be noted that the four advisers holding important positions are not members of the National Assembly.
Input.seg3: واضح رہے کہ تین نومبر دو ہزار آٹھ کو کابینہ میں بائیس نئے وزراء  اور اٹھارہ وزرائے مملکت شامل کیے گئے تھے تو اس وقت خیال کیا جا رہا تھا کہ کابینہ میں ایم کیو ایم کے ارکان کو بھی شامل کیا جائے گا تاہم وزارتوں کی تقسیم میں اختلافات کے باعث ایم کیو ایم شامل نہیں ہوئی۔

Input.seg4: بلوچستان، پائپ لائن اڑا دی
Input.machine_translation4: Balochistan: Pipeline Exploded
Input.seg5: پولیس کے مطابق یہ اٹھارہ انچ قطر کی پائپ لائن ہے جو پیر کوہ کے مختلف کنوؤں نے سوئی میں گیس پلانٹ کو جاتی ہے اور اس کو نامعلوم افراد نے صبح سویرے دھماکے سے اڑا دیا۔

Input.machine_translation6: Yesterday, Sui well number 3 was completely destroyed by an explosion, and a gas pipeline near Dera Allah Yar has been damaged by an explosion.
Input.seg7: ان دھماکوں کی ذمہ داری کالعدم تنظیم بلوچ ریپبلکن آرمی کے ترجمان  سرباز بلوچ نے اپنی تنظیم کی جانب سے قبول کی ہے۔

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: 819 ارب ڈالر کا اقتصادی بحالی کا پیکج منظور
Input.machine_translation1: $819 Billion Economic Recovery Package Approved
Input.seg2: صدر اوباما کے اس منصوبے کے حق میں کسی بھی رپبلکن پارٹی سے تعلق رکھنے والے کسی بھی رکن نے ووٹ نہیں دیا۔
Input.machine_translation2: No member of the Republican Party has voted in favor of President Obama's plan.
Input.seg3: رپبلکن اراکین کا کہنا تھا کہ یہ اقتصادی پلان بہت  ’مہنگا‘ ہے اور کارگر ثابت نہیں ہوگا۔
Input.machine_translation3: The Republican members said that this economic plan is very "expensive" and will not be effective.
Input.seg4: ایوان نمائندگان میں اس پیکج کے حق میں دو سو چوالیس جبکہ مخالفت میں ایک سو اٹھاسی ووٹ ڈالے گئے۔
Input.machine_translation4: In the House of Representatives, 244 votes were cast in favor of this package and 188 against it.
Input.seg5: اقتصادی بحالی کا یہ منصوبہ اگلے ہفتے سینیٹ میں پیش کیا جانا ہے جہاں حزب اقتدار ڈیموکریٹ پارٹی کو بہت معمولی اکثریت حاصل ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: This economic recovery plan is to be presented next week in the Senate where the ruling Democratic Party has a minimal majority.
Input.seg6: خدشہ ظاہر کیا جا رہا ہے کہ رپبلکن پارٹی کی طرف سے شدید مخالفت کی وجہ سے اس کی سینیٹ سے منظوری آسان نہ ہو گی۔
Input.machine_translation6: It is feared that due to the Republican Party's severe opposition, its approval by the Senate will not be easy.
Input.seg7: ایوان نمائندگان میں اقتصادی بحالی کے پلان کی منظوری کے بعد باراک اوباما نے اراکین پر زور دیتے ہوئے کہا کہ وہ سیاسی اختلافات کو اس اہم منصوبے کی راہ میں حائل نہ ہونے دیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: After the approval of the economic recovery plan in the House of Representatives, Barack Obama urged the members not to let political differences get in the way of this important plan.
Input.seg8: صدر نے کہا کہ یہ منصوبہ جس کے بارے میں انہوں نے امید ظاہر کی کہ اگلے ماہ تک قانون کی صورت اختیار کر لے گا ملک میں ایک ساز ماحول بنانے میں مدد گار ثابت ہو گا جس میں امریکی میں تجارت فروغ پائے گی۔
Input.machine_translation8: The president said that this plan, which he hopes will become a law by next month, will prove to be helpful in creating a favorable environment in the country for American commerce to thrive.
Input.seg9: اس منصوبے کے تحت عام آدمیوں اور تاجر برادری کے لیے دو سو پچھہتر ارب ڈالر کے قرضوں میں چھوٹ اور پانچ سو چالیس ارب سڑکوں، پلوں، دس ہزار سکولوں کی تزئین ، بے روزگاری الاوئنس اور نئی ٹیکنولوجی کی تحقیق کے لیے دیئے جائیں گے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Under this plan there will be a bailout in loans of $275 billion for common people and the business community, and $540 billion will be given towards roads, bridges, modernization of 10,000 schools, unemployment allowance, and research of new technologies.
Input.seg10: واشنگٹن میں بی بی سی کے نامہ نگار رچرڈ لسٹر نے کہا ہے کہ باراک اوباما نے سیاسی اختلافات کو پس پست ڈالتے ہوئے ایک نیا سیاسی کلچر معترف کرانے کا عزم کیا تھا لیکن اس اقتصادی پیکج پر بحث نے ایک بار پھر سیاسی بنیادوں میں تلخی پیدا کر دی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: BBC's Washington correspondent Richard Lister said that Barack Obama is determined to put aside political differences and introduce a new political culture, but argument over this economic package has once again created bitterness on political grounds.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: The 819 trillion Dollar economic reform package was accepted
Answer.translation2: No member who was part of any Republican party voted for this plan of President Obama.
Answer.translation3: It was the saying of the Republican parties, that this economic plan was very expensive and that it would not be successful.
Answer.translation4: Among the representatives of the houses, 240 votes were given in favor of the plan, while 188 votes were given against it.
Answer.translation5: This economic reform plan has to be produced in the Senate next week, where the ruling Democratic party has a very normal majority.
Answer.translation10: The editor of BBC in Washington, Richard Lister said that Barack Obama had decided to put political differences behind his back and prepare a new political culture, but this economic package has once again created bitterness on political lines.
Answer.translation6: It is being feared that due to opposition from the republican party, it's passing in the senate may not be easy.
Answer.translation7: After the passing of the economic reform plan among the representatives of the houses, Barack Obama said to the members, forcing them, that they should not let political differences get in the way of this important plan.
Answer.translation8: The President said that plan, which he hoped would become law by next month would prove helpful in creating a suitable environment in the country, because of which business would prosper in the country.
Answer.translation9: According to this plan, the common man and the businessmen would be relieved of 275 trillion Dollars of debt, and 540 trillion Dollars would be given for fixing roads, bridges and ten thousand schools and for unemployment allowance and research on new technology.

Input.seg7: ایوان نمائندگان میں اقتصادی بحالی کے پلان کی منظوری کے بعد باراک اوباما نے اراکین پر زور دیتے ہوئے کہا کہ وہ سیاسی اختلافات کو اس اہم منصوبے کی راہ میں حائل نہ ہونے دیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: After the approval of the economic recovery plan in the House of Representatives, Barack Obama urged the members not to let political differences get in the way of this important plan.
Input.seg8: صدر نے کہا کہ یہ منصوبہ جس کے بارے میں انہوں نے امید ظاہر کی کہ اگلے ماہ تک قانون کی صورت اختیار کر لے گا ملک میں ایک ساز ماحول بنانے میں مدد گار ثابت ہو گا جس میں امریکی میں تجارت فروغ پائے گی۔
Input.machine_translation8: The president said that this plan, which he hopes will become a law by next month, will prove to be helpful in creating a favorable environment in the country for American commerce to thrive.
Input.seg9: اس منصوبے کے تحت عام آدمیوں اور تاجر برادری کے لیے دو سو پچھہتر ارب ڈالر کے قرضوں میں چھوٹ اور پانچ سو چالیس ارب سڑکوں، پلوں، دس ہزار سکولوں کی تزئین ، بے روزگاری الاوئنس اور نئی ٹیکنولوجی کی تحقیق کے لیے دیئے جائیں گے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Under this plan there will be a bailout in loans of $275 billion for common people and the business community, and $540 billion will be given towards roads, bridges, modernization of 10,000 schools, unemployment allowance, and research of new technologies.
Input.seg10: واشنگٹن میں بی بی سی کے نامہ نگار رچرڈ لسٹر نے کہا ہے کہ باراک اوباما نے سیاسی اختلافات کو پس پست ڈالتے ہوئے ایک نیا سیاسی کلچر معترف کرانے کا عزم کیا تھا لیکن اس اقتصادی پیکج پر بحث نے ایک بار پھر سیاسی بنیادوں میں تلخی پیدا کر دی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: BBC's Washington correspondent Richard Lister said that Barack Obama is determined to put aside political differences and introduce a new political culture, but argument over this economic package has once again created bitterness on political grounds.

Answer.translation10: According Richard Listern, A BBC correspondent in Washington, obama came in power with the motto to introduce new political culture but current debate on economic package has increased the political bitterness.

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: ایوان نمائندگان میں رپبلکن جماعت کے اراکین نے حکومت کی طرف سے تجویز کردہ بل کو سرکاری پیسے کا زیاں قرار دیا اور کہا کہ اس سے روزگار کے نئے مواقعے پیدا کرنے میں کوئی مدد نہیں ملے گی۔
Input.machine_translation1: Republican Party members in the House of Representatives declared the bill proposed by the government as a waste of government money and said that it will not help in creating new opportunities for employment.
Input.seg2: انہوں نے اپنی جماعت کی طرف سے تجویز کردہ بل پر زور دیا جس میں ٹکسوں میں چھوٹ پر زیادہ توجہ دی گئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: They emphasized the bill proposed by their own party in which more consideration has been given to tax reduction.
Input.seg3: انہوں نے کہا ان کے پیکج کے ذریعے کہیں زیادہ کم سرمایہ کاری میں روزگار کے زیادہ مواقعے پیدا کیئے جا سکتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: They said that through their package, perhaps more opportunities for employment can be created with less investment.
Input.seg4: انہوں نے کہا کہ تعمیراتی منصوبے  کی بنسبت ٹیکسوں میں چھوٹ سے فوری طور پر روزگار کے زیادہ مواقعے پیدا کیئے جاسکتے
Input.machine_translation4: They said that more immediate opportunities for employment can be created by reducing taxes than by a constructive plan.
Input.seg5: اسرائیلی صدر،تُرک وزیراعظم میں تلخی
Input.machine_translation5: Bitterness between Israeli President and Turkish Prime Minister
Input.seg6: رجب طیب ارگان نے تقریباّ چیختے ہوئے اسرائیلی صدر سے کہا کہ غزہ میں بہت انسانوں کا خون بہایا گیا ہے اور انہیں یہ دیکھ کر افسوس ہوا  کہ لوگ اسرائیلی کی جانب سے اس فوج کشی کے جواز پر تالیاں بھی بجا سکتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation6: Recep Tayyip Erdogan, almost screaming, told the Israeli President that the blood of many people has been shed in Gaza, and he was sorry to see that people can applaud the justification for Israel's invasion.
Input.seg7: مسٹر ارگان نے کہا: ’"مجھے لگتا ہے کہ آپ شاید اپنا احساس جرم مٹانے کے لیے  ایسے الفاظ استعمال کر رہے ہیں اور وہ بھی بلند آواز مگر آپ نے لوگوں کو ہلاک کیا اور میں ان بچوں کو یاد کر رہا ہوں جنہیں ساحل کے قریب مار دیا گیا۔
Input.machine_translation7: Mr. Erdogan said, "It seems to me that perhaps you are speaking in such a way, even shouting, so as to remove your feeling of guilt, but you have killed people - and I am talking about those children who were killed near the beach."
Input.seg8: شیمون پیریز نے کہا کہ غزہ کا سانحہ اسرائیل نہیں، حماس ہے جس نے وہاں خطرناک ڈکٹیٹر شپ قائم کرلی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Shimon Peres said that in Gaza it is Hamas, not Israel, who has established a dangerous dictatorship there.
Input.seg9: ڈیوس سے بی بی سی کے ایک نامہ نگار کا کہنا ہے کہ عالمی اقتصادی فورم میں اس سے پہلے کبھی ایسا منظر دیکھنے میں نہیں آیا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation9: One BBC correspondent from Davos says that this kind of scene has never been witnessed before at the World Economic Forum.
Input.seg10: تاہم بعد میں اردگان نے کہا کہ وہ اسرایلی صدر کا احترام کرتے ہیں اور ان کی عمر کا بھی جس کی وجہ سے وہ ان پر چیخے نہیں مگر وہ جو کچھ کہہ رہے تھے وہ سچ سے کوسوں دور تھا۔
Input.machine_translation10: However, Erdogan said later that he respects the Israeli President and his age, as well, and this was not the reason he shouted at him, but rather because what he was saying was far from true.

Answer.translation1: In National Assembly member of Republican Party has rejected the bill by the government and declare it as a wastage of money and no employment Opportunity can be created through this.
Answer.translation2: he Focuses on the Bill from his party in which tax cut has been advise much.
Answer.translation3: he said that through his package with less investment can produce many employment opportunities.
Answer.translation4: he said that with respect to Development projects, Tax cut can create many employment Opportunity.
Answer.translation5: Israel President and Turk Prime Minister has bitterness in between
Answer.translation10: Afterwards Urdan said that he respect Israeli President and his age because of which he shouted on him but all that he was saying was far from the truth.
Answer.translation6: Rajab Tayb Urdan almost shoutedly has said to Israeli President that many blood has been spoil in Gaza and he felt ashamed that people were clapping on such military coup on Gaza
Answer.translation7: Mr. Urdan has said that I feel that you are using such words in order to hide your guilt but you have killed those children and i am mourning the death of those, killed at sea side.
Answer.translation8: Shamon Perez has said that Gaza's Incident was not due to Israel it was Hamas who has created a dangerous dictatorship
Answer.translation9: Davis CA crosspondent of BBC has said that world economic forum has never seen such incident before

Input.machine_translation7: Defending the delay in Pakistan's investigation, he said that collecting, examining, and understanding this kind of material takes time.
Input.seg8: ہائی کمِشنر واجد شمس الحسن نے کہا کہ بھارت کو اپنا ڈوسیئر پیش کرنے میں پینتالیس دن لگے تھے۔

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: پارٹی میں چیئرمین کے عہدے کے لیے انتخابات میں سٹیل کےمدمقابل امیدوار  کیٹن ڈاؤسن کو ستتر ووٹ ملے جبکہ سابق چیئرمین ڈنکن  دوسرے مرحلے میں مقابلے سے دستربردار ہوگئے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation1: In the election for the role as party chairman, competing candidate Katon Dawson received 77 votes, while ex-chairman Duncan withdrew from the competition during the second cycle.
Input.seg2: نامہ نگاروں کا کہنا ہے کہ ریپبلکن پارٹی کی چیئرمین شپ کے لیے جو پانچ امیدوار کھڑے ہوئے تھے ان میں مائیکل سٹیل سب سے اعتدال پسند رہنما تسلیم کیے جاتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: Correspondents say that Michael Steele is considered the most moderate leader among the five candidates who stood for the chairmanship of the Republican Party.
Input.seg3: جیت کے بعد اپنے خطاب میں مائیکل سٹیل نے کہا’ ہم اپنے دوستوں اور حریفوں سے ایک ساتھ یہ کہنے جارہے ہیں کہ آپ ہمارے ساتھ آئیں لیکن جو لوگ اس میں رخنہ ڈالنا چاہیں گے  وہ ہم سے دور ہونے کے لیے تیار ہو جائیں۔ مائیکل سٹیل کا تعلق میری لینڈ سے ہے جہاں وہ ڈپٹی گورنر بھی رہ چکے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: After the victory, Michael Steele said in his speech, "We are going to tell our friends and opponents together to join us, but those who want to get in the way should get ready to back off." Michael Steele is from Maryland, where he has also served as lieutenant governor.
Input.seg4: دو ہزار چھ میں انہیں اس وقت شہرت ملی جب وہ سینیٹ کی ایک سیٹ کے لیے انتخاب میں کھڑے ہوئے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation4: He became famous in 2006 when he ran for a Senatorial seat in the election.
Input.seg5: لیکن سینیٹ کے انتخابات میں ہارنے کے بعد وہ پارٹی کی ایک پولیٹیکل کنزرویٹیو کمیٹی کے چیئرمین  بنا دیئے گئے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation5: However, after losing in the Senate elections, he was made chairman of the party's political Conservative Committee.
Input.seg6: اب پارٹی کے چیئرمین منتخب ہونے کے بعد ریپبلیکن پارٹی کی ملک گیر مہم کی کوششیں ان کی سر پرستی میں ہوں گی۔
Input.machine_translation6: Now that he has been elected as party chairman, the Republican Party's national campaign efforts will be under his guidance.
Input.seg7: انہوں نے انتخاب اس وعدے پر لڑاہے کہ وہ پارٹی کو ایک نئی جہت دیں گے اور قدامت پرست حامیوں کو پارٹی سے جوڑنے کے لیے نئی تکنیکی کا استعمال کریں گے۔
Input.machine_translation7: He has run in the election promising to give new direction to the party and to use new techniques to align conservative supporters with the party.
Input.seg8: جمّوں میں لشکرِ طیّبہ اور جیشِ محمّد کی موجودگی کا بھارتی دعویٰ
Input.machine_translation8: India Claims that Lashkar-e-Tayaba and Jaish-e-Mohammed Are Present in Jammu
Input.seg9: جمّوں کے پونچھ ضلعے میں عسکریت پسندوں کے موجود ہونے کی اطلاعات ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: There are reports of militants being present in the Poonch district of Jammu.
Input.seg10: سرکاری زرائع کے مطابق خفیہ اطلاع ملنے پر فوج اور پولیس نے اس علاقے کا گھیراؤ کیا اور تلاشیاں شروع کیں۔
Input.machine_translation10: According to official sources, upon receiving secret information, the police and army surrounded the area and began conducting searches.

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: اس دوران جھڑپ شروع ہوئی جس میں چار عسکریت پسند، دو فوجی اور ایک پولیس اہلکار ہلاک ہوگیا۔
Input.machine_translation1: At this time fighting began during which four militants, two soldiers, and one policeman were killed.
Input.seg2: زرائع کے مطابق جھڑپیں آخری اطلاعات ملنے تک جاری تھیں اوراس علاقے میں لشکرِ طیّبہ اور جیشِ محمّد سے وابستہ عسکریت پسند موجود ہیں جن کا مقابلہ کرنے کے لیے فوج کی مزید کمک وہاں بھیج دی گئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: According to sources, the most recent reports indicate that fighting is still underway and militants with ties to Lashkar-e-Tayaba and Jaish-e-Mohammed are present in the area, with whom further army reinforcements have been sent to fight.
Input.seg3: اس دوران مخلوط سرکار کی جانب سے نامزد وزیرِ اعلیٰ عمر عبداللہ نےگورنر سے ملاقات کی اور ان نے اپنی پارٹی نیشنل کانفرنس کی جانب سے اسمبلی کا لیڈر چنے جانے کے بارے میں باضابطہ اطلاع دی۔
Input.machine_translation3: Meanwhile, Omar Abdullah, the Chief Minister appointed by the coalition government, met with the Governor and gave him official notification of his selection as the leader of the Assembly by his party, the National Conference.
Input.seg4: نیشنل کانفرنس کی حلیف جماعت کانگریس نے بھی گورنر کو عمر عبداللہ کی حمایت سے آگاہ کیا۔
Input.machine_translation4: National Conference's supportive party Congress also informed the Governor of its support for Omar Abdullah.
Input.seg5: عمر عبداللہ کو کل ریاست کے وزیرِ اعلیٰ کی حیثیت سے حلف دلایا جائے گا۔
Input.machine_translation5: Omar Abdullah will be given the oath as Chief Minister of State tomorrow.
Input.seg6: یاد رہے کہ حالیہ ریاستی انتخابات میں نیشنل کانفرنس ستاسی اراکین کے ایوان میں اٹھائیس نشستیں حاصل کرکے سب سے بڑی جماعت بن کر سامنے آئی ہے۔ واضح رہے کہ علیحدگی پشند جماعتوں نے انتخابات کا بائکاٹ کیا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation6: It should be noted that in the recent state elections, National Conference, after winning 28 seats in the 87-member House, has emerged as the largest party. Separatist parties had boycotted the elections.
Input.seg7: کانگریس، جس کو سترہ نشستیں حاصل ہوئیں، نیشنل کانفرنس کے ساتھ مخلوط حکومت بنانے پر آمادہ ہوگئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: Congress, which obtained 17 seats, has agreed to form a coalition government with National Conference.
Input.seg8: آج سری نگر آمد پر پارٹی کا رکنوں نے عمر عبداللہ کا گرم جوشی کے ساتھ استقبال کیا۔
Input.machine_translation8: Upon his arrival in Srinagar today, party workers gave Omar Abdullah a warm welcome.
Input.seg9: اس موقع پر عمر عبداللہ کا کہنا ہے کہ وہ بھارت سرکار اور علیحدگی پسندوں کے درمیان بات چیت کو ممکن بنانے کے لیے اپنا کردار ادا کریں گے تاہم بھارت میں انتخابات کے انعقاد اور نئی حکومت کے اقتدار میں آنے تک ایسا ممکن نہیں ہوگا۔
Input.machine_translation9: At this point Omar Abdullah says that he will play his role in making negotiations possible between the Indian government and the separatists, but that this will not be possible until elections take place and the new government comes into power.
Input.seg10: مشرق وسطیٰ میں امن کے لئے یورپی یونین کا کردار
Input.machine_translation10: Role of European Union for Peace in Middle East

Answer.translation1: In this period small fights ensued in which four militants, two soldiers and one police agent were killed.
Answer.translation2: According to sources these fights were going on until the last reports received, and Lashkar-e-Taiba and Jaish-e-Mohammad militants are present in these regions, to fight with whom more army battalions were sent there.
Answer.translation3: Meanwhile, the chief minister selected by the joint government, Umar Abdullah met the governor and informed him about his being selected the leader of his party, the National Conference in the assembly.
Answer.translation4: The allied party of the National Conference, the Congress also informed the governor of their support for Umar Abdullah.
Answer.translation5: Umar Abdullah will be administered the oath as the chief minister of the state tomorrow.
Answer.translation10: The role of the European Union in peace making in the Middle East.
Answer.translation6: Note that in the recently held state elections, the National Conference got 28 out of the 87 seats of the parliament, coming forth the biggest party. It should be clear that separatist groups boycotted the elections.
Answer.translation7: Congress, which got 17 seats, was prepared to form a joint government with the National Conference.
Answer.translation8: Today, upon reaching Srinagar, Umar Abdullah was jubilantly greeted by the party members.
Answer.translation9: On this occasion, Umar Abdullah said that he would try to play a role in generating dialog between the Indian government and separatists. However, this would not be possible until the elections took place and the new government came to power in India.

Answer.translation2: According to the resources, fight continued till the last summary of information and troops of Lashkar-e-Tayyaba and Jaish-e-Mohammad are there. More army has been sent over there to fight them.
Answer.translation3: During that time, Chief Minister Umer Abdullah, appointed by conflate government, met with Governor and told him about him being selected by his National Conference party.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: سرکاری لحاظ سے دیکھا جائے تو مشرق وسطیٰ کی جنگ روکنے کے لئے کی جانے والی مصالحتی کوششوں میں یورپی یونین کا کردار فیصلہ کن ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: When viewed from an official standpoint, the role of the European Union in the conciliatory efforts to stop the war in the Middle East is decisive.
Input.seg2: برسلزکےسرکاری مؤقف کے مطابق شوارزن برگ وفد یا سارکوزی کی کوششیں اس کام میں ہاتھ بٹانے کے مترادف ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: According to the official stand of Brussels, Schwarzenberg's delegation or Sarkozy's efforts are the equivalent to lending a helping hand.
Input.seg3: یورپی کمیشن کے ترجمان Amadeu Altafaj نے کہا کہ ہر وہ کوشش قابل تحسین ہے جس کے ذریعے  یورپی یونین کا مشترکہ پیغام جنگی فریقین تک پہنچانے میں مدد مل سکتی ہو۔
Input.machine_translation3: Amadeu Altafaj, spokesperson for the European Commission, said that every effort by which the European Commission's concerted message can be sent to warring parties is praiseworthy.
Input.seg4: سرکاری بیان کی حد تک تو سب ٹھیک نظر آتا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: As far as its official statement is concerned, everything looks fine.
Input.seg5: لیکن حقیقت میں یورپی یونین اندرون خانہ کھینچا تانی کی ایک افسوس ناک تصویر پیش کر رہی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: But in reality the European Union is presenting a sad picture of its own internal tug-of-war.
Input.seg6: یونین کے صدر کےطور پر چیک ریپبلک کا کردار پہلے ہی کمزور ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: As Union President, the role of the Czech Republic has already been weak.
Input.seg7: اوپر سے اندرونی جھگڑے نے اسے بے بس کر رکھا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: On top of that, internal disputes have rendered it helpless.
Input.seg8: دوسری جانب فرانسیسی صدر سارکوزی کا طرز عمل یوں ہے جیسے وہ ابھی تک یورپی یونین کی صدارت کا فریضہ انجام دے رہے ہوں۔
Input.machine_translation8: On the other hand, French President Sarkozy is acting as though he is still performing the presidential duties of the European Union.
Input.seg9: حالانکہ فرانس اپنی چھ ماہ کی صدارتی مدت پوری کر چکا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Even though France has completed its six-month presidential term.
Input.seg10: سارکوزی قیادتی کردار ادا کرنا چاہتے ہیں اور وہ کر بھی سکتے ہیں لیکن انہیں اس کی اجازت نہیں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Sarkozy wants to play a leadership role, and he is certainly capable, but he does not have the permission to do so.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: If looked at from a government perspective, of the diplomatic efforts going on to stop the Middle East war, those of the European Union are the most decisive.
Answer.translation2: According to the state policy of Brussels, the efforts of the Shwarzenburg delegation or those of Sarkozy, is similar to giving a helping hand.
Answer.translation3: The spokesperson of the European Commission, Amadeu Altafaj, said that every effort which helps advancing the joint message of the European Union to the two parties, is welcome.
Answer.translation4: As far as the state policy is concerned, everyone seems alright.
Answer.translation5: However, in reality, the European Union is in a sad state of internal differences from the inside.
Answer.translation10: Sarkozy wants to play a presidential role, and he is able to, but he does not have the permission to do so.
Answer.translation6: As the president of the Union, the Czech Republic's role is weak, to start with.
Answer.translation7: On top of that, internal fighting has made it all the more helpless.
Answer.translation8: On the other hand, French President, Sarkozy's demeanor is such that one would think that he was the president of the Union.
Answer.translation9: Though France has completed it's 6 month presidency period.

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: سب سے مضحکہ خیز صورت حال کا سامنا فرانسیسی وزیر خارجہ Bernard Kouchner  کو ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: French Foreign Minister Bernard Kouchner is faced with the most ludicrous situation.
Input.seg2: وہ اس وفد میں شامل ہیں جن کی قیادت چیک ریپبلک کے وزیر خارجہ Schwarzenberg کر رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: He is included in the delegation led by Czech Republic's Foreign Minister Schwarzenberg.
Input.seg3: اس پر مستزاد یہ کہ مشرق وسطیٰ جنگ کے بارے میں دونوں وزرائے خارجہ مختلف بیانات دے رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: However, both Foreign Ministers are making different statements about the war in the Middle East.
Input.seg4: Schwarzenberg کہتے ہیں کہ  اسرائیل کو اپنے دفاع کا حق حاصل ہے جب کہ Kouchnerکے نزدیک یہ جنگ دفاع کے زمرے میں نہیں آتی۔ ادھر جرمنی نے بھی اپنا ایک خصوصی ایلچی مشرق وسطیٰ روانہ کر رکھا ہے۔ جب تک یورپی یونین یکساں مؤقف پر مبنی ہم آہنگی ظاہر نہیں کرتی،  سفارتی محاذ پر اسے کامیابی حاصل نہیں ہو سکتی
Input.machine_translation4: Schwarzenberg says that Israel has the right to defend itself, while Kouchner thinks that this war cannot be called one of self-defense. Meanwhile Germany has also sent its own special envoy to the Middle East. Until the European Union demonstrates harmony by taking a united stand, it cannot achieve success on the diplomatic front.
Input.seg5: ۔   اس کا ثبوت اسرائیل کا طرز عمل ہے جو یورپ کی مصالحتی کوششوں کو کوئی وقعت نہیں دیتا۔
Input.machine_translation5: Evidence of this is Israel's conduct, which does not show any respect for Europe's conciliatory efforts.
Input.seg6: یورپی یونین کے لئے اس وقت کچھ کر دکھانے کا سنہری موقع ہے کیونکہ امریکہ جارج ڈبلیو بش کی پالیسیوں کی وجہ سے مشرق وسطیٰ میں ناکام ہو چکا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: This is a golden opportunity for the European Union to do something because America has failed in the Middle East due to the policies of George W. Bush.
Input.seg7: مالیاتی بحران: ارب پتی جرمن صنعتکار کی خود کشی
Input.machine_translation7: Financial Crisis: Billionaire German Industrialist's Suicide
Input.seg8: جنوبی جرمنی میں صوابیہ کے علاقے کے رہنے والے آڈولف میرکلے نے اپنے پیچھے ایک بہت بڑا کاروباری گروپ تو چھوڑا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Adolf Merckle of Southern Germany's Swabia area has left a large business group behind,
Input.seg9: مگر کچھ عرصہ پہلے تک عام جرمن شہری ان کے بارے میں زیادہ نہیں جانتے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation9: but until some time ago the average German citizen did not know much about him.
Input.seg10: پھر جب انہیں اپنے صنعتی گروپ کو قرضے دینے والے 30 کے قریب بینکوں کے ساتھ کئی ہفتوں تک مذاکرات کرنا پڑے تووہ سرخیوں کا موضوع بھی بن گئےاور انہیں میرکلے گروپ کا مستقبل بھی تاریک نظر آنے لگا۔
Input.machine_translation10: When he had to carry on negotiations for several weeks with the nearly thirty banks who lend money to his industrial group, he became the topic of headlines and began to see the future of the Merckle group as bleak.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.18) Gecko/2010020220 Firefox/3.0.18 GTB6
Answer.translation1: The most ridiculous situation faces the foreign minister of France, Bernard Kouchner.
Answer.translation2: He is part of the delegation, which is being headed by Schwarzenberg, the foreign minister of Czech Republic.
Answer.translation3: What is even worse is that both the foreign ministers are giving different statements on the middle east war.
Answer.translation4: Schwarzenberg says that Israel has the right to defend itself whereas according to Kouchner this war does not come under defense policy. On the other side, Germany has also sent its special ambassador to Middle East. European Union will not succeed on a foreign platform until they express agreement based on the same issues.
Answer.translation5: Its evidence is the reaction of Israel who does not pay an importance to the conciliation efforts of the EU.
Answer.translation10: Later when he had to conference, about the loan given to his industrial group, with almost 30 banks for many weeks, he also became topic of the headlines. And he could see a dark future of Meerklay groups.
Answer.translation6: EU has a golden chance of getting something done. Because America has lost in the Middle East due to the policies of George Bush.
Answer.translation7: Economic setback: Suicide of German billionaire industrialist.

Answer.translation9: But earlier common German citizens did not know much about him.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: میرکلے گروپ کو جرمن کارساز ادارے فولکس واگن کے شیئرز کی خریداری کی بعد مالیاتی بحران کے باعث کئی سو ملین یورو کا نقصان بھی برداشت کرنا پڑا۔
Input.machine_translation1: The Merckle group was forced to suffer millions of euros in losses due to the financial crisis, after purchasing shares of the German Volkswagen manufacturer.
Input.seg2: پھر مالیاتی اداروں نے اس گروپ کو لازمی طور پر درکار 700 ملین اور ایک بلین یورو کے درمیان مالیت کے نئے قرضے دینے سے انکار کردیا تو میرکلے شدید دباؤ میں آگئے۔
Input.machine_translation2: So when financial institutions refused to make new loans of between 700 million and one billion euros to this group, which they desperately needed, Merckle came under intense pressure.
Input.seg3: کچھ عرصہ قبل یہی بینک میرکلے گروپ کو ہنگامی بنیادوں پر قرضے فراہم کرنے پر تیار تو ہو گئے تھے مگر آڈولف میرکلے جو ایک چھوٹے صنعتکار سے اس مقام پر پہنچے تھے کہ ان کے صنعتی گروپ کی سالانہ آمدنی تقریبا 30 بلین یورو بنتی تھی، اپنی سرمایہ دارانہ طاقت سے محرومی کو برداشت نہ کرسکے۔
Input.machine_translation3: Just recently the same banks had agreed to provide loans to the Merckle group on an emergency basis, but Adolf Merckle, who had moved from being a small industrialist to the position that his industrial group's annual income was approximately 30 billion euros, could not withstand the deprivation of his strength as a capitalist.
Input.seg4: آڈولف میرکلے نے اپنے والد کے انتقال کےبعد جب ان کا خاندانی کاروبار سنبھالا توجدید خطوط پر استوار کرتے ہوئے اسے جلد ہی بہت زیادہ ترقی بھی دی۔
Input.machine_translation4: When Adolf Merckle took charge of his family's business after the death of his father, he greatly improved the business very quickly through a process of modernization.
Input.seg5: انہوں نے اپنی کمپنی کا نام  Ratiopharm  رکھا جو آج جرمنی کی انتہائی کامیاب اور بہت بڑی دوا ساز کمپنی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: He named his company "Ratiopharm," now the biggest and most successful pharmaceutical company in Germany.
Input.seg6: کچھ عرصہ پہلے تک اس دواساز ادارے کی کاروباری مالیت پانچ اور چھ بلین یورو کے درمیان تھی اور اسے ابھی بھی سالانہ 1. 8 بلین یورو کی آمدنی ہوتی ہے۔ راسیو فارم کی زبردست کامیابی کے بعد میرکلے گروپ نے کئی بڑے بڑے ادارے خرید لئے جن میں تعمیراتی سازوسامان تیار کرنے والے ہائیڈل بیرگ سیمنٹ سے لے کرخاص طرح کی گاڑیاں تیار کرنے والی Kässbohrer  نامی کمپنی بھی شامل ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Until recently the company was worth between 5 and 6 billion euros, and it still generates an annual income of 8.1 billion euros. After the tremendous success of Ratiopharm, the Merckle group purchased several large institutions, including HeidelbergCement, a manufacturer of construction materials, and Kaessbohrer, a manufacturer of special vehicles.
Input.seg7: میرکلے گروپ کے دنیا بھر میں ملازمین کی تعداد ایک لاکھ کے قریب ہے اور اس کے اثاثوں میں راسیو فارم نامی دوا ساز کمپنی کو ہمیشہ ہی خصوصی اہمیت حاصل رہی۔
Input.machine_translation7: The number of Merckle Group employees worldwide is nearly 100,000, and the Ratiopharm pharmaceutical company has always held a special place amongst its assets.
Input.seg8: آڈولف میرکلے نے اپنی زندگی میں یہ بات کئی بار کہی تھی: "ہمیں دواسازی کرتے ہوئے چار نسلیں ہو گئی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation8: In his life Adolf Merckle had said on several occasions, "This is our fourth generation of drug manufacturers.
Input.seg9: اب اس ادارے کا انتظام میرے بچوں کے پاس ہے اور میں امید کرتا ہوں کہ یہ ادارہ ابھی چند سو سال تک میرے ہی خاندان کے انتطام میں رہے گا۔
Input.machine_translation9: Now this company's administration is with my children and I am hopeful that in the coming few hundred years it will remain under my family's administration."
Input.seg10: آڈولف میرکلے کی خود کشی کے بعد بینکوں نے ان کے گروپ VEM کے لئے 400 ملین یورو مالیت کے عبوری قرضوں کی منظوری تو دے دی ہے مگر شرط یہ ہے کہ VEM کوراسیو فارم کو بیچنا ہوگا تاکہ اس گروپ کی مالی حالت طویل المدتی بنیادوں پر بہتر بنائی جاسکے۔
Input.machine_translation10: After the suicide of Adolf Merckle, banks approved a temporary loan of 400 million euros to his VEM group, but on the condition that VEM will have to sell Ratiopharm so that the group's financial situation can be improved over the long term.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: The Merkel Group had to suffer financial losses of many millions of Euro after its investment to buy shares of German auto maker Volkswagen.
Answer.translation2: Then monetary institutions canceled this groups loan amounting 700 million and another 1 billion Euro that it necessarily required and hence Merkel came into extreme pressure.
Answer.translation3: Some time back the bank agreed to provide Merkel Group an emergency loan but Adolf Merkel who raised from a small industrialist to the position of a strong industrial group whose annual income was approximately 30 billion Euro, could not bare the loss in his investment capability.
Answer.translation4: Adolf Merkel, after the death of his parents started managing the business and took to modernize it.The business under his supervision became very popular and became more strong.
Answer.translation5: He named his company Ratiopharm which is today Germany's very large acclaimed and successful pharmaceutical company.
Answer.translation10: After the suicide of Adolf Merkel, the banks have provided approval for temporary loans of 400 million Euro for VEM Group but added the condition that VEM should sell off Ratiopharm to improve the financial situation for a long term sustainability.
Answer.translation6: Some time back the commercial value of this company was in between 5 and 6 billion Euro and still was earning a revenue of 8.1 billion Euro annually. After the great success of Ratiopharm, the Merkel Group acquired many big businesses which included building materials maker Hydelberg cement to modified/special car maker Kassbohrer company.
Answer.translation7: The workforce of Merkel Group is nearly about 100,000 throughout the world and its assets include Ratiopharm which always was the most important business in the portfolio.
Answer.translation8: Adolf Merkel during his liftime expressed the view may a time that " It has been four generations that we have been in pharmaceutical business.
Answer.translation9: Now the management of this institution is with my children and I hope this institution will be for few hundred years be managed by and in possession of my family.

Input.machine_translation10: After the suicide of Adolf Merckle, banks approved a temporary loan of 400 million euros to his VEM group, but on the condition that VEM will have to sell Ratiopharm so that the group's financial situation can be improved over the long term.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: The Merkle group had to face a loss of a few hundred million Euros due to the arrival of the financial crisis after it bought shares in the German car manufacturing company, Volkswagen.
Answer.translation2: Financial institutions then refused to give it the new 700 to one Billion Euro loan it needed on an immediate basis, so Merkle went into deep pressure.
Answer.translation3: Some time before that, the same bank was prepared to give it the immediate loan that it needed, but Adolf Merkel had got to this position from being a small producer, to having a yearly turnover of nearly 30 billion Euros, so he could not bear to lose his capitalistic powet.
Answer.translation4: After the death of his father, when Adolf Merkel took over his family business, he developed it quick, putting it on new lines.
Answer.translation5: He called his company Ratiopharm, which is a very successful and large pharmaceutical company in Germany.
Answer.translation10: After the suicide of Adolf Merkel, banks have sanctioned 400 million Euros in floating loans for his group, but under the condition that VEM will have to sell Ratiopharm so that it could improve its financial conditions in the long term.
Answer.translation6: Until a while ago, the value of this business was between 5 and 6 billion Euros, and it still earns about 8.1 billion Euros a year.After the superb success of Ratiopharm, Merkel group started buying many other institutions which included construction supply manufacturing companies like Hydelburg Cement to car manufacturing companies like Kassbohrer.
Answer.translation7: The number of employees of the Merkel group around the world is near 100,000 and its foundation company, the pharmaceutical Ratiopharm always had special importance.
Answer.translation8: Adolf Merkel has said many times in his life: "It has been four generations since I started making medicine.
Answer.translation9: Now the management of this group is in the hands of my children and I hope that the mangement of this company will remain in my family for a few hundred years.

Input.machine_translation3: Just recently the same banks had agreed to provide loans to the Merckle group on an emergency basis, but Adolf Merckle, who had moved from being a small industrialist to the position that his industrial group's annual income was approximately 30 billion euros, could not withstand the deprivation of his strength as a capitalist.
Input.seg4: آڈولف میرکلے نے اپنے والد کے انتقال کےبعد جب ان کا خاندانی کاروبار سنبھالا توجدید خطوط پر استوار کرتے ہوئے اسے جلد ہی بہت زیادہ ترقی بھی دی۔
Input.machine_translation4: When Adolf Merckle took charge of his family's business after the death of his father, he greatly improved the business very quickly through a process of modernization.
Input.seg5: انہوں نے اپنی کمپنی کا نام  Ratiopharm  رکھا جو آج جرمنی کی انتہائی کامیاب اور بہت بڑی دوا ساز کمپنی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: He named his company "Ratiopharm," now the biggest and most successful pharmaceutical company in Germany.
Input.seg6: کچھ عرصہ پہلے تک اس دواساز ادارے کی کاروباری مالیت پانچ اور چھ بلین یورو کے درمیان تھی اور اسے ابھی بھی سالانہ 1. 8 بلین یورو کی آمدنی ہوتی ہے۔ راسیو فارم کی زبردست کامیابی کے بعد میرکلے گروپ نے کئی بڑے بڑے ادارے خرید لئے جن میں تعمیراتی سازوسامان تیار کرنے والے ہائیڈل بیرگ سیمنٹ سے لے کرخاص طرح کی گاڑیاں تیار کرنے والی Kässbohrer  نامی کمپنی بھی شامل ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Until recently the company was worth between 5 and 6 billion euros, and it still generates an annual income of 8.1 billion euros. After the tremendous success of Ratiopharm, the Merckle group purchased several large institutions, including HeidelbergCement, a manufacturer of construction materials, and Kaessbohrer, a manufacturer of special vehicles.
Input.seg7: میرکلے گروپ کے دنیا بھر میں ملازمین کی تعداد ایک لاکھ کے قریب ہے اور اس کے اثاثوں میں راسیو فارم نامی دوا ساز کمپنی کو ہمیشہ ہی خصوصی اہمیت حاصل رہی۔

Input.seg1: CDU سے تعلق رکھنے والے امور داخلہ کے سینیٹر Christoph Ahlhaus نے کہا:’’سائنسی انداز میں جب تحقیق کی جاتی ہے تو انسان پہلے سے ہی اپنی مرضی کے نتائج مرتب نہیں کر سکتا بلکہ اس کا انحصار ان اعداد وشمار پر ہوتا ہے جو تحقیق کے بعد سامنے آتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: CDU's Senator of Internal Affairs Christoph Ahlhaus said, "When research is conducted in a scientific manner, one cannot draw up the results he would like to see ahead of time; they must depend on the data that emerges from the research.
Input.seg2: Ahlhaus نے انسداد جرائم کے صوبائی دفتر کی ایک تجزیاتی رپورٹ کی جانب توجہ دلائی جو 2006 میں تیار کی گئی تھی اور جس کی رو سے ہمبرگ شہر کے حصے Bergdorf میں اس بات کا کھوج لگایا گیا تھا کہ یہاں ہونے والے جرائم میں غیرملکیوں کی شرکت کتنے فیصد ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: Ahlhaus directed attention towards an analytical report from the provincial office of crime prevention prepared in 2006 in which the percentage of foreigners' involvement in crime was studied in the Bergedorf borough of the city of Hamburg.
Input.seg3: نتائج سے پتہ چلا کہ یہاں غیرملکیوں کے
Input.machine_translation3: Results showed that here
Input.seg4: جرائم کی شرح تمام صوبے میں ہونے والے جرائم کے مقابلے میں کم ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: the rate of crimes committed by foreigners is less than the crime rate for the entire province.
Input.seg5: اس کے برعکس جب برلن میں 2006 کے دوران نوجوانوں میں جرائم کی شرح کا جائزہ لیا گیا تو یہ بات سامنے آئی کہ  غیر ملکی پس منظر رکھنے والے نوجوانوں کی شرح 44.
Input.machine_translation5: In contrast, when the crime rate amongst adolescents was studied in 2006 in Berlin, it was seen that the rate of adolescents with foreign background was
Input.seg6: 7 فیصد تھی۔
Input.machine_translation6: 44.7 percent.
Input.seg7: تاہم جرمنی کی دیگر سیاسی جماعتیں مثلاً SPD، ماحول پرستوں کی جماعت گرینز اوربائیں بازو کی جماعت Linkspartei اس تجویز کے خلاف ہے کہ جرائم سے متعلقہ اعداد و شمار اکٹھے کرتے وقت یہ معلومات بھی جمع کی جائیں کہ کس جرمن شہری کا پس منظر غیر ملکی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: However, other German political parties, such as SPD, the environmentalist party Garbanz, and the left-wing party Linkspartei, are opposed to the idea of determining which German citizens have foreign background when gathering crime data.
Input.seg8: غزہ سے افواج کا جلد انخلاء چاہتے ہیں : اولمرٹ
Input.machine_translation8: Want Quick Evacuation of Troops From Gaza: Olmert
Input.seg9: ایہود اولمرٹ نے زور دیاکہ افواج کے مکمل انخلا کے لئے مستقل اور پائیدار جنگ بندی کا معاہدہ ناگزیر ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Ehud Olmert urged that for a complete evacuation of troops, an agreement for a permanent and durable cease-fire is essential.
Input.seg10: حماس اور اسرائیل نے اتوار کے دن جنگ بندی کا اعلان کیا۔
Input.machine_translation10: Hamas and Israel announced a cease-fire on Sunday.
Answer.comment: The passages in urdu were not continuous, creating some confusion.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1)
Answer.translation1: Christoph Ahlhaus, an internal affair's senator belong to CDU, said, "When one does research in a scientific manner, then the results can not be predetermined. The results are based on the figures and numbers which are the outcome of the research.
Answer.translation2: Ahlhaus brought the attention towards an analysis report of 2006 prepared by a regional (provincial) office of Crime Prevention, in view of which it was calculated that in the crimes happening from bergdorf to hamburg, what is the percentage of foreigners involved.
Answer.translation3: From the results it was found out that the foreigners'
Answer.translation4: crime percentage is less compared to the overall crime rate of the whole province.
Answer.translation5: In contrast to this calculation, when in 2006 in Berlin, the teenage crime rates were analyzed, it was found that the teenagers having a foreign background was 7.44%
Answer.translation10: Hamas and Israel announced war on Sunday.
Answer.translation7: However certain political parties of Germany for example SPD, the environmentalist party The Greens, and the Left party Linkspartei (Die Linke) , are against the idea of collecting information about whether certain German citizens are foreigners or not, while collecting facts about crimes and crime rates.
Answer.translation8: We want the army to evacuate from Gaza soon : Olmert
Answer.translation9: Ehud Olmert has insisted that the alliance of complete peace and no future war in return for evacuation of army is not unacceptable.
