Answer.translation1: In north waziristan the tribal areas of Pakistan ,six people have been murdered by Taliban.
Answer.translation2: A news agency quoted the transcript from writers that in the tribal area of North Waziristan two afghan citizens and four Pakistanis have been murdered, blamed for spying
Answer.translation3: According to the information’ on Tuesday morning local residents found 4 dead bodies .in the area of tehsil choke ,which is the suburb of sub district Mir Ali .they were killed with bullets.
Answer.translation4: Whereas two more dead bodies were found from the main area of miranshah ,they were thrown in the market of a bazaar .
Answer.translation5: Letters written in Urdu were also found close the corpses ,claimed that dead were killed for spying .
Answer.translation10: Important news agency copied from the sources saying that American president will be signing today for the closer of Guantanamo bay.
Answer.translation6: Two weeks earlier in miranshsh  the capital of North Waziristan ,two afghan citizens were also killed accused for spying .
Answer.translation7: During the last twelve days days fifteen people have been killed over the accusation of spying for America.
Answer.translation8: It should be known that over one hundred people have been killed during the last 6 years ,accused  for spying .Taliban have been blamed for these kinds of murder cases.
Answer.translation9: Barak obama is expected to sign to order for the closer of notorious Guantanamo bay jail.

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: پاکستان پاکستان کے قبائلی علاقے شمالی وزیرستان میں طالبان نے چھ افراد کو قتل کردیا ہے
Input.machine_translation1: Pakistan: Taliban Have Killed Six People in Pakistan's North Waziristan Tribal Area
Input.seg2: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی نے رائٹرز کے حوالے سے نقل کیا ہے کہ پاکستان کے قبائلی علاقے شمالی وزیرستان میں دو افغان شہری اور چار پاکستانیوں کو طالبان نے جاسوسی کے الزام میں قتل کر دیاہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: Mehr News Agency has quoted from Reuters that in Pakistan's North Waziristan tribal area the Taliban has killed two Afghan citizens and four Pakistanis accused of spying.
Input.seg3: اطلاعات کے مطابق مقامی لوگوں کو منگل کی صبح تحصیل میرعلی کے علاقے تحصیل چوک میں چار لاشیں ملی ہیں جنہیں گولیاں مار کر ہلاک کیاگیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: According to reports, local people found four dead bodies at the Tehsil Intersection, in the area of Tehsil Mir Ali on Tuesday morning who had been killed by gun shot,

Input.machine_translation5: Letters written in Urdu were also found with the dead bodies in which it is claimed that the murder victims were spies.
Input.seg6: دو ہفتے قبل بھی شمالی وزیرستان کے صدر مقام میرانشاہ میں دو افغان باشندوں کو جاسوسی کے الزام میں قتل کردیا گیا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation6: Two weeks ago two Afghan natives accused of spying were also killed in Miranshah, the capital city in North Waziristan.
Input.seg7: گزشتہ بارہ دنوں میں پندرہ افراد کو امریکہ کے لیے جاسوسی کے الزام میں ہلاک کیا جاچکا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: In the past twelve days, fifteen people accused of spying for America have been killed.
Input.seg8: واضح رہے کہ جنوبی اور شمالی وزیرستان میں گزشہ چھ سال کے دوران ایک سو سے زیادہ افراد کو جاسوسی کے الزام میں قتل کیا گیا ہے طالبان پر الزآم ہے کہ وہ اس قسم کے قتل کیسوں میں ملوث ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation8: During the past six years more than one hundred people accused of spying have been killed in North and South Waziristan. The Taliban has been accused of being involved in these types of murder cases.
Input.seg9: باراک اوبامہ گوانتانا موبے کی بدنام زمانہ جیل کو بند کرنے کے حکم نامے پر دستخط متوقع
Input.machine_translation9: Barack Obama's Signature Expected on Order to Shut Down Guantanamo Bay's Infamous Prison

Answer.translation1: Pakistan: Taliban have killed 6 people in the Pakistani tribal region of north Waziristan.
Answer.translation2: Mehr news agency reports from Reuters that two Afghan civilians and four Pakistanis were killed after having been accused of being spies, by the Taliban, in the Pakistani tribal region of North Waziristan.
Answer.translation3: According to reports the local people found four bullet ridden bodies in the Mir Ali province, at the Tahseel circle.
Answer.translation4: Two more bodies were found at central region Meeran Shah which were disposed of in a market area.
Answer.translation5: Near the bodies were letters written in Urdu, in which it was claimed that these people were spies.
Answer.translation10: Mehr news agency report sources to say that the American president will sign the order for closing down the most notorious Guatanamo Bay jail.
Answer.translation6: Two weeks ago, two Afghan natives were killed in the central region of North Waziristan, Meeran Shah, for having been spies.
Answer.translation7: In the last 12 days, 15 people were killed on the accusation of being spies for America.
Answer.translation8: It should be known that within the last 6 years, more than 100 people were killed on the accusation of spying, in south and north Waziristan. Taliban is accused of being involved in such cases.
Answer.translation9: It is expected that president Barack Obama will sign the order for closing down the most notorious Guatanamo Bay jail.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: نئے امریکی صدر باراک حسین اوبامہ نے اپنی انتخابی مہم کے وعدوں پر سطحی طور پرعمل درآمد شروع کردیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: The new American President Barack Hussein Obama has started to take steps toward fulfilling his campaign promises.
Input.seg2: اس سلسلے میں صدر اوبامہ نے عراق سے امریکی فوج کی واپسی کے لئے منصوبہ بنانے کی ہدایت کردی ہے ، جبکہ آج امریکی صدر گوانتانا موبے کی بدنام زمانہ جیل کو بند کرنے کے حکم نامے پر دستخط کرینگے۔
Input.machine_translation2: Along these lines, President Obama has instructed Iraq to make plans for the departure of American troops, while today the American President will sign the order for shutting down the infamous Guantanamo Bay prison.
Input.seg3: توقع کی جا رہی ہے کہ صدر باراک اوبامہ اس حکم پرممکنہ طور پر آج دستخط کرنے والے ہیں جس کے تحت گوانتامو کا قید خانہ ایک سال کے اندر اندر بند ہو جائے گا۔
Input.machine_translation3: It is expected that President Barack Obama may sign the order today under which Guantanamo's prison will close within one year.
Input.seg4: اس کے علاوہ وائٹ ہاؤس سے مشتبہ دہشت گردوں سے تفتیش کے طریقوں پر نظرِ ثانی اور قیدیوں سے بد کلامی پر پابندی کے احکامات بھی جاری ہونے کا امکان ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: In addition, orders are expected to be issued from the White House about revising interrogation techniques with terrorist suspects and there is a possibility of orders being issued against foul-mouthing prisoners.
Input.seg5: صدر باراک اوبامہ نے اپنی صدارت کے پہلے دن الیکشن کے وعدوں کو پورا کرنے پر کام شروع کر دیا اور سب سے پہلے اپنی حکومت کے عمل اور فعل کو شفاف بنانے کے اقدامات کئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: President Barack Obama started working on fulfilling his election promises on the first day of his presidency and has begun by taking steps toward making the procedures and actions of his government transparent.
Input.seg6: مبصرین کا کہنا ہے کہ امریکی صدر نے عالمی سطح پر امریکہ کی گرتی ہوئی ساکھ کو بچانے کی کوششیں شروع کردی ہیں لیکن انھیں اس میں کامیابی ملنا بہت مشکل ہے کیونکہ جب تک امریکہ اسرائیل کی خونخوار حکومت کی حمایت پر کمر بستہ ہے تب تک اس سے کسی اچھے کام کی توقع نہیں کی جاسکتی اگر امریکہ دنیا میں اپنی ساکھ کو بچانا چاہتا ہے تو اسے اسرائیل کی حامیت سے دست بردار ہوجانا چاہیے اور اس کے جرائم میں شریک نہیں ہونا چاہیے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Critics say that the American President has started to make efforts to save America's declining credibility on a global level, but it is very difficult for him to succeed because as long as America is prepared to support Israel's bloodthirsty government, it can't be expected to do any good. If America wants to save its credibility in the world, then it should desist from supporting Israel and being an accomplice in its crimes.
Input.seg7: ٹونی بلیئر اسلامی تنظیم حماس کو مذاکرات میں شامل کرنے کی ضرورت پر زور
Input.machine_translation7: Tony Blair: Emphasis on the Need to Include Islamic Organization Hamas in Negotiations
Input.seg8: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی برطانوی اخبار دی ٹائمز کے حوالے سے نقل کیا ہے کہ برطانیہ کےسابق وزیر اعظم ٹونی بلیئر نے مشرق وسطیٰ کے امن عمل میں حماس کو شامل کرنے کی ضرورت پر زور دیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Mehr News Agency has quoted from the British newspaper The Times that Britain's former Prime Minister Tony Blair has stressed the need to include Hamas in the Middle East peace process.
Input.seg9: اخبار کے مطابق ٹونی بلیئر نے کہا کہ یہ اہم ہے کہ ایک راستہ تلاش کیا جائے جس کے ذریعے حماس کو مشرقِ وسطیٰ کے امن عمل میں لایا جائے بلئر نے بش انظامیہ پر صرف محمود عباس سے بات کرنے اور حماس کو نظر انداز کرنے پر بھی شدید تنقید کی واضح رہے کہ مغربی ممالک نے حماس کی عوامی اور نظامی طاقت کو بھانپ کر اب اسے مذاکرات میں شامل کرنے کی بات کررہے ہیں جبکہ اس سے قبل وہ حماس کو ای دہشت گرد تنظیم سے تعبیر کرتے تھے ایسی دہشت گرد تنظیم جو اپنے وطن کا دفاع کررہی ہے اپنے گھر کو دوسروں کے قبضہ سے آزاد کرانے کی جد و جہد کررہی ہے جس کے گھر و وطن پر اسرائیل جیسی غاصب حکومت نے ساٹھ برسوں سے قبضہ جما رکھا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: According to the newspaper, Tony Blair said that it is important to find a way to bring Hamas into the Middle East peace process. Blair also strongly criticized the Bush Administration for only talking with Mahmoud Abbas and ignoring Hamas. It should be noted that after estimating the popular support and military strength of Hamas, Western countries are now talking of including it in negotiations, whereas previously they understood Hamas to be a terrorist organization, one that is defending its homeland and striving to free its home from occupation by others, one whose home and homeland a usurper government like Israel has been occupying for sixty years.
Input.seg10: کراچی میں بلوچستان کے تاجروں کا قتل، کوئٹہ میں مکمل ہڑتال
Input.machine_translation10: Murder of Balochistan Businessmen in Karachi, Strike in Quetta
Answer.browserInfo: Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 5.1; U; en) Presto/2.2.15 Version/10.10
Answer.translation1: The new American president Barak Hussain Obana started acting upon his electing aim at low standerd.
Answer.translation2: About it he directed a plan to American force to come back from Iraq although today the American president will sign at the order to close the bad named jail Gwantana.
Answer.translation3: It is expected that The President Obama is to sign at this order today according to that the jail of Gwanta will be closed at least in one year.
Answer.translation4: With this the second watching on inspection ways for doubtful terrorists and also it is expected that rough talking with prisoners is stopped.
Answer.translation5: The president Obama started to fulfill his promises at election day first of all he will make his government clear in saying and doing.
Answer.translation10: The murder of merchants in Karachi, Total strike in Koeta
Answer.translation6: It is the saying of soothsayers that the American president started to save the falling goodwill of America at world level but his success is difficult due to helping blooding govt. of Israel therefor any good deed is not expected in this helping and if America want to save his goodwill then it should stop helping Israel and must not participate in the criminals of Israel.
Answer.translation7: Tone Blayer:There is compulsory need to participate Islamic organization in dialogs.
Answer.translation8: It is narrated by a expert news report Britan agency The Times that the previous prime minister of U.K. Toni Blayer stressed at participating the Hammas in the peace of Middle East.
Answer.translation9: According to the newspaper Tone Blayer said that the way should be searched to participate Hammas in the peace of Middle East.Blayer criticized at ignoring Hammas and talking with Mahmood Abbas only.It should be known also that the Western countries want to talk with Hammas after knowing his power although before it they told Hmmmas as a terrorist organization which is defending his country and struggling to freeing his home from others although Israel has illegal hand on the houses and the country of Falastin.

Input.seg3: توقع کی جا رہی ہے کہ صدر باراک اوبامہ اس حکم پرممکنہ طور پر آج دستخط کرنے والے ہیں جس کے تحت گوانتامو کا قید خانہ ایک سال کے اندر اندر بند ہو جائے گا۔
Input.machine_translation3: It is expected that President Barack Obama may sign the order today under which Guantanamo's prison will close within one year.
Input.seg4: اس کے علاوہ وائٹ ہاؤس سے مشتبہ دہشت گردوں سے تفتیش کے طریقوں پر نظرِ ثانی اور قیدیوں سے بد کلامی پر پابندی کے احکامات بھی جاری ہونے کا امکان ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: In addition, orders are expected to be issued from the White House about revising interrogation techniques with terrorist suspects and there is a possibility of orders being issued against foul-mouthing prisoners.
Input.seg5: صدر باراک اوبامہ نے اپنی صدارت کے پہلے دن الیکشن کے وعدوں کو پورا کرنے پر کام شروع کر دیا اور سب سے پہلے اپنی حکومت کے عمل اور فعل کو شفاف بنانے کے اقدامات کئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: President Barack Obama started working on fulfilling his election promises on the first day of his presidency and has begun by taking steps toward making the procedures and actions of his government transparent.
Input.seg6: مبصرین کا کہنا ہے کہ امریکی صدر نے عالمی سطح پر امریکہ کی گرتی ہوئی ساکھ کو بچانے کی کوششیں شروع کردی ہیں لیکن انھیں اس میں کامیابی ملنا بہت مشکل ہے کیونکہ جب تک امریکہ اسرائیل کی خونخوار حکومت کی حمایت پر کمر بستہ ہے تب تک اس سے کسی اچھے کام کی توقع نہیں کی جاسکتی اگر امریکہ دنیا میں اپنی ساکھ کو بچانا چاہتا ہے تو اسے اسرائیل کی حامیت سے دست بردار ہوجانا چاہیے اور اس کے جرائم میں شریک نہیں ہونا چاہیے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Critics say that the American President has started to make efforts to save America's declining credibility on a global level, but it is very difficult for him to succeed because as long as America is prepared to support Israel's bloodthirsty government, it can't be expected to do any good. If America wants to save its credibility in the world, then it should desist from supporting Israel and being an accomplice in its crimes.
Input.seg7: ٹونی بلیئر اسلامی تنظیم حماس کو مذاکرات میں شامل کرنے کی ضرورت پر زور
Input.machine_translation7: Tony Blair: Emphasis on the Need to Include Islamic Organization Hamas in Negotiations
Input.seg8: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی برطانوی اخبار دی ٹائمز کے حوالے سے نقل کیا ہے کہ برطانیہ کےسابق وزیر اعظم ٹونی بلیئر نے مشرق وسطیٰ کے امن عمل میں حماس کو شامل کرنے کی ضرورت پر زور دیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Mehr News Agency has quoted from the British newspaper The Times that Britain's former Prime Minister Tony Blair has stressed the need to include Hamas in the Middle East peace process.
Input.seg9: اخبار کے مطابق ٹونی بلیئر نے کہا کہ یہ اہم ہے کہ ایک راستہ تلاش کیا جائے جس کے ذریعے حماس کو مشرقِ وسطیٰ کے امن عمل میں لایا جائے بلئر نے بش انظامیہ پر صرف محمود عباس سے بات کرنے اور حماس کو نظر انداز کرنے پر بھی شدید تنقید کی واضح رہے کہ مغربی ممالک نے حماس کی عوامی اور نظامی طاقت کو بھانپ کر اب اسے مذاکرات میں شامل کرنے کی بات کررہے ہیں جبکہ اس سے قبل وہ حماس کو ای دہشت گرد تنظیم سے تعبیر کرتے تھے ایسی دہشت گرد تنظیم جو اپنے وطن کا دفاع کررہی ہے اپنے گھر کو دوسروں کے قبضہ سے آزاد کرانے کی جد و جہد کررہی ہے جس کے گھر و وطن پر اسرائیل جیسی غاصب حکومت نے ساٹھ برسوں سے قبضہ جما رکھا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: According to the newspaper, Tony Blair said that it is important to find a way to bring Hamas into the Middle East peace process. Blair also strongly criticized the Bush Administration for only talking with Mahmoud Abbas and ignoring Hamas. It should be noted that after estimating the popular support and military strength of Hamas, Western countries are now talking of including it in negotiations, whereas previously they understood Hamas to be a terrorist organization, one that is defending its homeland and striving to free its home from occupation by others, one whose home and homeland a usurper government like Israel has been occupying for sixty years.
Input.seg10: کراچی میں بلوچستان کے تاجروں کا قتل، کوئٹہ میں مکمل ہڑتال
Input.machine_translation10: Murder of Balochistan Businessmen in Karachi, Strike in Quetta
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.1.8) Gecko/20100202 Firefox/3.5.8
Answer.translation1: Newly elected American President has started to implement his election manifesto at surface level
Answer.translation2: For this Obama has asked to plan the exit of American army from Iraq. Today Obama will signed the order to seize the Guantanamo Bay jail.
Answer.translation3: It is expected that after obama's approval Guantanamo Bay jail would be closed within a year.
Answer.translation4: It is expected that White house will review the investigative methods from suspected terrorists. Misbehavior with prisoners can also be banned.
Answer.translation5: Obama has started to implement his election manifesto on very first day of his tenure. He has taken many steps to make the governance transparent and functional.
Answer.translation10: Baloch businessmen killed in Karachi, a complete shutter down in Quetta.
Answer.translation6: Experts say that is daunting task for obama to restore the international image of US. To obtain its lost credibility, American has to review its pro-Israel policies.
Answer.translation7: Tony Blare expressed importance to engage Hamas in Dialogue.
Answer.translation8: While talking to 'Times', a UK based newspaper, Former UK primer minister said that Hamas's participation is must for peace in middle east.
Answer.translation9: According to the Newspaper, Tony is on the quest to find a right solution to bring peace in Middle East. He criticized the Bush Administration's attitude of negligence towards Hamas.  Western countries has realized the public and administrative power of Hamas. In past, Hamas was considered a Terroist organisation, a terrorist organisation which is struggling for the freedom of its homeland;immorally occupied by the Israel Govt.

Answer.translation1: The new American president, Barack Husain Obama started working on his campaign promises at the surface level.
Answer.translation2: In this regards, President Obama called for making a plan on calling the army back from Iraq, while the American president will sign an order today, to close the notorious Guatenamo Bay jail.
Answer.translation3: It is being expected that President Barack Obama will probably sign on the order today, through which the Guatenamo prison will be closed within one year.
Answer.translation4: Apart from this, the White House is expected to revise suspected terrorism investigation methods and ban ill treatment of prisoners during interrogation.
Answer.translation5: President Barack Obama started to fulfill his election campaign promises from his first day in office, and first of all started by taking steps towards making the actions and working of the government transparent.
Answer.translation10: Murder of Balochistan merchants in Karachi, Complete strike in Quetta
Answer.translation6: Experts say that the American president has started making efforts to save the falling image of America throughout the world, but that would be difficult for it, because as long as it will keep supporting the blood thirsty Israeli government, it can not be expected to do anything good. Therefore if America wants to save its image, it will have to stop its support of Israel and have to disassociate itself from Israel's crimes.
Answer.translation7: Tony Blair stresses upon the need to include Islamic organization, Hamas in the talks
Answer.translation8: Mehr news agency quoted from the Britain newspaper, The Times, that former Prime Minister Tony Blair stressed upon the need to include Hamas in the talks, to bring about peace in the Middle East.
Answer.translation9: According to the newspaper, Tony Blair said that it is important that a path be found for bringing Hamas into the Middle East peace process. Blair criticized the Bush administration for speaking only to Mahmood Abbas and ignoring Hamas. It should be clear that the western countries have realized the democratic and organizational powers of Hamas and are calling for bringing them into the talks, whereas previously they used to consider it a terrorist organization. A terrorist organization which is trying to defend its country and struggling to save its own house from the clutches of others. Whose house and country have been in the hand of the occupying Israeli government for 60 years.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: کراچی میں بلوچستان کے چار تاجروں کی ہلاکت کے خلاف جمعرات کو کوئٹہ اور بعض دوسرے علاقوں میں مکمل ہڑتال کی گئی۔
Input.machine_translation1: In protest against the murder of four Balochistan businessmen in Karachi, on Thursday there was a strike in Quetta and several other areas.
Input.seg2: اِس دوران تمام کاروباری مراکز بند رہے جب کہ ٹریفک بھی معمول سے کم تھا۔
Input.machine_translation2: Through its duration, all places of business remained closed, while traffic was also less than usual.
Input.seg3: احتجاجی ہڑتال کی اپیل انجمن ِ تاجران بلوچستان، پشتونخواہ ملی عوامی پارٹی اور جمعیت علمائے اسلام نے کی تھی، جِنہوں نے الزام لگایا کہ اِن تاجروں کو کراچی پولیس نے مبینہ فائرنگ سے اُس وقت ہلاک کر دیا جب وہ اپنی کار میں طارق روڈ پر اپنے گاڑیوں کے شوروم پہنچے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation3: The call for a protest strike was made by Anjuman-e-Tajiran Balochistan; Pashtoonkhwa Milli Awami Party; and Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam, who accused Karachi police of killing these businessmen by allegedly firing when they reached their car showroom on Tariq Road in their car.
Input.seg4: انجمنِ تاجران کے صدر عبد الرحیم کاکڑ نے مطالبہ کیا کہ واقع میں ملوث پولیس اہل کاروں کو گرفتار کرکے اُن کے خلاف کارروائی کی جائے۔
Input.machine_translation4: The president of Anjuman-e-Tajiran, Abdul Rahim Kakar, demanded that the police officers involved in the incident be arrested and action be taken against them.
Input.seg5: تاہم اِس واقعے کے بارے میں فوری طور پر کراچی پولیس کا موقف سامنے نہیں آیا۔
Input.machine_translation5: However, the position taken by Karachi police regarding this incident has not yet come forth.
Input.seg6: ہلاک ہونے والے چاروں تاجروں کا تعلق سرحدی شہر چمن سے تھا۔
Input.machine_translation6: All four murdered businessmen were from the border town of Chaman.
Input.seg7: ہڑتال کے موقعے پر حکومت کی جانب سے بڑے پیمانے پر سیکیورٹی کے انتظامات کیے گئے تھے اور شہر بھر میں اہم مقامات پر پولیس کے اہل کار تعینات تھے۔
Input.machine_translation7: On the occasion of the strike, there were widespread arrangements for security made by the government, and police officers were posted at important locations all over the city.
Input.seg8: اسرائیلی حملے میں حماس کا سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا
Input.machine_translation8: Hamas Senior Commander Killed in Israeli Attack
Input.seg9: اسرائیل کے ایک فضائى حملے میں حماس کا ایک سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا۔
Input.machine_translation9: One of the senior commanders of Hamas was killed in an aerial attack by Israel.
Input.seg10: یہ غزہ کی پٹی میں اسرائیل کے ایک ہفتے سے جاری حملوں میں حماس کی دوسری اہم شخصیت کی ہلاکت ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: This is the second important person to be killed in the Israeli attacks going on for one week now in the Gaza Strip.
Answer.browserInfo: Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 5.1; U; en) Presto/2.2.15 Version/10.10
Answer.translation1: There was strike in Karachi,Koeta and some other areas against the death of 4 merchants at Thursday.
Answer.translation2: During this all business centers were closed although the trafic was in low position.
Answer.translation3: The strike call was from Union merchants Balochan,Pashto Milli Public Party and Jmeiat ulmay Islam whom blamed Karachi police that they were the miss firing of the police when those porsons reached the van showroom.
Answer.translation4: The president of Merchant Union Abdurrahim Kakron showed his want that the disable police men should be taken action against them.
Answer.translation5: How ever the aim of Karachi police did not came in showing after this being.
Answer.translation10: It was the second main person of Hammas resulted by the attacks of Israel in the Line of Ghaza.
Answer.translation6: The dead persons belonged the frontier city Chaman.
Answer.translation7: On the time of strike many arrangements were under taken by government and there were police at main points.
Answer.translation8: The commander of Hammas was killed in Israelian attack.
Answer.translation9: A main person of Hammas was killed in a air attack by Israel.

Input.seg4: انجمنِ تاجران کے صدر عبد الرحیم کاکڑ نے مطالبہ کیا کہ واقع میں ملوث پولیس اہل کاروں کو گرفتار کرکے اُن کے خلاف کارروائی کی جائے۔
Input.machine_translation4: The president of Anjuman-e-Tajiran, Abdul Rahim Kakar, demanded that the police officers involved in the incident be arrested and action be taken against them.
Input.seg5: تاہم اِس واقعے کے بارے میں فوری طور پر کراچی پولیس کا موقف سامنے نہیں آیا۔
Input.machine_translation5: However, the position taken by Karachi police regarding this incident has not yet come forth.
Input.seg6: ہلاک ہونے والے چاروں تاجروں کا تعلق سرحدی شہر چمن سے تھا۔
Input.machine_translation6: All four murdered businessmen were from the border town of Chaman.
Input.seg7: ہڑتال کے موقعے پر حکومت کی جانب سے بڑے پیمانے پر سیکیورٹی کے انتظامات کیے گئے تھے اور شہر بھر میں اہم مقامات پر پولیس کے اہل کار تعینات تھے۔
Input.machine_translation7: On the occasion of the strike, there were widespread arrangements for security made by the government, and police officers were posted at important locations all over the city.
Input.seg8: اسرائیلی حملے میں حماس کا سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا
Input.machine_translation8: Hamas Senior Commander Killed in Israeli Attack
Input.seg9: اسرائیل کے ایک فضائى حملے میں حماس کا ایک سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا۔
Input.machine_translation9: One of the senior commanders of Hamas was killed in an aerial attack by Israel.
Input.seg10: یہ غزہ کی پٹی میں اسرائیل کے ایک ہفتے سے جاری حملوں میں حماس کی دوسری اہم شخصیت کی ہلاکت ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: This is the second important person to be killed in the Israeli attacks going on for one week now in the Gaza Strip.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Ant.com Toolbar 2.0 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Against the killing of the four traders of Baluchistan in Karachi, there was full strike on Thursday in Kwetta and other areas.
Answer.translation2: During this all the trading centers were kept closed where as the traffic was less than normal.
Answer.translation3: The Union of Baluchistan Traders, the Pashtunkhuwah Public Party and the Islamic Ulema Committee has appealed for the strike, who have charged that the Karachi Police opened firing on these traders at the time when they were driving their car reaching near their cars showroom on Tarriq Road.
Answer.translation4: The leader of Traders Union Abdul Rahim Kakkar asked to arrest the accused policemen of the incident and call an inquiry against them.
Answer.translation5: Unfortunately, regarding the incident the role of the Karachi police was not recalled immediately.
Answer.translation10: This was the second important personality of Hamas who got killed during the week long attacks of Israel on the lands of Ghaza.
Answer.translation6: The four traders who were killed belonged to the capital city Chaman.
Answer.translation7: During the strike on behalf of the government security arrangements were made at the biggest and the police were appointed on the main places of the whole city.
Answer.translation8: In the Israel attack the senior commander of Hamas got killed.
Answer.translation9: In the Israel air strike on of the senior commander of Hamas got killed.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: کراچی میں بلوچستان کے چار تاجروں کی ہلاکت کے خلاف جمعرات کو کوئٹہ اور بعض دوسرے علاقوں میں مکمل ہڑتال کی گئی۔
Input.machine_translation1: In protest against the murder of four Balochistan businessmen in Karachi, on Thursday there was a strike in Quetta and several other areas.
Input.seg2: اِس دوران تمام کاروباری مراکز بند رہے جب کہ ٹریفک بھی معمول سے کم تھا۔
Input.machine_translation2: Through its duration, all places of business remained closed, while traffic was also less than usual.

Input.machine_translation3: The call for a protest strike was made by Anjuman-e-Tajiran Balochistan; Pashtoonkhwa Milli Awami Party; and Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam, who accused Karachi police of killing these businessmen by allegedly firing when they reached their car showroom on Tariq Road in their car.
Input.seg4: انجمنِ تاجران کے صدر عبد الرحیم کاکڑ نے مطالبہ کیا کہ واقع میں ملوث پولیس اہل کاروں کو گرفتار کرکے اُن کے خلاف کارروائی کی جائے۔
Input.machine_translation4: The president of Anjuman-e-Tajiran, Abdul Rahim Kakar, demanded that the police officers involved in the incident be arrested and action be taken against them.
Input.seg5: تاہم اِس واقعے کے بارے میں فوری طور پر کراچی پولیس کا موقف سامنے نہیں آیا۔
Input.machine_translation5: However, the position taken by Karachi police regarding this incident has not yet come forth.

Input.machine_translation6: All four murdered businessmen were from the border town of Chaman.
Input.seg7: ہڑتال کے موقعے پر حکومت کی جانب سے بڑے پیمانے پر سیکیورٹی کے انتظامات کیے گئے تھے اور شہر بھر میں اہم مقامات پر پولیس کے اہل کار تعینات تھے۔
Input.machine_translation7: On the occasion of the strike, there were widespread arrangements for security made by the government, and police officers were posted at important locations all over the city.
Input.seg8: اسرائیلی حملے میں حماس کا سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا
Input.machine_translation8: Hamas Senior Commander Killed in Israeli Attack
Input.seg9: اسرائیل کے ایک فضائى حملے میں حماس کا ایک سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا۔
Input.machine_translation9: One of the senior commanders of Hamas was killed in an aerial attack by Israel.
Input.seg10: یہ غزہ کی پٹی میں اسرائیل کے ایک ہفتے سے جاری حملوں میں حماس کی دوسری اہم شخصیت کی ہلاکت ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: This is the second important person to be killed in the Israeli attacks going on for one week now in the Gaza Strip.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: Due to the death of four merchants from Balochistan in Karachi, a complete strike was in effect on Thursday against it, in Quetta and some other places.
Answer.translation2: In this period all business centers remained closed, whereas traffic was also less than normal.
Answer.translation3: The protesting strike was called by the 'Anjuman Tajiran Balochistan' (Balochistan Trade Union), Pushtunkhwah Milli Awami Party and the Jamiat-e-Ulama-e-Islam. They accused the Karachi police of having openly fired at these merchants, when they were going by car to their vehicle showroom on Tariq road.
Answer.translation4: The president of the Anjuman Tajiran, Abdur Raheem Kakad demanded that the guilty police agents should be arrested and action should be taken against them.
Answer.translation5: However, the stand of the Karachi police about this incident was not immediately clear.
Answer.translation10: This is the second death of an important Hamas figure, in the week long Israeli attacks on the Gaza belt.
Answer.translation6: All four of the dead merchants were from the border city of Chaman.
Answer.translation7: A large amount of security was provided by the government during the strike, and police officers were posted throughout the city, at important locations.
Answer.translation8: A senior commander of Hamas was killed in Israeli attack.
Answer.translation9: In an air attack by Israel, a senior Hamas commander was killed.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: حماس کے عہدے داروں نے کہا ہے کہ ابو زکریا الجمال ہفتے کے روز غزہ سٹی کے مشرق میں واقع الشجاعیہ محلے میں ہلاک ہوگئے۔
Input.machine_translation1: Hamas officials have said that Abu Zakaria al-Jamal died Saturday in the Al-Shujai'ya neighborhood located in the eastern part of Gaza City.
Input.seg2: اسرائیل کے ایک اور فضائى حملے میں جمعرات کے روز حماس کے عالم نزار راعیّان ہلاک ہو گئے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation2: Hamas religious scholar Nazar Rayan had been killed in another aerial attack by Israel on Thursday.
Input.seg3: شام میں مقیم حماس کے جلا وطن لیڈر خالد مشعل انتقام لینے کا عزم ظاہر کیا ہے اور غزہ پر زمینی حملے کے خلاف اسرائیل کو خبردار کیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: Khaled Meshaal, exiled Hamas leader residing in Syria, has expressed the determination to take revenge and has warned Israel against making a land attack on Gaza.
Input.seg4: غزہ کی سرحد پر اسرائیل کے ہزاروں فوجی اور ٹینک تعینات ہیں اور وہ فوج کشی کے احکامات کا انتظار کررہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation4: Thousands of Israeli soldiers and tanks are posted at the border of Gaza and are waiting for attack orders.
Input.seg5: امریکہ نے فائر بندی کی اپیل کی ہے۔ لیکن کہا ہے کہ غزہ پر فوج کشی کرنے یا نہ کرنے کے فیصلے کا انحصار اسرائیل پر ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: America has appealed for a cease-fire, but has said that the decision to invade Gaza or not depends on Israel.
Input.seg6: امریکی صدر جارج بُش نے ریڈیو پر اپنی ہفتہ وار تقریر میں حماس پر تشدد بھڑکانے کے لیے اشتعال انگیزی کا الزام عائد کیا اور اسرائیل پر اُس کے راکٹوں کے حملوں کو دہشت گردی قرار دیا۔
Input.machine_translation6: In his weekly speech on the radio American President George Bush accused Hamas of provoking violence and declared its rocket attacks on Israel as terrorism.
Input.seg7: انہوں نے کہا ہے کہ امریکہ فائر بندی کے لیے کام کررہا ہے، لیکن کوئى یک طرفہ سمجھوتا قابلِ قبول نہیں ہوگا۔
Input.machine_translation7: He said that America is working towards a cease-fire, but a one-sided commitment will not be acceptable.
Input.seg8: شمالی وزیرستان میں تین لاشیں برآمد
Input.machine_translation8: Three Dead Bodies Found in North Waziristan
Input.seg9: پاکستانی سیکیورٹی کے عہدے داروں نے کہا ہے کہ شمالی وزیرستان کے قبائلی علاقے میں تین آدمیوں کی لاشیں ملی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: Pakistani security officials have announced that the dead bodies of three men were found in the tribal area of North Waziristan.
Input.seg10: شبہ ہے کہ انھیں طالبان نے سزائے موت دے کے ہلاک کیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: It is suspected that the Taliban gave them the death penalty and killed them.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.18) Gecko/2010020220 Firefox/3.0.18 GTB6
Answer.translation1: Officials of Hammas have said that Abu Zakaria Al Jamal was killed on Saturday in his palace located in North of Gaza city.
Answer.translation2: Scholar Nazar Rayyan of Hammas was killed  in another aerial attack by Israel on Thursday.
Answer.translation3: Residing in Rome, Hammas's exiled leader Khalid Mashal has expressed taking revenge and threatened Israel with a ground attack.
Answer.translation4: There are thousands of soldiers and tanks of Israel placed on the border of Gaza and they are waiting for fighting orders.
Answer.translation5: America has appealed for a cease fire. But has said that decision of fighting on Gaza is based on Israel.
Answer.translation10: There is doubt that Taliban have killed them by giving them death sentence.
Answer.translation6: American President George Bush, on his weekly radio speech, has accused Hammas of excitation to aggravate violence. And has adjudged their rocket attacks on Israel as terrorism.
Answer.translation7: He has said that America is working on cease fire. But one-way agreement will not be accepted.
Answer.translation8: Three dead bodies found in the Northern Waziristan.
Answer.translation9: Pakistani security officials have said that three dead bodies are found in the tribal areas of Northern Waziristan.

Answer.translation1: The office bearer of Hamas has said that Abu Zakaria Al Jamal died on Saturday in the Al Shujahia street, located in the east of Gaza City.
Answer.translation2: In another air attack on Thursday,the scholar of Hamas Alam Nazar Rehan was also killed.
Answer.translation3: The Hamas expatriate leader living in Syria Khalid Mashal has shown his will to take revenge and warned Israel against ground attack.
Answer.translation4: Thousands of Israeli soldiers and tanks are located at Gaza Border and they are waiting for the orders to attack.
Answer.translation5: The Americans have appealed for the cease fire but they have said that the decision to attack Gaza or not will be taken by Israel.
Answer.translation10: There is a doubt that Taliban has killed them by giving them death sentences.

Answer.translation7: He has said that America is working for the cease fire but any one sided pact will not be acceptable.
Answer.translation8: Three dead bodies recovered in North Waziristan
Answer.translation9: The officials of Pakistani security forces has said that  dead bodies three men have been recovered from the tribal area of North Waziristan

Input.machine_translation9: Pakistani security officials have announced that the dead bodies of three men were found in the tribal area of North Waziristan.
Input.seg10: شبہ ہے کہ انھیں طالبان نے سزائے موت دے کے ہلاک کیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: It is suspected that the Taliban gave them the death penalty and killed them.

Answer.translation1: Hamas officeholders said that Abu Zakariyya AlJamaal was killed in Shujaaiyah palace in the east of Gaza city, on Saturday.
Answer.translation2: In another air attack by Israel, on Thursday, Aalam Nazar Ra'iyan was killed.
Answer.translation3: Hamas's evacuated leader, who stays in Syria, Khalid Mushil has promised to take revenge and warned Israel of launching a land attack on Gaza.
Answer.translation4: Thousands of Israeli tanks and soldiers are posted at the Gaza border, and they are waiting for orders to attack.
Answer.translation5: America has called for a ceasefire, but said that it is up to Israel, whether to attack Gaza or not.

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: یہ لاشیں شمالی وزیرستان کے مرکزی شہر میران شاہ کے قریب ملی ہیں اور ان کے ساتھ ایسے رُقعے ملے ہیں جن میں ان آدمیوں پر امریکہ کے لیے جاسوسی کرنے کا الزام لگایا گیا ہے۔

Input.machine_translation2: Authorities said that one of the dead bodies is probably that of a local man who had been kidnapped last week.
Input.seg3: انہوں نے کہا ہےکہ گولیوں سے چھلنی باقی دو لاشیں افغان باشندوں کی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: They said that the other two bullet-ridden dead bodies are of Afghan natives.
Input.seg4: غزہ میں مسلسل دسویں روز اسرائیلی حملے جاری
Input.machine_translation4: Tenth Day of Continuous Israeli Attacks in Gaza
Input.seg5: اسرائیلی میزائل کے حملے میں زخمی ہونے والا فلسطینی بچہ اسرائیل کی برّی فوج غزہ کی پٹی کے پورے علاقے میں حماس کے لشکریوں کے خلاف لڑرہی ہیں جبکہ اسرائیلی فضائیہ نے مسلسل دسویں روزعلاقے میں عسکریت پسند عناصر کے مشتبہ ٹھکانوں پر حملے جاری رکھے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Palestinian child wounded in Israeli missile attacks. Israel's army is fighting against Hamas soldiers all along the Gaza Strip, while the Israeli air force has been attacking suspected hideouts of militants continuously for ten days.
Input.seg6: اسرائىلی وزیرِ دفاع ایہود بار ک نے پیر کے روز کہا ہے کہ فوجی کارروائى اُس وقت تک جاری رہے گی جب تک جنوبی اسرائیل کے لوگ حماس کے راکٹوں کے حملوں سے محفوظ نہ ہو جائیں۔
Input.machine_translation6: Israeli Defense Minister Ehud Barak said on Monday that army activities will continue until the people of southern Israel are safe from Hamas's rocket attacks.
Input.seg7: تاہم اسرائیل کے حملوں کے باوجود حماس کی جانب سے راکٹوں کی وہ فائرنگ جاری ہے جس سے اسرائیل میں تین عام شہریوں سمیت چار افراد ہلاک ہوئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: However, in spite of Israel's attacks, Hamas continues to fire rockets, due to which four people along with three civilians have been killed in Israel.
Input.seg8: حماس کے لیڈر محمود ظُہر نے پیر کے روز اپنے ساتھیوں پر زور دیا ہے کہ وہ اسرائیلی فوجوں کو کچل دیں اور عام اسرائیلی شہریوں کو نشانہ بنائیں۔
Input.machine_translation8: On Monday, Hamas's leader Mahmoud Zahar urged his comrades that they should crush Israeli forces and target Israeli civilians.
Input.seg9: لیکن حماس کے ایک عہدے دار نے کہا ہے کہ اُن کی تنظیم تشدد کی تازہ ترین صورتِ حال پر غور کرنے کے لیے پیر کے دن ایک وفد مصر بھیجنے کا ارادہ رکھتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: However, one Hamas official has said that their organization plans to send a delegation to Egypt on Monday to focus on the most recent violence.
Input.seg10: غزہ میں ایک زخمی فلسطینی عورت غزہ میں طبی ذرائع نے کہا ہے کہ پچھلے دس دنوں میں تقریباً530 افراد مارے جا چکے ہیں، اور اُن میں پیر کے روز ہلاک ہونے والے وہ 11عام شہری بھی شامل ہیں جن میں کم سے کم پانچ بچّے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Wounded Palestinian woman in Gaza. Medical sources in Gaza have said that in the last ten days approximately 530 people have been killed, including the 11 civilians killed on Monday that included at least five children.

Answer.translation5:
A Palestinian child injured in the Israel missile attack. 
Israel ground army is fighting with the troops of Hammas in the entire area of Gaza strip where as Israeli aerial army continued attacks on the area's of militant groups on the 10th day.

Answer.translation9: But one official of Hammas said that they plan to send a delegation to Egypt on Monday to think about the current violent situation of their party.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: جوزف بائیڈن کو ہلال پاکستان نوازا گیا
Input.machine_translation1: Joseph Biden was awarded the Hilal-e-Pakistan.
Input.seg2: اسلام آباد پہنچنے کے بعد جوزف بائیڈن نے صدر آصف علی زرداری سے ملاقات کی۔
Input.machine_translation2: After reaching Islamabad Joseph Biden met with President Asif Ali Zardari.
Input.seg3: ملاقات میں صدر نے انہیں پاکستان اور امریکہ کے درمیان قریبی تعلقات قائم کرنے میں ان کے کردار پر ہلال پاکستان کے اعزاز سے نوازا۔
Input.machine_translation3: In the meeting the President awarded him the honor of the Hilal-e-Pakistan for his role in establishing a close relationship between Pakistan and America.
Input.seg4: واضح رہے کہ جوزف بائیڈن نے گذشتہ سال امریکی سینٹ کی خارجہ تعلقات کمیٹی کے چیئرمین کی حیثیت سے سینیٹر رچرڈلوگر کے ساتھ مل کر ایک بل متعارف کرایا تھا جس میں پاکستان کے لیے آئندہ پانچ سالوں کے دوران امریکہ کی غیر فوجی امداد میں تین گنا اضافہ کرکے 7. 5ارب ڈالر کرنے کی سفارش کی گئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: Last year Joseph Biden, as the American Senate's Foreign Relations Committee Chairman, along with Senator Richard Lugar, had introduced a new bill in which it was recommended that during the next five years America's non-military aid for Pakistan be tripled to 5.7 billion dollars.
Input.seg5: سابق صدر پرویز مشرف کی ’وردی اُتروانے ‘میں جوبائیڈن نے اہم کردار ادا کیا،وزیراعظم گیلانی
Input.machine_translation5: Joe Biden Played an Important Role in Former President Pervez Musharraf's "Removal of Uniform": Prime Minister Gilani
Input.seg6: یوسف رضا گیلانی اور جو بائیڈن (فائل فوٹو
Input.machine_translation6: Yousaf Raza Gilani and Joe Biden (file photo
Input.seg7: وزیراعظم یوسف رضا گیلانی نے کہا ہے کہ امریکہ کے منتخب نائب صدر جو بائیڈن نے سابق صدر پرویز مشرف کی وردی اُتروانے  ’فوج کے سربراہ کا عہدہ چھوڑنے‘ میں اہم کردار ادا کیا ہے اور پاکستا ن میں جمہوریت کے لیے بھی جوبائیڈن نے خاصی مدد کی
Input.machine_translation7: Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gilani has said that America's Vice President-elect Joe Biden played an important role in ex-President Pervez Musharraf's removal of uniform and withdrawal from his position as Army Chief and Joe Biden helped greatly in the cause of democracy for Pakistan as well.
Input.seg8: ۔ یوسف رضا گیلانی نے یہ بیان کراچی شپ یارڈ پر صحافیوں سے بات چیت کرتے ہوئے دیا۔
Input.machine_translation8: Yousaf Raza Gilani made this statement at the Karachi Shipyard when talking with reporters.
Input.seg9: اُنھوں نے کہا کہ جو بائیڈن "Pro - Pakistan" یا پاکستان کے حامی رہنما ہیں اور اُنھوں نے بطور امریکی سینٹ کی خارجہ امُور کمیٹی کے چیئرمین کے پاکستان کے لیے 15ارب ڈالر کی امداد دینے کا بل پیش کیا۔
Input.machine_translation9: He said that Joe Biden is a "Pro-Pakistan" leader, supportive of Pakistan, and as Chairman of the American Senate's Foreign Affairs Committee he presented a bill to give 15 billion dollars in aid to Pakistan.
Input.seg10: پاکستانی حدود میں امریکی جاسوس طیاروں سے کیے جانے والے میزائل حملوں کی ایک بار پھر مذمت کرتے ہوئے وزیراعظم پاکستان نے کہا ایسے حملوں کی اجازت دینے کے بارےمیں اُن کا امریکی حکومت کے ساتھ کسی طرح کا معاہدہ نہیں ہے اور اُن کے بقو ل کیو نکہ یہ پاکستان کی خود مختاری کا معاملہ ہے اس لیے وہ ملکی حدود میں ایسے حملوں کی اجازت کسی طور نہیں دے سکتے
Input.machine_translation10: Again condemning the missile attacks by American spy planes within Pakistani borders, the Prime Minister of Pakistan said that he does not have any kind of agreement with the American government to give permission for these type of attacks and according to him, because this is a matter of Pakistan's sovereignty, he cannot permit such attacks within national borders under any circumstances.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.18) Gecko/2010020220 Firefox/3.0.18 GTB6
Answer.translation1: Joseph Biden was awarded Hilal-e-Pakistan.
Answer.translation2: After arriving in Islamabad, Joseph Biden met with President Asif Ali Zardari.
Answer.translation3: During the meeting the president presented him with Hilal-e-Pakistan on playing an important role in forming close relations between Pakistan and America.
Answer.translation4: Please have it cleared that last year Joseph Biden, together with Senator Richard Lugar, introduced a Bill as a chairman of Foreign Affair committee, favoring the increase in  America's foreign army provision to Pakistan in the coming 5 years by 3% to a total of 5.7 billion dollars.
Answer.translation5: Joe Biden played an important role in removing the previous president Parvez Musharaf, Prime Minister Gilani
Answer.translation10: On protesting against missile attacks done by American investigating jets, Prime Minister Pakistan said that Pakistan has no agreement with American government on permitting such attacks and according to him, this is a matter of Pakistan's despotism therefore they can not permit attacks of these kind on any condition in the country's premises.
Answer.translation6: Yusuf Raza Gilani and Joe Biden ( File Photo)
Answer.translation7: Prime Minister Yusuf Raza Gilani has stated that America's Vice President candidate Joe Biden has played an important role in making Parvez Musharaf leave as Army Chief of Staff. And Joe Biden has also helped a lot for democracy in Pakistan.
Answer.translation8: Yusuf Raza Gilani made this statement during a talk with the press in Shipyard, Karachi.
Answer.translation9: He said that Joe Biden is Pro-Pakistan or supports Pakistan. And he, as a chairperson of Foreign Affair Committee of American Senate, presented a bill of 15 billion dollars aid for Pakistan.

Input.seg10: پاکستانی حدود میں امریکی جاسوس طیاروں سے کیے جانے والے میزائل حملوں کی ایک بار پھر مذمت کرتے ہوئے وزیراعظم پاکستان نے کہا ایسے حملوں کی اجازت دینے کے بارےمیں اُن کا امریکی حکومت کے ساتھ کسی طرح کا معاہدہ نہیں ہے اور اُن کے بقو ل کیو نکہ یہ پاکستان کی خود مختاری کا معاملہ ہے اس لیے وہ ملکی حدود میں ایسے حملوں کی اجازت کسی طور نہیں دے سکتے
Input.machine_translation10: Again condemning the missile attacks by American spy planes within Pakistani borders, the Prime Minister of Pakistan said that he does not have any kind of agreement with the American government to give permission for these type of attacks and according to him, because this is a matter of Pakistan's sovereignty, he cannot permit such attacks within national borders under any circumstances.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: Joseph Biden was awarded with Hilal a Imtiaz..
Answer.translation2: After reaching In Islamabad Joseph biden met with president Asif zardari
Answer.translation3: In the meeting he was awarded with Hila a Imtiaz by president Zardari.. He played an important role to build up friendly relations  between America and Pakistan .
Answer.translation4: It should be known that Joe byden was the head of the foreign relation committee, in which he with the help of Senator Richard logar introduced a bill in which they have requested America that the defense aid of Pakistan should be increased to 5.7 billions in the next 5 years.
Answer.translation5: He played a major role to ask former president Perveiz Musharaf for the removal of his uniform
Answer.translation10: Once again we condemned the deadly missile attack by the American spy plane in Pakistani territory. the prime minister said ,there is no treaty with America in which we have authorized them for these kind of attacks .according to the prime minister this is the matter of Pakistan’s integrity .how can we allow them for these kind of attacks in our territory .
Answer.translation6: yousaf raza and joeseph biden file photo.
Answer.translation7: The prime minister stated that American Elected vice president played an important role for the removal of  Perveiz musharaf’s uniform and to change his mind as the head of army chief .Joe biden also had helped Pakistan for the restoration of democracy .
Answer.translation8: Yousaf raza Gillani gave this statement while addressing the news reporters in  Karachi ship yard
Answer.translation9: He said  that Joe byden is a pro Pakistani or he is the friend of Pakistan . As the chairman of foreign committee he introduced 15 billion dollars aid bill for Pakistan

Input.seg1: جوزف بائیڈن کو ہلال پاکستان نوازا گیا
Input.machine_translation1: Joseph Biden was awarded the Hilal-e-Pakistan.
Input.seg2: اسلام آباد پہنچنے کے بعد جوزف بائیڈن نے صدر آصف علی زرداری سے ملاقات کی۔
Input.machine_translation2: After reaching Islamabad Joseph Biden met with President Asif Ali Zardari.
Input.seg3: ملاقات میں صدر نے انہیں پاکستان اور امریکہ کے درمیان قریبی تعلقات قائم کرنے میں ان کے کردار پر ہلال پاکستان کے اعزاز سے نوازا۔
Input.machine_translation3: In the meeting the President awarded him the honor of the Hilal-e-Pakistan for his role in establishing a close relationship between Pakistan and America.
Input.seg4: واضح رہے کہ جوزف بائیڈن نے گذشتہ سال امریکی سینٹ کی خارجہ تعلقات کمیٹی کے چیئرمین کی حیثیت سے سینیٹر رچرڈلوگر کے ساتھ مل کر ایک بل متعارف کرایا تھا جس میں پاکستان کے لیے آئندہ پانچ سالوں کے دوران امریکہ کی غیر فوجی امداد میں تین گنا اضافہ کرکے 7. 5ارب ڈالر کرنے کی سفارش کی گئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: Last year Joseph Biden, as the American Senate's Foreign Relations Committee Chairman, along with Senator Richard Lugar, had introduced a new bill in which it was recommended that during the next five years America's non-military aid for Pakistan be tripled to 5.7 billion dollars.
Input.seg5: سابق صدر پرویز مشرف کی ’وردی اُتروانے ‘میں جوبائیڈن نے اہم کردار ادا کیا،وزیراعظم گیلانی
Input.machine_translation5: Joe Biden Played an Important Role in Former President Pervez Musharraf's "Removal of Uniform": Prime Minister Gilani

Input.seg8: ۔ یوسف رضا گیلانی نے یہ بیان کراچی شپ یارڈ پر صحافیوں سے بات چیت کرتے ہوئے دیا۔

Answer.translation1: Joseph Biden awarded the Pakistan Crescent
Answer.translation2: After reaching Islamabad, Joseph Biden met President Asif Ali Zardari
Answer.translation3: During their meeting, in recognition of his efforts in increasing ties between Pakistan and America, the President awarded him with the Pakistan Crescent.
Answer.translation4: It should be clear that Joseph Biden had introduced a bill along with Senator Richard Logger as the chairman of the Foreign Relations Committee of the American Senate, in which it was proposed that during the next five years there is a tripling in the amount of military aid given to Pakistan, making it 15.7 Billion Dollars.
Answer.translation5: Joe Biden played an important role in removing Musharraf's uniform, Prime Minister Geelani.

Answer.translation8: Yusuf Raza Geelani gave this statement, speaking to journalists in the Karachi shipyard.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: اُنھوں نے اس اُمید کا اظہار بھی کیا کہ امریکہ میں نئی حکومت کے برسراقتدار آنے کے بعد امریکہ کی پالیسی میں بھی تبدیلی آئے گی۔
Input.machine_translation1: He also expressed the hope that after the new government comes into power in America there will also be a change in America's policy.
Input.seg2: (فائل فوٹو)
Input.machine_translation2: (file photo)
Input.seg3: یوسف رضا گیلانی نے کہاکہ حکومت نے بڑی کامیابی سے دہشت گردوں کو عام قبائلی سے الگ کیا ہے لیکن جاسو س طیاروں سے کیے جانے والے میزائل حملے حکومتی کوششوں کے لیے نقصان دہ ثابت ہوتے ہیں اور دہشت گرد پھرمقامی قبائل سے مل جاتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: Yousaf Raza Gilani said that the government has very successfully separated terrorists from common tribal members, but the missile attacks by spy planes are harmful to the government's efforts, so terrorists again join with local tribes.
Input.seg4: اُنھوں نے کہا کہ بین الاقوامی برادری پاکستان کے اس موقف سے اتفاق کرتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: He said that the international community agrees with Pakistan on this issue.
Input.seg5: وزیراعظم نے مزید کہا کہ اگر کوئی قابل اعتماد شواہد دیئے جائیں تو پاکستان فورسز خود اپنے علاقوں میں کاروائی کریں گی۔
Input.machine_translation5: The Prime Minister also said that if any credible evidence is presented, then Pakistani forces will take action themselves in their own areas.
Input.seg6: ممبئی حملوں کے بارے میں وزیراعظم یوسف رضا گیلانی نے اپنا موقف دوہراتے ہوئے کہا کہ اگر بھارت شواہد فراہم کرے تو اُس کی بنیاد پر تفتیش کی جائے گی اور اگرکسی کے ملوث ہونے کے ثبوت ملے تو اُس کے خلاف ملکی قانون کے مطابق کاروائی کی جائے گی۔
Input.machine_translation6: Reiterating his stand about the Mumbai attacks, Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gilani said that if India provides evidence, then an investigation will be conducted on that basis, and if proof of anyone's involvement is found, then action will be taken against that person according to national law.
Input.seg7: رحمان ملک کے دورہ برطانیہ اوراُن کی ایم کیو ایم کے قائد الطاف حسین سے ملاقات کے بارے میں پوچھے گئے ایک سوال کے جواب میں وزیراعظم نے کہا رحمان ملک اُن کی اجازت سے لندن گئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: In answer to a question asked about Rehman Malik's tour of Britain and his meeting with MQM leader Altaf Hussain, the Prime Minister said that Rehman Malik went to London with his permission.
Input.seg8: کوئٹہ ،ڈی ایس پی سمیت چار پولیس اہلکار ہلاک
Input.machine_translation8: Quetta: DSP Killed with Four Police Officers
Input.seg9: فائل فوٹو
Input.machine_translation9: file photo
Input.seg10: کوئٹہ کی ایک اہم شاہراہ سریاب روڈ پر نامعلوم افراد کی فائرنگ سے ایک ڈی ایس پی ’ڈپٹی سپرینٹنڈنٹ پولیس ‘سمیت چار پولیس اہلکار ہوگئے۔
Input.machine_translation10: On Sariab Road, an important highway in Quetta, firing by unidentified assailants claimed the lives of one DSP (Deputy Superintendent of Police) and four police officers.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: he also expressed a hope that after the succession of the new American government, change will come to the American policy as well.
Answer.translation2: (File Photo)
Answer.translation3: Yusuf Raza Gilani has said that the government has successfully separated taliban from ordinary tribesmen but the drone attacks have proven to be very harmful to the efforts of the government and the terrorists once again join hands with the local tribes.
Answer.translation4: he said that the international community agrees to this stance of Pakistan.
Answer.translation5: Prime Minister added that if reliable evidence is provided, then the Pakistani Forces will operate itself in its own territory.
Answer.translation10: on an important highway of Quetta, Saryab road, firing by unknown people killed four policemen including DSP 'Deputy Superintendent of Police".
Answer.translation6: prime minister yusuf Raza Gilani repeated his stance over Mumbai attacks and said that if India provides evidence, then investigation will be carried out on its basis and if there is any proof of someone's involvement, he will be dealt according to the laws of the country.
Answer.translation7: while answering a question about Rehman Malik's tour to Britain and his meeting with the MQM leader Altaf Hussain, the Prime Minister said that Rehman Malik went to London on his approval.
Answer.translation8: Quetta, four policemen including DSP killed.
Answer.translation9: File Photo

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: بدھ کی صبح ایک جیپ میں سوار دو ڈی ایس پی ، ایک سب انسپکٹر اور دو کانسٹیبل پولیس ٹریننگ سینٹر کی طرف جارہے تھے کہ سریاب روڈ پر واقع ڈگری کالج کے قریب موٹر سائیکل پر سوار نامعلوم حملہ آوروں نے پولیس کی جیپ پر بلااشتعال فائرنگ شروع کر دی جس سے سب انسپکٹر مہدی اور کانسٹیبل صبغت اللہ اورنصراللہ موقع پر ہی ہلاک ہوگئے جب کہ ایک ڈی ایس پی حسن علی ہسپتال پہنچنے کے بعد دم توڑگئے۔
Input.machine_translation1: On Wednesday morning two DSPs, one Sub-inspector, and two Constables were riding in a jeep towards the Police Training Center when unidentified assailants on a motorcycle near Degree College on Sariab Road started firing without provocation on the jeep, as a result of which Sub-inspector Mehdi and Constables Sabghat Ullah and Nasar Ullah were killed on the spot while DSP Hassan Ali died after reaching the hospital.
Input.seg2: ہسپتال ذرائع کا کہنا ہے کہ شدید زخمی ہونے والے دوسرے ڈی ایس پی غلام محمدکی حالت بھی تشویشناک ہے اور اُنھیں سر اور گردن میں گولیاں لگی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: Hospital sources say that the badly wounded second DSP Ghulam Muhammad's condition is also critical and that bullets hit him in the head and neck.
Input.seg3: اس واقع کے بعد پولیس نے علاقے کو گھیرے میں لے لیا تاحال اس واقع کی ذمہ داری کسی نے قبول نہیں کی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: After this incident police surrounded the area; until now no one has claimed responsibility for the incident.
Input.seg4: امریکہ میں ایک اور بھارتی سافٹ ویئر انجنیئر کی ہلاکت
Input.machine_translation4: Another Indian Software Engineer Killed in America
Input.seg5: امریکہ میں آندھرا پردیش سے تعلق رکھنے والے ایک اور سافٹ ویئر انجبیئر کو نامعلوم حملہ آوروں نے گولی مار کر ہلاک کردیا۔
Input.machine_translation5: Unidentified assailants in America shot and killed another software engineer from Andhra Pradesh.
Input.seg6: سکندرآباد میں رہنے والے 26سالہ اکشے وِشال کو دو دن قبل ریاست آرکینسا  میں نامعلوم حملہ آورنے گولی ماردی۔ ہسپتال میں طبی امداد کے دوران وِشال  نے دم توڑ دیا۔
Input.machine_translation6: An unidentified assailant shot 26-year-old Akshay Vishal of Secunderabad two days ago in the state of Arkansas. Vishal died while being treated in the hospital.
Input.seg7: وہ ستیم کمپیوٹرز کا ملازم  تھا اور امریکہ میں فالکن جیٹ ایئرویز میں خدمات انجام دے رہا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation7: He was an employee of Esteem Computers and was performing services for Falcon Jet Airways in America.
Input.seg8: گذشتہ ایک سال میں آندھرا پردیش سے تعلق رکھنے والے سات  طالب علم امریکہ میں غیر سماجی عناصر کے ہاتھوں ہلاک ہوچکے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation8: In the past year seven students from Andhra Pradesh have been killed by anti-social elements in America.
Input.seg9: امریکہ میں اعلیٰ تعلیم اور ملازمت کے حصول کے لیے جانے والے طلبا کی بڑھتی ہوئی ہلاکتوں نے صوبے میں اُن ہزاروں خاندانوں میں تشویش پیدا کردی ہے جِن کے بچے امریکہ میں مقیم ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: The increasing number of deaths of students who have gone to America to obtain a higher education and employment has created anxiety for the thousands of families in the province whose children are living in America.
Input.seg10: واضح رہے کہ اعلیٰ تعلیم اور بہتر مستقبل کے لیے آندھرا پردیش میں امریکہ کو ترجیح دی جاتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: In Andhra Pradesh, America is preferred for pursuing a higher education and a better future.

Input.seg1: چنائی میں امریکی قونصلیٹ کے اعداد و شمار کے مطابق جنوبی بھارت سے امریکی ویزا کے لیے ہر سال ایک لاکھ دوخواستیں وصول ہوتی ہیں جِن میں سب سے زیادہ یعنی 40 فی صد آندھرا پردیش سے ہوتی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: According to statistics from the American Consulate in Chennai, every year 100,000 applications are received for American visas from South India, of which the most - 40 percent - come from Andhra Pradesh.
Input.seg2: اِسی دوران صوبائی حکومت نے مقتول کی لاش حیدرآباد لانے کی کوششیں شروع کر دی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: Meanwhile the provincial government has begun the efforts to bring the victim's body to Hyderabad.
Input.seg3: امریکہ دشمن کے حملوں کے خلاف چوکنّا رہے : بُش
Input.machine_translation3: America Should Remain Vigilant Against Enemy Attacks: Bush
Input.seg4: صدر جارج بُش ریڈیوپر اپنی آخری ہفتہ وار تقریر میں  امریکہ پر زور دیا ہے کہ وہ دشمن کے حملوں کے خلاف چوکنّا رہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: In his final weekly speech on the radio, President George Bush urged America to remain vigilant against enemy attacks.
Input.seg5: مسٹر بُش نے کہا کہ امریکیوں کے لیے ابھی تک سب سے بڑا خطرہ  دہشت گردوں کے کسی اور حملے کا امکان ہے۔ اور انہوں نے خبردار کیا کہ  ملک  کے دشمن صبر کے ساتھ انتظار کررہے ہیں اور وہ دوبارہ  وار کرنے پر تُلے ہوئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: Mr. Bush said that the biggest danger for Americans is still the possibility of another terrorist attack, and he warned that the country's enemies are waiting patiently and are determined to strike again.
Input.seg6: سُبک دوش ہونے والے صدر نے کہا  امریکہ کو لازماً کبھی  بھی اپنی حفاظت سے غافل نہیں ہونا چاہیئے۔
Input.machine_translation6: The outgoing President said that American must never neglect its safety.
Input.seg7: صدر بُش نے اگلے صدر بارک اوباما کے لیے بھی بہترین تمناؤں کا اظہار کیا، جو  منگل کے روز اپنے عہدے کاحلف اُٹھائیں گے۔
Input.machine_translation7: President Bush also expressed best wishes for the next President Barack Obama who will take the oath of office on Tuesday.
Input.seg8: نومنتخب صدر بارک اوباما نے ڈیموکریٹک پارٹی کی جانب  سے ہفتے کے ریڈیو پر اپنی تقریر  میں حلف برداری کی تقریب کی تاریخی اہمیت پر روشنی ڈالی۔
Input.machine_translation8: On behalf of the Democratic Party, President-elect Barack Obama shed light on the historical significance of the oath-taking ceremony in his radio speech on Saturday.
Input.seg9: انہوں نے کہا کہ  یہ تقریب ایک ایسی رسم ہے  جس کا ایک رہنما سے دوسرے رہنما کو اختیارات کی پُر امن منتقلی کی امریکی  عظمت کے ساتھ بہت گہرا تعلق ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: He said that this ceremony has a deep connection with the great American custom of transferring authority peacefully from one leader to the next.
Input.seg10: مسٹر اوباما  نے یاد دلایا کہ  دنیا بھر میں بہت سے لوگ یہ تصّور بھی نہیں کرسکتے کہ اُن کے رہنما خوں ریزی  یا کشمکش کے بغیر اختیارات سے دست بردار ہوجائیں گے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Mr. Obama reminded listeners that in the whole world there are many people who cannot even imagine that their leaders will relinquish power without bloodshed or struggle.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: According to the numbers and statistics in the American consulate in Chennai, a hundred thousand applications are received for visa every year, of which the most, i.e. 40%, is from Andhra Pradesh.
Answer.translation2: Meanwhile, the state government tried to bring the murdered person's body to Hyderabad.
Answer.translation3: Bush: America should be aware of the enemies attack.
Answer.translation4: In the last weekly speech of President Bush, over the radio, President George Bush warned America to remain wary of enemy attacks.
Answer.translation5: Mr. Bush said that the biggest threat for Americans is still the possibility of another attack by terrorists. He said that the enemies of the country are patiently waiting, and that they are bent on attacking again.
Answer.translation10: Mister Obama reminded that around the world, many people can not even imagine the succession of a leader without blood and turbulence.
Answer.translation6: The outgoing president said that America would definitely have to be aware of its safety at all times.
Answer.translation7: President Bush also expressed his best wishes for the new president, Barack Obama, who would be taking the oath of presidency on Tuesday.
Answer.translation8: Newly elected president Barack Obama, in the radio broadcast on behalf of the Democratic party, on Saturday, spoke on the historical importance of the oath taking ceremony.
Answer.translation9: He said that the oath taking was a custom by which the power is handed over to another leader peacefully has a deep connection with the American greatness.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: رائے ونڈ میں شریف برادران اور وفاقی وزیرِ داخلہ کی ملاقات، سیاسی و سیکیورٹی امور پر تبادلہٴ خیال
Input.machine_translation1: Sharif Brothers and Federal Interior Minister Meet in Raiwind, Exchange of Ideas on Political and Security Concerns
Input.seg2: حزبِ اختلاف کی سب سے بڑی اور پنجاب میں حکمراں جماعت ،پاکستان مسلم لیگ ن کے سربراہ نواز شریف اور وفاقی وزیرِ داخلہ رحمٰن ملک کے مابین اتوار کے روز رائے ونڈ میں ملاقات ہوئی جِس میں پنجاب کے وزیرِ اعلیٰ شہباز شریف بھی موجود تھے۔
Input.machine_translation2: On Sunday Nawaz Sharif, the leader of the opposition's largest and Punjab's governing party, Pakistan Muslim League N, met with Federal Interior Minister Rehman Malik in Raiwind. in which Punjab's Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif was also present.
Input.seg3: مقامی میڈیا کے مطابق رحمٰن ملک ممکنہ طور پر پاکستان پیپلز پارٹی کی قیادت کا کوئی اہم پیغام لے کر آئے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation3: According to local media, Rehman Malik may have brought some important message for the leadership of the Pakistan People's Party.
Input.seg4: تاہم، ملاقات کے بعد صحافیوں سے گفتگو میں اِس حوالے سے رحمٰن ملک نے کوئی تفصیل نہیں بتائی اور صرف اتنا کہا کہ سیاسی امور کے حوالے سے اُنھوں نے اتفاقِ رائے کی سیاست کی بات کی ہے، اور ممبئی حملوں کے بعد کی صورتِ حال پر پی ایم ایل ن کی قیادت کو بریفنگ دی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: However, after the meeting when talking with reporters, Rehman Malik did not give any details in relation to this, only saying that, with regard to political concerns, he has talked about the politics of agreement and has given a briefing to the leadership of PML-N on the situation after the Mumbai attacks.
Input.seg5: اُن کے الفاظ میں: ‘اب تک جتنی کارروائی ہوئی ہے اُس کے بارے میں معلومات فراہم کی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: In his words, "I have provided information about all that the action that has taken place up until now.
Input.seg6: نہ بھولیں کہ بڑی کارروائی پنجاب میں ہوئی ہے اور حکومتِ پنجاب نے کی ہے اور ابھی جو میں نے ٹیم تشکیل دی ہے اُس میں بھی پنجاب حکومت کی مدد کی ضرورت ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Don't forget that a great deal of activity has taken place in Punjab by the government, and right now the team that I have put together also needs the help of the Punjab government."
Input.seg7: رحمٰن ملک نے کہا کہ ہر روز میڈیا کو تو نہیں بتایا جاتا ،لیکن پی ایم ایل ن کی قیادت سے روزانہ پیغاموں کا تبادلہ ہوتا ہے۔ اُدھر، پاکستان مسلم لیگ ن کے ترجمان، پرویز رشید نے بھی گفتگو میں سیاسی امور کے حوالے سے کچھ بتانے سے گریز کیا اور محظ اتنا کہا کہ رحمٰن ملک صاحب نے جو بتانا تھا وہ بتا دیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: Rehman Malik said that, although the media is not informed daily, messages are exchanged every day with PML-N leadership. Pervez Rashid, the spokesperson of Pakistan Muslim League N, also refrained from saying anything in reference to political concerns during conversation, only saying that Mr. Rehman Malik has told all that needed to be told.
Input.seg8: واضح رہے کہ پاکستان مسلم لیگ ن کی قیادت سے مشیرِ داخلہ کی ملاقات ایسے وقت ہوئی ہے جب کہ صوبے کی گرما گرم سیاست میں حکومتِ پنجاب مخالف پی ایم ایل ق سے تعلق رکھنے والے 20سے زائد ناظمین نے گورنر پنجاب سلمان تاثیرکے ہمراہ پریس کانفرنس پی ایم ایل ن ،ناظمین کی طرف سے صوبائی حکومت کے اقدامات کی تنقید کو مسترد کرتے ہوئے پاکستان پیپلز پارٹی سے تعلق رکھنے والے گورنر پنجاب کی اِس معاملے میں شمولیت پر بھی اعتراض کرتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: This meeting of the Interior Advisor with the leadership of Pakistan Muslim League N has taken place at a time in the province's heated politics when more than twenty nazims who belong to PML-Q, the opposition to the Punjab government, held a press conference with Punjab's Governor Salman Taseer PML-N not only rejects a criticism made by these nazims of the actions of the provincial government but also objects to the Governor's involvement in the matter of the press conference, who has connections with the Pakistan People's Party.
Input.seg9: اوباما کی تقریر پاکستان کے لیے خوش آئند ہے: صدر زرداری
Input.machine_translation9: Obama's Speech Holds Bright Prospects for Pakistan: President Zardari
Input.seg10: پاکستانی صدر آصف علی زرداری نے امریکہ کے نئے صدر براک اوباما کے افتتاحی خطاب کا خیر مقدم کرتے ہوئے کہا ہے کہ اُن کی طرف سے مسلم دنیا کے ساتھ باہمی مفادات اور احترام کے تعلق کو آگے بڑھانے کی بات پاکستان اور اُس کے عوام کے لیے خوش آئند ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari, welcoming the inaugural speech of America's new President Barack Obama, has said that his remark about furthering a relationship with the Muslim world of mutual interests and respect holds bright prospects for Pakistan and its people.

Answer.translation1: Meeting of the Sherif brothers and the joint home minister in Raiwand; exchange of thoughts on political and security matters.
Answer.translation2: The biggest and ruling party of the deferring parties, Pakistan Muslim Leagues (n)'s leader Nawaz Sherif and Pakistan's home minister Rehman Malik met on Sunday in Raiwand in which meeting, Punjabi Chief Minister Shehbaz Sherif was also present.
Answer.translation3: According to the local media, Rehman Malik probably got an important message from the Pakistan Peoples Party leadership.
Answer.translation4: However, speaking to journalists after the meeting, Rehman Malik did not disclose anything of the nature and only said that they talked about agreement politics and that he briefed the PML(n) leadership about the conditions after the Mumbai attack.
Answer.translation5: In his words 'I let them know about the action taken so far'.
Answer.translation10: Pakistani president, Asif Ali Zardari welcomed the opening speech of the new President of America Barack Obama, saying that his statement that he would advance the relationship with the Muslim world, based on mutual interests and mutual respect, is a good news for Pakistan and it's public.
Answer.translation6: It should not be forgotten that a lot of action was taken by the Punjab government and that the team that I formed will need the help of the Punjab government.
Answer.translation7: Rehman Malik said that every day the media is not told, but PML (n) leadership is sent messages. Here the Pakistan Muslim League (n) spokesperson Pervez Rasheed also spoke, but avoided speaking about some political matters, and said that Rehman Malik has already said what needs to be told.
Answer.translation8: It should be known that Pakistan Muslim League (n)'s leadership met the Internal Advisor at a time when the state was in a state of hot political activity with 20 or more leaders belonging to the opposition party, PML (q), held a press conference with the Governor of Punjab, Salman Taseer, rejecting the steps of the government in the state and opposing the inclusion of the Governor of Punjab, who is from the Pakistan Peoples Party in this matter.
Answer.translation9: Obama's speech is glad tidings for Pakistan, President Zardari.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: بدھ کے روز جاری کردہ ایک بیان میں اُنھوں نے کہا کہ امریکی صدر کی طرف سے اعلیٰ نظریات اور اقدار کے عزم کا اعادہ دنیا بھر کے لوگوں کےلیے ایک بہتر مستقبل کی امید ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: In a statement issued on Wednesday he said that high ideals and the return to a commitment to values is the hope for a better future for people all around the world.
Input.seg2: بیان کے مطابق صدر زرداری نے کہا کہ امریکہ پر عالمی برادری کے ساتھ مل کر بلاشبہ اکیسویں صدی میں امن، ترقی اور خوش حالی کی نئی راہیں تلاش کرنے کی اہم ذمے داری عائد ہوتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: According to the statement President Zardari said that, without a doubt, America, together with the global community, is charged with the important responsibility of finding new ways for peace, progress, and prosperity in the twenty-first century.
Input.seg3: واضح رہے کہ صدر اوباما نے منگل کے روز اپنے عہدے کا حلف اُٹھانے کے بعد افتتاحی خطاب میں کہا تھا کہ امریکہ مسلم دنیا کے ساتھ نئی  پیش رفت چاہتا ہے جو باہمی مفادات اور باہمی احترام پر مبنی ہو۔
Input.machine_translation3: On Tuesday, after taking the oath of office, President Obama had said in his inaugural speech that America wants to make a fresh start with the Muslim world based on mutual interests and mutual respect.
Input.seg4: اُنھوں نے غریب ملکوں کے لوگوں کو یقین دلایا تھا کہ امریکہ اُن کے ساتھ مل کر کام کرے تاکہ وہاں سماجی ترقی ہو اور غربت میں کمی آئے۔

Input.seg1: مشرقِ وسطیٰ کے لیے جارج مچل کو منتخب کیا گیا ہے جو عرب اسرائیل امن مذاکرات میں جان ڈالنے کی کوشش کریں گے۔
Input.machine_translation1: George Mitchell has been selected for the Middle East to try to breathe life into Arab-Israeli peace talks.
Input.seg2: مچل سابق سینیٹر ہیں اور انھوں نے شمالی آئرلینڈ میں امن قائم کروانے میں کردار ادا کیا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation2: Mitchell is a former senator and played a role in establishing peace in Northern Ireland.
Input.seg3: آج سٹیٹ ڈیپارٹمنٹ میں بات چیت کرتے ہوئے مچل نے کہا کہ مشرقِ وسطیٰ کی صورتِ حال بہت ناپائیدار، پیچیدہ اور خطرناک ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: While talking in the State Department today, Mitchell said that the situation in the Middle East is very unstable, complex, and dangerous,
Input.seg4: لیکن اس کے باوجود امریکہ وہاں قیامِ امن کی کوششوں سے پیچھے نہیں ہٹے گا۔
Input.machine_translation4: but in spite of this America will not back down from efforts to establish peace there.
Input.seg5: افغانستان : ووٹر رجسٹریشن خطرے میں پڑ گئى
Input.machine_translation5: Afghanistan: Voter Registration in Jeopardy
Input.seg6: افغانستان کے الیکشن کمیشن نے کہا ہے کہ وہ سلامتی کے بارے میں تشویش کی وجہ سے جنوب کے کچھ علاقوں میں ووٹر رجسٹریشن میں تاخیر کررہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Afghanistan's Election Commission has said that due to safety concerns, they are delaying voter registration in some southern areas.
Input.seg7: جنوبی افغانستان میں عن قریب ہونے والے صدارتی انتخاب کے لیے ووٹر رجسٹریشن اس ہفتے شروع ہوئى تھی۔
Input.machine_translation7: Voter registration began this week for the upcoming presidential election in southern Afghanistan.
Input.seg8: لیکن کمیشن نے کہا ہے کہ جب تک سکیوریٹی کی صورتِ حال بہتر نہیں ہوگی، صوبہ ہلمند کے کچھ علاقوں میں ووٹر خود کو رجسٹر نہیں کرا سکیں گے۔
Input.machine_translation8: But the Commission has said that until the security situation better improves, voters will not be able to register themselves in some areas of Helmand Province.
Input.seg9: جنوب کے اُن علاقوں میں پچھلے سال سے تشدد میں اضافہ ہوگیا ہے، جہاں طالبان باغیوں نے افغان فوج اور بین الاقوامی فوجوں پر اپنے حملے بڑھا دیے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: Since last year there has been an increase in violence in these southern areas, where Taliban rebels have increased their attacks on the Afghan and international armies.
Input.seg10: اسی دوران ، افغان فوج اور بین الاقوامی فوجوں نے کہا ہے کہ اُنہوں نے بدھ اور جمعرات کی درمیانی رات افغانستان کے طول عرض میں جھڑپوں کے دوران کم سے کم 28جنگجوؤں کو ہلاک کردیا۔
Input.machine_translation10: Meanwhile, the Afghan and international armies have said that on the night between Wednesday and Thursday, they killed at least 28 militants during skirmishes all over Afghanistan.
Answer.comment: I enjoyed working on this HIT because this HIT was based on my native language Urdu. I love article writing and content writing. I would definitely like to complete more tasks like this.

Answer.translation4: But still, America will not stay back in the struggle to bring peace over there.

Answer.translation10: In the meanwhile, Afghan Forces and International Forces have said that in the middle night of Wednesday and Thursday, during the fire exchange held in whole Afghanistan, they have killed at least 28 militants.
