Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ممبئی حملوں کی کارروائی ميں نے ايسے ديکھی تھی جيسے ميرے اپنے گھر ميں يہ آگ لگی ہو کہ اِنسانوں کا دُکھ ديکھا نہيں جاتا اور کيا يہ دُکھ کِسی کو نظر نہيں آتا کاش مُسلمان ايک ہو کر سوچيں کُچھ
Input.machine_translation1: I watched the Mumbai attack operations as if my own house was on fire. It is not easy to watch human suffering and this suffering is not visible to anyone? I wish Muslims could unite, and then think.
Input.seg2: سڑک پر پڑی لاشيں، بے يارومددگار زخمی اور خون ميں ڈوبے معصوم چہرے مذمت کس طرح کريں کہ الفاظ نہيں مل رہے-
Input.machine_translation2: How to protest the corpses lying on the road, unattended injured, and innocent faces soaked in blood; cannot find words.
Input.seg3: مسلمانوں کی بے بسی پر رونا آرہا ہے کہ ايک طرف بھارت ميں لوگ مارے جاتے ہيں تو ساری دنيا پاکستان پر بنا ثبوت کے چڑھ دوڑتي ہے کہ کارروائی کرو ورنہ ہم کريں گے
Input.machine_translation3: Feel like crying over the helplessness of Muslims. On the one hand, whenever people are killed in India, the whole world starts blaming Pakistan without any proof, asking it to take action, otherwise they will take the initiative.
Input.seg4: اور دوسری طرف اسرائيل سرعام مسلمانوں کی نسل کشی کررہا ہے اور دنيا خاموش يہ ناقابل برداشت ہے
Input.machine_translation4: On the other, Israel is openly conducting genocide of the Muslims, and the world is silent. This is unbearable.
Input.seg5: -خدا کے پاس دير ہے اندھير نہيں اور جب يہ اندھير نگری ختم ہوگی تو۔
Input.machine_translation5: God acts on his own timetable, and when he does, to end this lawlessness-
Input.seg6: امريکہ کے ہوتے ہوئے اسرائيل کی سالميت کوخطرہ ايک مذاق ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: While America exists, a threat to Israel's existence should be considered a joke.
Input.seg7: رہی بات انتخابات کی تو بر سر اقتدار عوامی پذيرائی کے لیے اس طرح کی کارروائياں کريں اس ميں کوئی شک نہں خاص کر اسرائيل جيسی رياست باقی بارک اوبامہ کی بات تو تاريخ گواہ ہے آج تک کوئی امريکی حکمران پاليسی کے خلاف نہيں گيا اور نہ جائےگا سامراج گورا ہو يا کالا ہے وہ سامراج ہی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: As far as the elections are concerned, those in power will take such measures as to please the people, and without a doubt especially a state like Israel. As far as Barack Obama is concerned, history is a witness that no American president to date has gone against the ruling policy, and this will not even happen. An imperialist, whether black or white, is an imperialist.
Input.seg8: فورم ميں جاری بحث سے يہ واضح ہوتا ہے کہ بےنظير کی وفات کا دکھ ہر کسی کو ہے مگر بحیثيت سياستدان ان کی کوتاہيوں کو نظر انداز نہيں کيا گيا۔
Input.machine_translation8: The ongoing debate in the forum shows that everyone is sad about Benazir's demise. However, considering her as a politician, her failings have not been ignored.
Input.seg9: يہ بات بحث طلب ہے کہ بےنظير نے جمہوريت کی خاطر جان دی يا اقتدار کی خاطر۔
Input.machine_translation9: It is being debated whether Benazir gave away her life for democracy or to gain power.
Input.seg10: اگر جمہوريت عزيز تھی تو امريکی کليئرنس اور ڈيل ہونے تک کہ دس سال جمہور کو مشرف کی آمريت ميں کيوں چھوڑے رکھا؟
Input.machine_translation10: If democracy was dear to her, then why was she free for ten years until a deal was made to obtain American clearance under Musharraf's authoritarian rule?
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: I watched the progress of the Mumbai incident, as if my own house was on fire. The sorrow of humans can not be watched, and who can not see this sorrow? If only Muslims would think a bit, together.
Answer.translation2: How can words derogate the bodies strewn on the streets, helpless innocent faced people, injured and soaked in blood?
Answer.translation3: I feel like crying about the helplessness of Muslims, that on one side, people are dying in India, and the whole world is climbing onto Pakistan, without any proof and saying, take action or else we will.
Answer.translation4: And on the other side, Israel is ruthlessly killing Muslims and the whole world is silent. This is unbearable.
Answer.translation5: There is delay, but no darkness, with God. That too, when this darkness comes to pass.
Answer.translation10: If democracy was dearer, why did she leave the republic for ten years in the control of Musharraf, waiting for American clearance and deal?
Answer.translation6: Danger to Israel, with America present, is a joke.
Answer.translation7: As for elections, there is no doubt, to gain public support, such actions will have to be taken for the sake of power, especially in a state like Israel. As for Barack Obama, history is witness that no American ruler has been able to go against the American policy and nor will they go. Whether the ruler is white or black, he is still a ruler.
Answer.translation8: From the discussions going on in the forum, it seems that everyone is hurt over her death, but as a politician, her mistakes have not been ignored.
Answer.translation9: This issue is debatable, as to whether Benazir gave her life for democracy or for power.

Input.machine_translation7: As far as the elections are concerned, those in power will take such measures as to please the people, and without a doubt especially a state like Israel. As far as Barack Obama is concerned, history is a witness that no American president to date has gone against the ruling policy, and this will not even happen. An imperialist, whether black or white, is an imperialist.
Input.seg8: فورم ميں جاری بحث سے يہ واضح ہوتا ہے کہ بےنظير کی وفات کا دکھ ہر کسی کو ہے مگر بحیثيت سياستدان ان کی کوتاہيوں کو نظر انداز نہيں کيا گيا۔
Input.machine_translation8: The ongoing debate in the forum shows that everyone is sad about Benazir's demise. However, considering her as a politician, her failings have not been ignored.
Input.seg9: يہ بات بحث طلب ہے کہ بےنظير نے جمہوريت کی خاطر جان دی يا اقتدار کی خاطر۔
Input.machine_translation9: It is being debated whether Benazir gave away her life for democracy or to gain power.
Input.seg10: اگر جمہوريت عزيز تھی تو امريکی کليئرنس اور ڈيل ہونے تک کہ دس سال جمہور کو مشرف کی آمريت ميں کيوں چھوڑے رکھا؟
Input.machine_translation10: If democracy was dear to her, then why was she free for ten years until a deal was made to obtain American clearance under Musharraf's authoritarian rule?
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 YFF35 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1:
I saw the terror act of Mumbai attacks as my own house was set on fire. It is painful to see the sufferings of humanity. 
if such sufferings can not be seen by others. May the Muslims think collectively.
Answer.translation2: Dead bodies on the roads, helpless and wounded people stained with their own blood. How it should be condemned; words are too poor to express this condemnation.
Answer.translation3: My heart is crying over the miseries and helplessness of Muslims. On one hand People are being killed in India and on the other hand, without any solid proof, whole world is pressing Pakistan to do more or we will do it ourselves.
Answer.translation4: On the other side Israel is killing Muslims. The silence of the world is intolerable.
Answer.translation5: It may be delayed but God will surely do the justice to end the dominance of falsehood.
Answer.translation10: If Democracy was her motto then why did not she come before American clearance and deal? Whey did she leave democracy under the control of Musharraf's dictatorship for 10 years?
Answer.translation6: A threat to Israel's security in the presence of US, no way! it is a joke.
Answer.translation7: In Israel, such tactics are used by ruling party to achieve public support.Historically no president was powerful enough to change American policies.Barrack Obama is no exception. Forces of Exploitation are similar in their character; whether they are black or white.
Answer.translation8: In this forum discussion, it is clear that every body is mourning the death of Benazir but she is not forgiven for her political mistakes.
Answer.translation9: It is debatable whether Benazir died for democracy or for the lust of Power.

Input.seg1: يہی امريکہ کی پرانی تاريح بھی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: This is also evident from American history.
Input.seg2: جب کہ بھارتی حملہ کی صورت ميں امريکہ کو اپنے مقاصد بھی حاصل ہونگے اور خرچ بھی بھارت کا ہوگا۔
Input.machine_translation2: And in the case of an Indian attack, America will achieve its goals while India will foot the bill.
Input.seg3: پاکستان کو چاہیے کہ واضح اعلان کرے کہ ہم پہل نہيں کريں گے مگر جارحيت کی گئی تو پھر صلح امن اور جنگ بندی کی بات اس وقت تک نہيں ہوگی جب تک بھارت کو مکمل تباہ يا اس پر قبضہ نہيں کر ليا جاتا چاہے اسکے لیے ہم خود کيوں نہ تباہ ہو جائيں۔
Input.machine_translation3: Pakistan should make it clear that we would not initiate war, but if an invasion takes place, then discussion of treaty, peace, and ceasefire will not take place until India is completely destroyed or occupied, even if this means our own destruction.
Input.seg4: يہی اسلامی تاريخ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: This is Islamic history.
Input.seg5: اس قرارداد سے پہلے ہی پاکستانی عوام اور فوج نے جو پيغام دينا تھا وہ دے ديا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Even before this resolution came to pass, the Pakistani people and army have conveyed whatever message they wanted to.
Input.seg6: ممبی حملوں کی تلافی ميں غير معمولی سفارتی و عسکری فوائد کے حصول کی بھارتی کوششيں اسے متاثر سے زيادہ شاطر فريق بنا رہی ہيں جبھی تو ابتدائی سخت عالمی رد عمل کے برعکس اب دنيا نے پاکستان پر دباو کم کر ديا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: India's efforts to gain undue diplomatic and military advantage as a compensation for the Mumbai attacks have made it appear to be a clever, rather than effective, party. Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ہر روز جو ہزاروں کی تعداد میں وہ مارٹر اور توپ کے گولے برساتے ہیں ان سے کتنے طالبان مارے جاتے ہیں؟
Input.machine_translation1: How many Taliban are being killed by the thousands of mortars and bombs that they drop everyday?
Input.seg2: میں آئی ایس آئی سے اپیل کرتا ہوں کہ خدارا طالبان کی سرپرستی چھوڑ دیں اور ہمیں جنت نظیر سوات میں امن سے رہنے دیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: I appeal to ISI that they should stop patronizing the Taliban and let us live in peace in the heavenly Swat,
Input.seg3: اور یہ جعلی آپریشن بند کردیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: and put an end to this fake operation.
Input.seg4: اقوام متحدہ ميں وہ دن دور نہيں جب پاکستان ميں فوجی مداخلت کی قرارداد ايسے ہی پاس ہوجائےگی جيسےجماعت الداعوۃ کےخلاف پاس ہوئی۔
Input.machine_translation4: The day is not far away when a United Nations resolution relating to armed intervention in Pakistan will pass just like the way one was passed against Jamat-ud-Daawa.
Input.seg5: رياض احمد فاروقی
Input.machine_translation5: Riaz Ahmed Faruqi.
Input.seg6: اول تو ہمارے شدت پسند اور انکے حمايتي ہی اپنے خلاف کارروائی کے لیے تمام ثبوت اور جواز مسلسل فراہم کیے جا رہے ہيں اور خاکم بدہن، جس دن بھي ايسي کوئی قرارداد پيش ہوئی تو پورے امکانات ہيں کہ اقوام متحدہ ميں کوئی بھي آواز ہمارے حق ميں نہ اٹھےگي،
Input.machine_translation6: To begin with, our extremists and their supporters themselves are constantly providing proofs and reasons for action against themselves, and whenever such a resolution is passed, there is a great possibility that no one will raise their voice at the United Nations in support of us.
Input.seg7: اور بالفرض اس قرارداد کے پاس ہونے ميں دير ہوئی تو امريکہ کی مثال سامنے رکھتے ہوئے کوئی نہ کوئی طاقت اپنی مدد آپ کے تحت ہي چڑھ دوڑے گي۔
Input.machine_translation7: And even if there is some delay in the passing of the resolution, one country or another will follow the example of America and attack us on their own.
Input.seg8: پير سميع اللہ کی شخصيت اور کارناموں سے ہميں واقفيت اور معلومات نہيں کہ اس کی سرگرمياں کيا تھيں۔
Input.machine_translation8: We do not have much familiarity with the personality and achievements of Peer Samiullah and we do not have information about what his activities were.
Input.seg9: شايد وہ کوئی انقلابی نہيں تھے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Probably he was not a revolutionary.
Input.seg10: جس طرح کامريڈ چے گويرا، نواب اکبرخان بگٹی، ڈاکٹر نجيب اللہ اور ہزاروں انقلابيوں کی لاشوں کی بےحرمتی دشمن کے ہاتھوں ہوئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: The way Comrade Che Guevara, Nawab Akbar Khan Bugti, Dr. Najibullah, and the bodies of thousands of dead revolutionaries have been desecrated at the hands of the enemies.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: Every day, how many Taliban die due to the firing of the thousands of mortar and canon shells they fire?
Answer.translation2: I appeal to the ICI that they stop their guardianship of the Taliban, for Gods sake, and let us live peacefully in paradise like Swat.
Answer.translation3: And they stop this fixed operation.
Answer.translation4: The day is not far, when a resolution will be passed in the United Nations, against army intervention in Pakistan, in the same way as it was passed against Jama'athud-Da'wah.
Answer.translation5: Riyaz Ahmad Farooqi
Answer.translation10: As the bodies of Comrade Che Guevara, Nawab Akbar Khan Bagti, Dr. Najibullah and thousands of other revolutionists were dishonored at the hands of the enemy.
Answer.translation6: First of all, our radicalism and our protecting them, is alone, sufficient to provide complete proof and permissibility for action against us. And the very day such a resolution is passed, there is all probability that no voice will be raised in our support, in the United Nations.
Answer.translation7: And supposing the passing of such a resolution is delayed,some other strength will definitely leave our aid to ourself,, keeping the example of America in front of them.
Answer.translation8: We do not know about the personality and works of Pir Samiullah.
Answer.translation9: Perhaps he was not a revolutionist.

Answer.translation10: As Kamri dach gaveera, Nawab Akbar Khan Bagti, Dr Najeeb ul llah and thousands of Revolutionary’s Dead bodies has been disgraceful by Enemies hands
Answer.translation6: First our intemperance lovers and there supporters are collecting the evidence continuously for legal act are been provided, if any day any affirmative comes across then there are lot of possibilities that in the National unity there will be no one to raise a voice to support us
Answer.translation7: If suppose there is any delay for Affirmative to be passed then we can keep an example of America in front, so that any one of the power will join us to walk with us
Answer.translation8: We don’t have the consciousness and Knowledge of Peer Sami ul llah his Personality and his Adventures and what work he was busy in

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ہر روز جو ہزاروں کی تعداد میں وہ مارٹر اور توپ کے گولے برساتے ہیں ان سے کتنے طالبان مارے جاتے ہیں؟
Input.machine_translation1: How many Taliban are being killed by the thousands of mortars and bombs that they drop everyday?
Input.seg2: میں آئی ایس آئی سے اپیل کرتا ہوں کہ خدارا طالبان کی سرپرستی چھوڑ دیں اور ہمیں جنت نظیر سوات میں امن سے رہنے دیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: I appeal to ISI that they should stop patronizing the Taliban and let us live in peace in the heavenly Swat,
Input.seg3: اور یہ جعلی آپریشن بند کردیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: and put an end to this fake operation.
Input.seg4: اقوام متحدہ ميں وہ دن دور نہيں جب پاکستان ميں فوجی مداخلت کی قرارداد ايسے ہی پاس ہوجائےگی جيسےجماعت الداعوۃ کےخلاف پاس ہوئی۔
Input.machine_translation4: The day is not far away when a United Nations resolution relating to armed intervention in Pakistan will pass just like the way one was passed against Jamat-ud-Daawa.
Input.seg5: رياض احمد فاروقی
Input.machine_translation5: Riaz Ahmed Faruqi.
Input.seg6: اول تو ہمارے شدت پسند اور انکے حمايتي ہی اپنے خلاف کارروائی کے لیے تمام ثبوت اور جواز مسلسل فراہم کیے جا رہے ہيں اور خاکم بدہن، جس دن بھي ايسي کوئی قرارداد پيش ہوئی تو پورے امکانات ہيں کہ اقوام متحدہ ميں کوئی بھي آواز ہمارے حق ميں نہ اٹھےگي،
Input.machine_translation6: To begin with, our extremists and their supporters themselves are constantly providing proofs and reasons for action against themselves, and whenever such a resolution is passed, there is a great possibility that no one will raise their voice at the United Nations in support of us.
Input.seg7: اور بالفرض اس قرارداد کے پاس ہونے ميں دير ہوئی تو امريکہ کی مثال سامنے رکھتے ہوئے کوئی نہ کوئی طاقت اپنی مدد آپ کے تحت ہي چڑھ دوڑے گي۔
Input.machine_translation7: And even if there is some delay in the passing of the resolution, one country or another will follow the example of America and attack us on their own.
Input.seg8: پير سميع اللہ کی شخصيت اور کارناموں سے ہميں واقفيت اور معلومات نہيں کہ اس کی سرگرمياں کيا تھيں۔
Input.machine_translation8: We do not have much familiarity with the personality and achievements of Peer Samiullah and we do not have information about what his activities were.
Input.seg9: شايد وہ کوئی انقلابی نہيں تھے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Probably he was not a revolutionary.
Input.seg10: جس طرح کامريڈ چے گويرا، نواب اکبرخان بگٹی، ڈاکٹر نجيب اللہ اور ہزاروں انقلابيوں کی لاشوں کی بےحرمتی دشمن کے ہاتھوں ہوئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: The way Comrade Che Guevara, Nawab Akbar Khan Bugti, Dr. Najibullah, and the bodies of thousands of dead revolutionaries have been desecrated at the hands of the enemies.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1)
Answer.translation1: How many Taliban are killed by the thousands of shells fired by mortars and cannons everyday?
Answer.translation2: I appeal to the I.S.I that for God's sake, stop monitoring the Taliban and let us live in peace in our heavenly hometown Sawat.
Answer.translation3: And stop this phony operation.
Answer.translation4: That day is not far when a resolution about Pakistan's military intervention will be passed by United Nations just like the bill which was passed against Jamat-ud-Dawah.
Answer.translation5: Riaz Ahmad Farooqi
Answer.translation10: Like the deadbodies of Comrade Che Guevara, Nawab Akbar Khan Bugti, Doctor Najeebullah and thousands of other revolutionists have been subjected to dishonour at the hands of the enemy.
Answer.translation6: The extremists of our country and their supporters themselves are constantly providing all evidences and justifications required for instigation of action against them, and God forbid, the day when such a resolution is passed, in all likelihood not a single voice would be raised in United Nations, in our favour.
Answer.translation7: And supposing there is a delay in the enactment of this resolution, then considering the example of America, a superpower will come forward to take over on its own resources.
Answer.translation8: We are not aware and familiar with the character and achievements of Pir Sami-ullah and what his activities were.
Answer.translation9: Maybe he was not a revolutionist.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: وہ تو مر کر بھی امر ہوتے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation1: They are immortal even after death.
Input.seg2: ليکن يہاں تو ايک بين الاقوامی گيم کھيلا جارہا ہے، يہاں وحشت اور درندگی سے عوام کو خوفزدہ کر کے حکمرانی کی جا رہی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: But here, an international game is being played. Here, people are being ruled by fear, inculcated through barbarism and bestiality.
Input.seg3: تاکہ جواز پيدا کيا جا سکے کہ اگر ہم نہ ہونگے تو ايسے وحشی اور درندے آکر حکومت پر قبضہ کرينگے۔
Input.machine_translation3: This is to justify their rule; that is, if they do not rule then such barbarians and beasts will rule.
Input.seg4: دین کے نام پر نام نہاد اسلام پسندوں کی یہ حرکت بےحد قابل مذمت ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: This act, which has been performed by Islamists in the name of religion, is highly condemnable.
Input.seg5: ان انتہا پسندوں کے حامیوں کو امریکہ کے ظلم تو دکھائی دیتے ہیں لیکن اس جیسی بہیمانہ حرکتوں پر افسوس کرنے کی بجائے وہ ان کو قبائلی روایات کا نام دے ک صاف کنی کترا جاتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: The supporters of these extremists can see the tyranny of America, but instead of feeling sorry about such acts, they excuse them by labeling them as tribal customs.
Input.seg6: کھبی قبائلی روایات کا لبادہ اوڑ کر کبھی اسلام کا نام لے کر ہونے والی اس طرح کی بہیمانہ کارروائی کا جواز کسی صاحبِ دل کے پاس تو نہیں ہو سکتا۔
Input.machine_translation6: No sensitive person can cover such a brutal act in the name of tribal customs, or in the name of religion.
Input.seg7: میرے خیال میں ہماری فوج کے لوگ ان لوگوں سے ملے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: I think people from our armed forces are in cahoots with them.
Input.seg8: وہ ایسا کہ جب یہ لوگ نقل حرکت کرتے ہیں تو اس میں اتنا ٹائم تو لگنا ہے، اسے پکڑنے کے لیے اتنا ٹایم تو ہوگا لیکن وہ موقع پر پہنچنا تو دور وہ اگر وہاں ہوتے بھی تو وہاں سے رفو چکر ہوتے ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: When these people move from one place to another, it takes some time, during which they can be captured. But the army leaves the place, even if it's there, let alone capturing them during their movement.
Input.seg9: کیا یہ لوگ اتنے بہادر ہیں کہ وہ پچاس ستر آدمیوں کو یرغمال کرتے ہیں اور ہماری فوج ہاتھ پہ ہاتھ رکھے اس کو تماشائی کی طرح دیکھتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Are those people so fearless that they keep 50 to 70 people as hostages and our army watches the show?
Input.seg10: وہ بھی اللہ کے بندے ہیں اور فوج بھی۔
Input.machine_translation10: They are creatures of Allah, and so is our army.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.18) Gecko/2010020220 Firefox/3.0.18 GTB6
Answer.translation1: They are deathless even after being dead.
Answer.translation2: But here an international game is being played. Here ferrocity and animosity is created to do the ruling.
Answer.translation3: So there can be reason created that if we are not here then these vandals and animals can come take over the government.
Answer.translation4: In the name of religion, activities of these so called Islam lovers is highly condemned.
Answer.translation5: America sees the torture of these extremists but instead of being sad on these faithless activities, they easily name them as tribal culture.
Answer.translation10: They are also men of God and so is our army.
Answer.translation6: The reason for these faithless activities, sometimes given in the name of tribal culture and other times in the name of Islam, is not something done by a person with a heart.
Answer.translation7: In my opinion, people of our army are with these people.
Answer.translation8: That is because when they change destination, it takes time. But to catch them, forget about getting there on time, even if they are on the spot, they leave from there.
Answer.translation9: Are they so brave that they keep 50-70 people hostage and our army just watches it as spectators?

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: صاف ظاہر ہے کہ دال میں کچھ کالا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: It's clear that there is something fishy going on.
Input.seg2: ملائيت، آمرِ زمانہ ضياءالحق کي حقيقتاً آمريت کے دور سے خدا کی رحيمی اور کريمی کی صفات اجاگر کرنے کے برعکس طرح طرح کے عذابوں اور عبرتوں کے تذکروں سے مذہب کے نام پر خوف ودہشت کی جو فضاء قائم کرتی نظر آتی ہے اس ميں لاش لٹکنانے کے واقعہ کے علاوہ انکا لٹريچر اور ’مرنے کے بعد کيا ہوگا‘ جيسی کتابيں بھی خوف ودہشت پيدا کرتی ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation2: The great dictator of his time, Zia-ul-Haq, due to his authoritarianism, instead of highlighting the compassionate and merciful attributes of God, created an atmosphere of fear and terror for the faith through the discussions of the variety of forms of God's wrath and punishments. The incidence of the hanging corpse and books titled "What Will Happen After Death" produce fear and terror.
Input.seg3: اور يہ لوگ محض دنياوي حلوہ مانڈہ اور جاہ و جلال کي غرض سے اس خوف ودہشت کو بطور آلہ يا ھتھيار کےاستعمال کر رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation3: And these people are using fear and terror as the tools for obtaining worldly profits, gains, and grandeur.
Input.seg4: ’واعظو!
Input.machine_translation4: Waazu!
Input.seg5: آتشِ دوزخ سے جہاں کو تم يہ ڈرايا ہے
Input.machine_translation5: You are the one who planted the fear of hell fire among all.
Input.seg6: کہ خود بن گئے ڈر کي صورت‘
Input.machine_translation6: You became the face of fear itself.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ميں تو صرف يہ پوچھنا چا ہو نگا کہ جب ايک پورے دن تک يہ لاش لٹکتی ری تو فوج والے کيا کر رہے تھے کيا وہ صرف عام لوگوں کو نشانہ بنانے کيلے وہاں بيھٹے ہيں جو بيان بھی کچھ اسطرح کرتے ہيں’طالبان کے ٹھکانوں پر بمباری، مکان پرگولہ گرنےسے 2 بچے اور انکی ماں ’ہلاک‘۔
Input.machine_translation1: What I would like to ask is that while this dead body was hanging there for a whole day, what were the soldiers doing there? Do they only sit there to target civilians? And then the way they issue a statement like this - "Taliban hideouts attacked, a mother and her three kids killed when the house was bombed."
Input.seg2: کيا انہں اس چوک کے بارے ميں پتہ نہيں تھا؟
Input.machine_translation2: Did they not know about this square?
Input.seg3: يا تماشہ ديکھ رہے تھے؟
Input.machine_translation3: Or were they watching the show?
Input.seg4: ہم ہاتھ جوڑ کر منت اور التجا کرتے ہيں کہ خدا کيلیے يہ گيم بند کر ديجيے۔
Input.machine_translation4: We plead and beg for God's sake, put an end to this game.
Input.seg5: آخر آپ کے اوپر بھی ايک حکمران ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation5: Lest you forget there is also someone who is watching over you.
Input.seg6: بی بی سی کی طرف سے پوچھا گیا سوال معقول ہو نہ ہو لکھنے والوں کی سطحیت دیکھ کر افسوس ہوتا ہے، مثلاً یہ سوال کسی نے نہیں پوچھا کہ سوات میں موجود تیس ہزار فوج کیا کرنے گئی ہے؟
Input.machine_translation6: A question was put forth by BBC whether appropriate or not, but the superficiality of it was disheartening. For instance, no one asked the question as to what the 30,000 armed troops in Swat have gone there to accomplish.
Input.seg7: جو فوج کے مددگار طالبان سے لڑنے والوں کی لاشیں دن بھر کھمبوں پر لٹکتی رہتی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: The corpses of those who fight the Taliban and support the army dangle all day long from the poles.
Input.seg8: سواتی عوام کے ساتھ سبز قدم پاکستانی فوج نے جو کیا سو کیا، لیکن میڈیا بشمول بی بی سی نے بھی دنیا کو اصل حقیقت سے لاعلم رکھ کر اچھا نہیں کیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Whatever was done to the people of Swat by the cursed Pakistani army they did. But the media, including the BBC, did not do any good by hiding the truth from the world.
Input.seg9: پاکستانی فوج ڈرامہ کررہی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: The Pakistani army is staging a play.
Input.seg10: سوات کا بچہ بچہ کہ رہا ہے کہ یہ ایک خونی ڈرامہ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Every child of Swat is saying that this is a bloody drama.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: I only want to ask that when this body was hanging for a whole day, what was the army doing? Are they only there for targeting the public. They even report something like this 'Bombing on Taliban residences, a shell falling on a house kills two children and their mother'.
Answer.translation2: Did they not know about this mistake?
Answer.translation3: Or were they watching the show?
Answer.translation4: We fold our hands and request them to please, for God's sake, stop this game.
Answer.translation5: After all, there is a ruler above you.
Answer.translation10: Every child in Swat is saying that this is a bloody drama.
Answer.translation6: Whether the question asked by BBC is understandable or not, it is saddening to see the lack of perspective of the writer. For instance, no one asked what the army of 30,000, in Swat went there to do.
Answer.translation7: That the bodies of the Taliban who helps the army is left hanging on poles throughout the day.
Answer.translation8: Whatever the green footed Pakistani government did with the Swat public, the media, including BBC did not do good by keeping the world ignorant about the reality.
Answer.translation9: The Pakistani Army is putting up a drama.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: خدارا بس کریں ڈرامہ۔
Input.machine_translation1: For God's sake, end the drama.
Input.seg2: ان طالبان نے مسلمانوں کا نام ہی خراب کر ديا۔
Input.machine_translation2: These Taliban have given Muslims a bad name.
Input.seg3: پوری دنيا ميں اگر سچے مسلمان ان کو مسالمان نہيں کہتے تو ان کے علاقے ميں ان دہشت گردوں کو جگہ کيوں ملتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: If true Muslims in the whole world do not consider them Muslims, then why do these terrorists find refuge in their own area?
Input.seg4: جو بےغيرت بن جاتے ہيں جن سے محنت مزدوری نہيں ہوتی بندوق اٹھا کے ان کے گروپ ميں شامل ہوتے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation4: Those who have become shameless, who do not want to work hard, get guns and join their groups.
Input.seg5: اسلام بندوق يا تلوار کے زور سے نہيں آيا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Islam did not come about by force using a gun or a sword.
Input.seg6: شرم کرو۔
Input.machine_translation6: You should be ashamed.
Input.seg7: اس کا جواز نہ کسي مذہب ميں ہے نہ کسي خانداني روايات ميں۔
Input.machine_translation7: The answer to this cannot be found in any religion or any family tradition.
Input.seg8: بشمول بی بی سی ساری ميڈيا طالبان اور قبائل کے متعلق مختلف ذرائع سے اپنے تبصرے کرتے ہيں
Input.machine_translation8: The whole media, including the BBC, is speculating about the Taliban and the tribes using different sources.
Input.seg9: ليکن حقيقی صورت حال کا کسي کو پتہ ہي نہيں کہ صحيح صورت حال ہے کيا يہ تو ہم جانتے ہہیں کيونکہ ہم قبائلی ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation9: But nobody knows what the actual situation is. We know, because we ourselves are tribesmen.
Input.seg10: مختصرا يہ کہ يہ ايک کھيل ہے جسميں سی ائی اے، را، موساد اور ہمارا اپنا ائی ايس آئی شامل ہيں نہ کوئی طالب ہے نہ قبائلی يہ ان اداروس کے پيداکردہ شرپسند عناصر ہيں جو اسلام، طالبان، مدارس، پشتون قوم، قبائل اور قبائلی روايات کو بدنام کر رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation10: In short, this is a game in which the CIA, RAW, Mosad, and our own ISI are involved. There are no Taliban or tribesmen; there are terrorist who have been created to give a bad name to Islam, Taliban, Madrasahs, Pashtun people, tribes and the tribal customs.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: For God's sake stop this drama.
Answer.translation2: These Talibans have tarnished the Muslim image.
Answer.translation3: If in the whole world true Muslims don't call these terrorists as Muslims then how come these elements are able to live in the lands of true Muslims.
Answer.translation4: Those who become shameless, can't do hard labor they pick up guns and become the members of terrorist groups.
Answer.translation5: Islam did not spread on the point of a sword or barrel of a gun.
Answer.translation10: In short, its a game in which CIA, RAW, MOSAD and our own ISI are invloved. No one is a talib or a tribal. Who made these institutions? Warmongers who are against Islam, Taliban, Madrassa's, Pushtoon people, tribes and tribal traditions.
Answer.translation6: Feel the shame.
Answer.translation7: There is no allowance of this in any religion or family traditions.
Answer.translation8: Including BBC all the media present their views in different styles on Taliban or the tribal people.
Answer.translation9: But no one is aware of the ground realities or what the truth is. It is us the tribal people who know what rally is the matter.

Input.seg3: پوری دنيا ميں اگر سچے مسلمان ان کو مسالمان نہيں کہتے تو ان کے علاقے ميں ان دہشت گردوں کو جگہ کيوں ملتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: If true Muslims in the whole world do not consider them Muslims, then why do these terrorists find refuge in their own area?
Input.seg4: جو بےغيرت بن جاتے ہيں جن سے محنت مزدوری نہيں ہوتی بندوق اٹھا کے ان کے گروپ ميں شامل ہوتے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation4: Those who have become shameless, who do not want to work hard, get guns and join their groups.
Input.seg5: اسلام بندوق يا تلوار کے زور سے نہيں آيا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Islam did not come about by force using a gun or a sword.
Input.seg6: شرم کرو۔
Input.machine_translation6: You should be ashamed.
Input.seg7: اس کا جواز نہ کسي مذہب ميں ہے نہ کسي خانداني روايات ميں۔
Input.machine_translation7: The answer to this cannot be found in any religion or any family tradition.
Input.seg8: بشمول بی بی سی ساری ميڈيا طالبان اور قبائل کے متعلق مختلف ذرائع سے اپنے تبصرے کرتے ہيں
Input.machine_translation8: The whole media, including the BBC, is speculating about the Taliban and the tribes using different sources.
Input.seg9: ليکن حقيقی صورت حال کا کسي کو پتہ ہي نہيں کہ صحيح صورت حال ہے کيا يہ تو ہم جانتے ہہیں کيونکہ ہم قبائلی ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation9: But nobody knows what the actual situation is. We know, because we ourselves are tribesmen.
Input.seg10: مختصرا يہ کہ يہ ايک کھيل ہے جسميں سی ائی اے، را، موساد اور ہمارا اپنا ائی ايس آئی شامل ہيں نہ کوئی طالب ہے نہ قبائلی يہ ان اداروس کے پيداکردہ شرپسند عناصر ہيں جو اسلام، طالبان، مدارس، پشتون قوم، قبائل اور قبائلی روايات کو بدنام کر رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation10: In short, this is a game in which the CIA, RAW, Mosad, and our own ISI are involved. There are no Taliban or tribesmen; there are terrorist who have been created to give a bad name to Islam, Taliban, Madrasahs, Pashtun people, tribes and the tribal customs.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Stop this drama for Godsake!
Answer.translation2: These Talibans have destroyed the image of muslims.
Answer.translation3: If the real muslims dont accept Taliban as muslims then why they get a refuge in thier places.
Answer.translation4: The one who are shameless and dont do hardwork and labour, take arms in their hands and join thier group.
Answer.translation5: Islam doesnt spread through sword & guns.
Answer.translation10: (  sorry was pretty hard to translate)
Answer.translation6: Have shame.
Answer.translation7: Its baseless and has no roots in any religion nor in family customs.
Answer.translation8: All media including BBC show different views on Taliban and Tribals.
Answer.translation9: Infact nobody knows the actual situation except us, becuase we are the natives.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: اس حرکت سے سب مسلمانوں کے سر شرم سے جھک گئے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation1: This behavior has brought shame to the Muslims.
Input.seg2: ميں ايم کيو ايم کے قائد الطف حسين کو اے اين پی اور پي پی پی کی قيادت کو سلام پيش کرتا ہوں جو اس کينسر کے خلاف يعنی طالبان کے خلاف بات کرتے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation2: I salute MQM's chief Altaf Husain, ANP, and PPP, who are speaking up about this cancer. i.e. the Taliban.
Input.seg3: يہ کينسر ضياالحق کی پيداوار ہے، وہ خود تو گئے مگر پاکستان کو بھی تباہ کر گئے۔
Input.machine_translation3: This cancer is a product of Zia-ul-Haq. He died, but ruined Pakistan.
Input.seg4: مگر ميں پراميد ہوں کہ موجودہ قيادت اس کينسر کو ختم کر لے گی۔
Input.machine_translation4: But I am hopeful that the present leadership will eliminate this cancer.
Input.seg5: ہندوستان نے ممبئی حملوں کے بعد کہا کہ ان حملوں کے پیچھے پاکستان کے بعض شدت پسند عناصر کا ہاتھ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: India, after the Mumbai attacks, has declared that a few extremist elements from Pakistan were involved in them.
Input.seg6: پاکستان نے ان الزامات کی تردید کی اور کہا کہ وہ تفتیش میں ہندوستان کی ہر ممکن مدد کرے گا۔
Input.machine_translation6: Pakistan has refuted these allegations, saying that it will provide as much help to India in the investigations as it can.
Input.seg7: ہندوستان نے کہا کہ اس نے پاکستان کو ایک فہرست دی ہے جس میں ان بیس مشتبہ شدت پسندوں کے نام دیئے ہیں، جو ہندوستان کو مطلوب ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: India has stated that it has given a list of twenty suspected terrorists to Pakistan who are wanted by India.
Input.seg8: اب پاکستان نے کہا ہے کہ اس فہرست میں شامل جیشِ محمد کے سربراہ مولانا مسعود اظہر نظربند نہیں ہیں اور ان کے بارے میں حکومت پاکستان کو کوئی معلومات نہیں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Now Pakistan has said that Jaish-e-Mohammad's leader Maulana Masood Azhar, who is also included in this list, has not been detained and the Pakistani government has no information about him.
Input.seg9: اس سے پہلے پاکستان کے صدر آصف علی زرداری نے اس تاثر کو مسترد کیا کہ مغربی خفیہ اداروں اور بھارتی حکومت نے پاکستان کو ممبئی حملوں سے متعلق شواہد فراہم کیے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: Earlier, Pakistan's president Asif Ali Zardari dismissed the impression that western secret service agencies and the Indian government have provided proofs about the Mumbai attacks to Pakistan.
Input.seg10: صدر زردرای نے اجمل قصاب کے بارے میں کہا کہ یہ ابھی ثابت نہیں ہوا کہ وہ پاکستانی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation10: President Zardari said that whether Ajmal Kasab is from Pakistan or not hasn't been proved yet.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: The heads of Muslims have hung from shame over this action.
Answer.translation2: I salute the leader of MQM, Althaf Husain, and the leaderships of ANP and PPP, as they have spoken against this cancer, i.e. the Taliban.
Answer.translation3: This cancer was given birth to by Zia-ul-Haqq. He has gone, but he has destroyed Pakistan as he went.
Answer.translation4: But I have hope that the present government will eradicate this cancer.
Answer.translation5: After the Mumbai attacks, India had said that there was the hand of some Pakistani extremists behind the attack.
Answer.translation10: President Zardari said regarding Ajmal Kasab, that it is not yet proven that he is Pakistani.
Answer.translation6: Pakistan refuted these claims and said that it would help India in investigation in every possible way.
Answer.translation7: India said that they have given Pakistan a list of the suspected extremists which India wanted.
Answer.translation8: Now, Pakistan said that the Jaish-e-Mohammad leader, who is included in the list, Moulana Mas'ood Azhar, is not under house arrest, and that the government of Pakistan has no information about him.
Answer.translation9: Previously, the President of Pakistan, Asif Ali Zardari had rejected the idea that western intelligence agencies and the Indian government had provided Pakistan proof about the Mumbai attacks.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: اسی دوران وزیراعظم منموہن سنگھ نے پاکستان کو خبردار کیا ہے کہ اس کے ساتھ بھارت کے تعلقات تب تک بہتر نہیں ہوسکتے جب تک وہاں کی سر زمین کو دہشت گردی کے لیے استعمال کیا جاتا رہے گا۔
Input.machine_translation1: Meanwhile, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh has warned Pakistan that its relations with India cannot improve while it keeps using India's land for terrorist activities.
Input.seg2: اور تازہ ترین پیش رفت میں انڈیا کر کرکٹ ٹیم نے پاکستان کا دورہ منسوخ کر دیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: And in the recent developments, the Indian cricket team has cancelled its tour to Pakistan.
Input.seg3: کیا ان سیاسی واقعات کا کھیلوں پر اثر پڑنا چاہیے؟
Input.machine_translation3: Should these political events affect sports?
Input.seg4: آپ پاکستان اور ہندستان کے تعلقات کا مستقبل کیا دیکھتےہیں؟
Input.machine_translation4: How do you see the future of the relations between Pakistan and India?
Input.seg5: پاکستان کو نہ امريکہ توڑے گا نہ انڈيا۔
Input.machine_translation5: Pakistan would be broken neither by America, nor by India.
Input.seg6: پاکستان کو خود پاکستانی توڑيں گے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Pakistanis themselves would break Pakistan.
Input.seg7: اتنی صوبائيت فرقہ واريت اور ملائيت کے بعد آپ کيا توقع رکھتے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation7: What do you expect after so much provincialism and sectarianism?
Input.seg8: ويسے جناح نے بھی انڈيا کے مسلمانوں کے ساتھ اچھا نہيں کيا يہ وقت ثابت کر چکا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Time has also proved that Jinnah did not do any good to the Muslims of India.
Input.seg9: yasmin، شکاگو
Input.machine_translation9: Yasmin, Chicago.
Input.seg10: محترمہ اگر جناح صاحب کے وژن پر کام جاری رہتا تو نہ صوبائیت،فرقاواریت اور ملائیت کا کینسر پاکستان میں پھیلتا اور نہ ہی بھارت میں مسلمانوں کے ساتھ ایسا برتاؤ ہوتا۔
Input.machine_translation10: Madam, had work continued on the vision of Mr. Jinnah, neither the cancer of provincialism, nor sectarianism would have spread in Pakistan, and India would not have treated Muslims like this.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: At that time,Prime Minister Manmohan Singh warned Pakistan that their relationship with India could not improve as long as their land continues to be used for terrorism.
Answer.translation2: And in the latest developments, the Indian cricket team cancelled their tour of Pakistan.
Answer.translation3: Should these political events affect sports.
Answer.translation4: What do you see the future of Indo-Pak relations looking like?
Answer.translation5: Neither America nor India will break Pakistan.
Answer.translation10: Madam, if work was continued in Jinnah's manner, neither would the tumors of regionalism, factionism and infiltration have spread in Pakistan, nor would the Indian Muslims been treated in this way.
Answer.translation6: Pakistan will break itself.
Answer.translation7: With so much regionalism, factionism and infiltration, what else can you expect?
Answer.translation8: Time has proved that Jinnah did not do good to the Indian Muslims.
Answer.translation9: Yasmin, Chicago

Input.seg1: اسکے علاوہ ملکی معاملات بھی درست نظر نہيں آرہے ہيں، سرحد، بلوچستان اور سندھ ميں کراچی کے حالات بھی آپ کے سامنے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation1: Apart from this, the national situation also does not look right. The situation in NWFP, Balochistan, and Karachi in Sindh is right in front of you.
Input.seg2: ايسی صورتحال ميں ملک کو ايک ايسے ليڈر کی ضرورت ہے جو ہميں ايک متحد قوم بنا سکے۔
Input.machine_translation2: In such circumstances, the country needs a leader who can unite us as a nation.
Input.seg3: يا اللہ ہم پہ رحم فرما۔
Input.machine_translation3: Oh Allah, have mercy on us.
Input.seg4: ميرے خيال سے ايک آخری جنگ کے بغير کوئی چارہ نہيں۔
Input.machine_translation4: I think there is no option but a final war.
Input.seg5: بس بہت ہو چکا۔
Input.machine_translation5: Enough is enough.
Input.seg6: اب معاملہ آر يا پار ہو ہی جانا چاہيے۔
Input.machine_translation6: It should go this way or the other.
Input.seg7: يہ مذاکرات کے منافقانہ ڈھونگوں سے مسئلہ حل نہيں ہو گا۔
Input.machine_translation7: These hypocritical pretensions of having a dialog will not solve any problem.
Input.seg8: نہ ہی ايک دوسرے کے ملکوں ميں چھوٹی موٹی دہشت گرديوں سے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Neither will small acts of terrorism in each other's countries.
Input.seg9: آخر يورپ کو بھی تو آخری عظيم جنگ لڑنے کے بعد ہی قرار آيا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation9: After all, Europe only calmed down after the last World War.
Input.seg10: اور يہ جنگ عظيم نہ ہوئی ہوتی تو يہ سب بھی آج تک پاکستان اور بھارت کی طرح چخ چخ ہی کر رہے ہوتے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Had this great war not taken place, they would have been bickering like Pakistan and India do till today.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: moreover, the internal affairs don't seem to be good, as you can see the circumstances in NWFP, Balochistan and in Karachi in Sindh.
Answer.translation2: in this situation the country needs such a leader who can unite us as one nation.
Answer.translation3: O Allah bestow your mercy upon us.
Answer.translation4: Account to my understanding, a final war is inevitable.
Answer.translation5: this is enough of it.
Answer.translation10: and if this world war had not taken place, then these countries, just like Pakistan and India, would have been clattering.
Answer.translation6: now it should be do or die.
Answer.translation7: this problem can not be solved through these acts of insincere dialogues.
Answer.translation8: and not through small scale terrorism in each other's country.
Answer.translation9: after all, Europe got settled after the final world war.

Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Other than that National matter are not looking good as well, circumstances in Sarhad, Balochistan, Karachi in Sindh are in front of you.
Answer.translation2: In this situation country needs a such leader who can unite us as a single Nation.
Answer.translation3: O Allah Have mercy on us
Answer.translation4: In my opinion there is no way other than a last war.
Answer.translation5: Enough much has happened
Answer.translation10: And if this Great war had not happened then they all would be chattering like Pakistan and India.
Answer.translation6: Now this affair has to win or lose.
Answer.translation7: This problem will not solve with hypocrisy deceit.
Answer.translation8: And neither with small big terrorism in each other countries.
Answer.translation9: Even Europe too came to rest after fighting the last great war.

Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; InfoPath.2)
Answer.translation1: Besides this the situation in the country doesn’t seem to be stable, like in the NWFP, Baluchistan and Sindh, and the problems in Karachi are also evident.
Answer.translation2: In this atmosphere we need a leader that can unite the people of this country.
Answer.translation3: O God please show us some mercy.
Answer.translation4: I believe we have no other option but to go to war one last time.
Answer.translation5: Enough is enough.
Answer.translation10: And if it wasn't for this World War then they'd still be arguing and nagging each other over small things.
Answer.translation6: It's now or never.
Answer.translation7: These fraudulent dialogues and pointless meetings are not the solution to the problems.
Answer.translation8: Neither is by committing small scale terrorist acts in each other’s territories.
Answer.translation9: After all it was only after waging the Second World War that Europe managed to sort its problems out.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ہماری تقريباً ساری سياسی جماعتيں اس بات پر اتفاق کرتيں ہيں کہ ملک سے دہشتگردی اور فرقہ واريت کا خاتمہ ہونا چاہيے۔
Input.machine_translation1: India, as a consequence of the Mumbai attacks,
Input.seg2: ليکن ہماری فوجی قيادت اس کام ميں مخلص نظر نہيں آتی، ايک طرف تو امريکہ اور يورپ کو يقين دہانی کرائی جاتی ہے کہ دہشتگردی کی اس جنگ ميں ہم آپ کے ساتھ ہيں دوسری طرف طالبان کی بھی خفيہ طور پر مدد کرتے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation2: tension has resulted in relations with Pakistan and the current improvement in the relations between both the countries gained over the years has been setback.
Input.seg3: ہميں اب سوچنا ہے اور اپنی سمت کا تعين کرنا اور صرف ايک کی راہ کا انتخاب کرنا ہے، شکريہ
Input.machine_translation3: India has constantly held the militant and non-militant groups in Pakistan accountable.
Input.seg4: اس بات میں کوئی شک نہیں ہے کہ جماعت الدعوہ میں شامل اکثریت لشکر طیبہ کے ان کارکنوں ہی کی ہے جو کہ لشکر طیبہ کے کالعدم قرار دئے جانے کے بعد جماعت الدعوہ پاکستان کے نام سے قائم جماعت میں شامل ہو گئے تھے،
Input.machine_translation4: The return of the relations to normality is being attributed to the action that was taken against these groups.
Input.seg5: تاہم اس کے بعد ان کارکنوں نے امدادی کاموں کو ترجیح دی اور اب بھارت کے پُر زور اصرار پر اقوام متحدہ نے اسے بھی کالعدم قرار دے دیا ہے اور حکومت پاکستان بھی ان کے خلاف کریک ڈاؤن جاری رکھے ہوئے ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Meanwhile, Indian security organizations have directly accused Lashkar-e-Tayaba for being the perpetrator of the Mumbai attacks.
Input.seg6: میرے خیال میں اگر یہ جہادی گروپس مذہبی انتہا پسندی چھوڑ کر دینی اور امدادی سرگرمیاں جاری رکھیں تو زیادہ بہتر۔
Input.machine_translation6: In relation to this, Jamiat-ud-Daawa's name is also being brought up again and again.
Input.seg7: پاکستان ميں موجود دہشتگر تنظيميں جنہوں نے جہاد کے نام پر پيشہ وارانہ جرائم پيشہ لوگ پال رکھے ہيں يہ اور ان ملاوؤں کے ’بڑے‘ وہی ہيں جو پاکستان کو پليدستان اور جانے کيا کيا کہتے رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation7: This is not the first time that the relations between both countries have been strained by some terrorist activity in India.
Input.seg8: اب يہ پاکستان کو تباہ کرنے ميں کوئی کسر نہيں چھوڑ رہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: In December 2001, after the attack on the Indian parliament, both countries had come to the brink of a war.
Input.seg9: اصل ميں يہ مسلمان تو کيا انسان کہلوانے کے حقدار نہيں۔
Input.machine_translation9: Following this, in 2002, Lashkar-e-Tayaba was banned and its name was added to the list of terrorist groups.
Input.seg10: پاکستان کو ان شرپسندوں سے پاک کیے بغير ملکی سلامتی خطرہ ميں رہےگي۔
Input.machine_translation10: Now there is a demand to ban Jamiat-ud-Daawa, which, according to security analysts, is the new face of Lashkar-e-Tayaba.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.18) Gecko/2010020220 Firefox/3.0.18 GTB6
Answer.translation1: Almost all of our political parties agree on this matter that these terrorist and denominational activities should be terminated from the country.
Answer.translation2: But our army rule does not seem sincere in this matter. On one hand, American and Europe are made to believe that we are with you on this war against terrorism and the other hand, we also help Taliban secretly.
Answer.translation3: We have to think now and decide our direction and only choose one way. Thank you.
Answer.translation4: There is no doubt in this that majority of the members of Jamaat-ud-Dawa are the members of Lashker-e-Tayyaba, who joined  the party  named Jamaat-ud-Dawa Pakistan after Lashker-e-Tayyaba was invalidated.
Answer.translation5: Although these members preferred subsidiary activities and now after India's great persistence, The United Nation has invalidated it also and Government of Pakistan is continuing the crack down against them.
Answer.translation10: Without cleaning Pakistan from these evil doers, the country's existence will be in jeopardy.
Answer.translation6: In my opinion, it is better if Jihadi groups leave religious extremism and continue religious and subsidiary activities.
Answer.translation7: Terrorist groups present in Pakistan, who support professional criminals and the heads of those Mullahs are those who call Pakistan the land of destruction and what not.
Answer.translation8: And now they are doing everything to destroy Pakistan.
Answer.translation9: In reality, they do not even deserve to be called Human beings, let alone Muslims.

Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: Almost all our political parties agree that terrorism and factionalism should be finished.
Answer.translation2: But our military leadership does not seem to be sincere in these regards. On the one hand, America and Europe are ascertained that we are with them in their war against terrorism, and on the other hand we secretly help the Taiban.
Answer.translation3: We should think and fix our direction and choose only one way. Thanks.
Answer.translation4: There is no doubt that majority of the workers of Jama'athud Da'wah are the previous members of Lashkar-e-Taiba who joint the group called Jama'athud Da'wah Pakistan, after Lashkar-e-Taiba was rendered inexistent.
Answer.translation5: However, after that, the members gave preference to social work, and now even Jama'athud Da'wah was rendered inexistent by the United Nations, due to the pressure applied by India and the crackdown being enforced by the Pakistani government.
Answer.translation10: Without cleaning Pakistan of these mischief mongers, the national security will remain at risk.
Answer.translation6: I believe that if Jihadi groups leave religious fundamentalism and take up social efforts, that would be better.
Answer.translation7: The present terrorist groups that bring up criminals in the name of Jihad, and the elders of these Mullas, are the same people who used to call 'Pakistan' 'Palidistan', and who knows what else.
Answer.translation8: Now they are not leaving any stone unturned in destroying Pakistan.
Answer.translation9: Actually, these are not even fit to be called human beings, let alone 'Muslims'.

Input.seg4: اس بات میں کوئی شک نہیں ہے کہ جماعت الدعوہ میں شامل اکثریت لشکر طیبہ کے ان کارکنوں ہی کی ہے جو کہ لشکر طیبہ کے کالعدم قرار دئے جانے کے بعد جماعت الدعوہ پاکستان کے نام سے قائم جماعت میں شامل ہو گئے تھے،
Input.machine_translation4: The return of the relations to normality is being attributed to the action that was taken against these groups.
Input.seg5: تاہم اس کے بعد ان کارکنوں نے امدادی کاموں کو ترجیح دی اور اب بھارت کے پُر زور اصرار پر اقوام متحدہ نے اسے بھی کالعدم قرار دے دیا ہے اور حکومت پاکستان بھی ان کے خلاف کریک ڈاؤن جاری رکھے ہوئے ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Meanwhile, Indian security organizations have directly accused Lashkar-e-Tayaba for being the perpetrator of the Mumbai attacks.
Input.seg6: میرے خیال میں اگر یہ جہادی گروپس مذہبی انتہا پسندی چھوڑ کر دینی اور امدادی سرگرمیاں جاری رکھیں تو زیادہ بہتر۔
Input.machine_translation6: In relation to this, Jamiat-ud-Daawa's name is also being brought up again and again.
Input.seg7: پاکستان ميں موجود دہشتگر تنظيميں جنہوں نے جہاد کے نام پر پيشہ وارانہ جرائم پيشہ لوگ پال رکھے ہيں يہ اور ان ملاوؤں کے ’بڑے‘ وہی ہيں جو پاکستان کو پليدستان اور جانے کيا کيا کہتے رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation7: This is not the first time that the relations between both countries have been strained by some terrorist activity in India.
Input.seg8: اب يہ پاکستان کو تباہ کرنے ميں کوئی کسر نہيں چھوڑ رہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: In December 2001, after the attack on the Indian parliament, both countries had come to the brink of a war.
Input.seg9: اصل ميں يہ مسلمان تو کيا انسان کہلوانے کے حقدار نہيں۔
Input.machine_translation9: Following this, in 2002, Lashkar-e-Tayaba was banned and its name was added to the list of terrorist groups.
Input.seg10: پاکستان کو ان شرپسندوں سے پاک کیے بغير ملکی سلامتی خطرہ ميں رہےگي۔
Input.machine_translation10: Now there is a demand to ban Jamiat-ud-Daawa, which, according to security analysts, is the new face of Lashkar-e-Tayaba.

Answer.translation1: Almost all of our political parties are unified to the topic that terrorism and sectarian violence shall be eradicated from the country.

Input.machine_translation4: Pak crisis be evaded, and how important is it for armed groups to be abolished for stable peace between the two nations?

Input.machine_translation6: But our armed forces leadership does not seem sincere about this. On the one hand, America and Europe are assured that we are with them in this war against terrorism. On the other, the Taliban are also secretly provided with help.
Input.seg7: پاکستان روابط میں تلخی پیدا ہوئی ہے اور دونوں ملکوں کے تعلقات میں حالیہ برسوں میں آنے والی بہتری کو شدید دھچکا لگا ہے۔

Input.machine_translation8: There is no doubt that a majority of the active members of Lashkar-e-Tayaba joined Jamiat-ud-Daawa after Lashkar-e-Tayaba was banned.
Input.seg9: اور تعلقات کے واپس معمول پر آنے کو ان گروپوں کے خلاف کارروائی سے مشروط کیا جا رہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: After that these activists gave priority to providing aid, and on the strong insistence of India, the United Nations has banned it, too, and the Pakistani Government has also continued to crackdown against them.
Input.seg10: جبکہ بھارتی سکیورٹی اداروں نے ممبئی حملوں کے لیے لشکر طیبہ کو براہ راست ذمہ دار ٹھہرایا ہے

Input.seg1: ، اس سلسلے میں بار بار جماعت الدعوۃ کا نام بھی سامنے آہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: This is heart-breaking news.
Input.seg2: یہ پہلی مرتبہ نہیں ہے کہ بھارت میں کسی دہشتگرد کارروائی کی وجہ سے دونوں ملکوں کے درمیان تعلقات سنگین ہوئے ہوں۔
Input.machine_translation2: What a world this is that makes life miserable for someone who invokes an important principle of Islam, the religion of Allah.
Input.seg3: دسمبر دو ہزار ایک میں بھارتی پارلیمان پر حملے کے بعد یہ دو پڑوسی جنگ کے دہانے پر پہنچ گئے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation3: Non-Muslims can kill Muslims, but if Muslims even try to take revenge, then the whole non-Muslim world together with our hypocrite leaders treats those who are honest and selfless and who care for the religion as they are treating our great leader Hafiz Saeed today!
Input.seg4: اس کے بعد، سن دو ہزار دو میں لشکر طیبہ پر پابندی عائد کرکے اس کو دہشت گروہوں کی فہرست میں شامل کیا گیا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation4: The terrorist organizations present in Pakistan that have been sustaining criminals in the name of Jihad, they and the leaders of these Mullahs are the same people who call Pakistan land of the filthy and other bad names.
Input.seg5: اب جماعت الدعوۃ پر، جس کے بارے میں سکیورٹی تجزیہ کار کہتے ہیں کہ اصل میں لشکر طیبہ کا ہی نیا روپ ہے، پابندی کا مطالبہ کیا جا رہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Now they are not leaving any stone unturned to destroy Pakistan.
Input.seg6: آپ کے خیال میں اس گروپ پر پابندی عائد کی جانی چاہئیے یا نہیں؟
Input.machine_translation6: Actually, far from being called Muslims, they do not deserve even to be called humans.
Input.seg7: کیا پاکستان کو اپنی سرزمین پر سرگرم شدت پسند گروہوں کے خلاف فیصلہ کن کارروائی کرنی چاہئے؟
Input.machine_translation7: Without ridding Pakistan of these trouble-makers, national security is in danger.
Input.seg8: کیا جماعت الدعوۃ پر پابندی عائد کرنے سے موجودہ بھارت۔
Input.machine_translation8: Is there still a need to think about whether or not these conflict instigators should be banned?
Input.seg9: پاک بحران ٹل سکتا ہے اور دونوں ممالک کے درمیان دائمی امن کے لیے مسلح گروہوں کا بند ہونا کتنا ضروری ہے؟
Input.machine_translation9: There is no place in the world for such violent Mullahs whose job is only to kill.

Input.seg1: ، اس سلسلے میں بار بار جماعت الدعوۃ کا نام بھی سامنے آہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: This is heart-breaking news.
Input.seg2: یہ پہلی مرتبہ نہیں ہے کہ بھارت میں کسی دہشتگرد کارروائی کی وجہ سے دونوں ملکوں کے درمیان تعلقات سنگین ہوئے ہوں۔
Input.machine_translation2: What a world this is that makes life miserable for someone who invokes an important principle of Islam, the religion of Allah.
Input.seg3: دسمبر دو ہزار ایک میں بھارتی پارلیمان پر حملے کے بعد یہ دو پڑوسی جنگ کے دہانے پر پہنچ گئے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation3: Non-Muslims can kill Muslims, but if Muslims even try to take revenge, then the whole non-Muslim world together with our hypocrite leaders treats those who are honest and selfless and who care for the religion as they are treating our great leader Hafiz Saeed today!
Input.seg4: اس کے بعد، سن دو ہزار دو میں لشکر طیبہ پر پابندی عائد کرکے اس کو دہشت گروہوں کی فہرست میں شامل کیا گیا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation4: The terrorist organizations present in Pakistan that have been sustaining criminals in the name of Jihad, they and the leaders of these Mullahs are the same people who call Pakistan land of the filthy and other bad names.
Input.seg5: اب جماعت الدعوۃ پر، جس کے بارے میں سکیورٹی تجزیہ کار کہتے ہیں کہ اصل میں لشکر طیبہ کا ہی نیا روپ ہے، پابندی کا مطالبہ کیا جا رہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Now they are not leaving any stone unturned to destroy Pakistan.
Input.seg6: آپ کے خیال میں اس گروپ پر پابندی عائد کی جانی چاہئیے یا نہیں؟
Input.machine_translation6: Actually, far from being called Muslims, they do not deserve even to be called humans.
Input.seg7: کیا پاکستان کو اپنی سرزمین پر سرگرم شدت پسند گروہوں کے خلاف فیصلہ کن کارروائی کرنی چاہئے؟
Input.machine_translation7: Without ridding Pakistan of these trouble-makers, national security is in danger.
Input.seg8: کیا جماعت الدعوۃ پر پابندی عائد کرنے سے موجودہ بھارت۔
Input.machine_translation8: Is there still a need to think about whether or not these conflict instigators should be banned?
Input.seg9: پاک بحران ٹل سکتا ہے اور دونوں ممالک کے درمیان دائمی امن کے لیے مسلح گروہوں کا بند ہونا کتنا ضروری ہے؟
Input.machine_translation9: There is no place in the world for such violent Mullahs whose job is only to kill.
Input.seg10: اقوامِ متحدہ کی سلامتی کونسل نے جماعت الدعوہ پر پابندی عائد کر دی ہے، آخر سلامتی کونسل کے پاس کيا ثبوت ہيں جس پر اسنے اتنی عجلت دکھائی؟

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: کيا سلامتی کونسل ہميشہ مسلمانوں کے خلاف اتني مستعدی نہيں دکھاتي؟
Input.machine_translation1: Doesn't the Security Council always act expeditiously against Muslims?
Input.seg2: اس کو کہتے ہيں کہ مدعی سست گواہ چست!
Input.machine_translation2: This is called the nonchalant plaintiff and the zealous witness!
Input.seg3: ديکھا جائے تو بھارت خود ہی ايک ناکام رياست بن چکا ہے!
Input.machine_translation3: One can observe that India itself has become a failed state!
Input.seg4: جس کی انٹيليجنس، فوج اور دوسرے سکيورٹی ادارے ناکام ہو چکے ہيں، جو چند دہشتگردوں کے ہاتھوں 72 گھنٹے تک تگنی کا ناچ ناچتے رہے اور بھارت اپنی اس ناکامی کا الزام پاکستان پر ڈال کر پوری دنيا کو دھوکہ دے رہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: Those whose intelligence, army, and other security agencies have failed, who were kept helpless by a few the terrorists for 72 hours, and India wants to fool the entire world by blaming its failure on Pakistan.
Input.seg5: ايک کافر قتل ہو جائے پوری دنيا ميں شور مچ جاتا ہے- يہ دوہرا معيار کيوں؟
Input.machine_translation5: When a non-Muslim is killed, there is hue and cry in the whole world. Why this double standard?
Input.seg6: وطن عزيز کی واحد غيرسياسي، مذبہي، فلاحی تنظيم کو--------۔
Input.machine_translation6: The only non-political, religious, welfare organization of our beloved country --------
Input.seg7: فرقان فاروق، فيصل آباد
Input.machine_translation7: Furqan Faruq, Faisalabad.
Input.seg8: جب تک ہمارے پيغمبر(ص)، اوليا کرام اور صوفيوں نے سب انسانوں کو محبت اور احترام ديا، دين اسلام امن وآتشی سے خوب پھیلا اور پھلتا پھولتا رہا۔
Input.machine_translation8: During the time of our Prophet (PBUH), saints, and sufis, when love and respect for all humans prevailed, the religion of Islam spread peacefully and flourished.
Input.seg9: مسلمانوں نے بھي ہر ميدان ميں ترقي کي۔
Input.machine_translation9: Muslims also progressed in all areas.
Input.seg10: مگرجب يہ خوبصورت دين ملائيت کے ہتھے چڑھا توانسانوں ميں مومن و کافر کی تفريق شروع ہوئی اورفتنہ و فساد کے نئے باب کھلنے لگے جن سے دنيا پہلے واقف نہ تھي۔
Input.machine_translation10: But when this beautiful religion went into the hands of extremism, men started differentiating between Muslims and non-Muslims, and new chapters of conflict and controversy started to open, which the world was not aware of before this.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5

Answer.translation5: If one non Muslim is murdered den the voices will be raised from whole world, why is this Double Mentality?
Answer.translation10: When this Beautiful Religion has came to a normal person then the human beings has started differentiating the Muslim and non Muslim and then the New chapters of tumults and quarrel has been started, earlier the world was not aware of this
Answer.translation6: To my Dearest Countries one and only non politics, Religious, Cultural Organization -----------
Answer.translation7: Furqan Farooq, Faisalabad

Answer.translation9: Muslims has also got the Success on every Ground

Input.seg2: صدقے جائيے مشيرِ داخلہ رحمان ملک صاحب کے، ماشاءاللہ موصُوف کتنے جی دار اور دلير ہوگئے ہيں!
Input.machine_translation2: May I sacrifice myself for the interior minister Mr. Rehman Malik, by the grace of Allah, how brave and fearless the man has become!
Input.seg3: `بی بی سی کے مطابق جہاں اقوامِ متحدہ کی سلامتی کونسل ( کی ايک کميٹي) نے جماعت الدعوہ پر پابندی عائد کر دی ہے، وہاں ملک صاحب کا کہنا ہے کہ ہم نے پابندی عائد نہيں کی اور بہت غور و خوض کے بعد ہی ايسا کيا جاۓ گاـ
Input.machine_translation3: According to the BBC, while (a committee of) the United Nations Security Council has put a ban on Jamiat-ud-Daawa, Mr. Malik says that we have not enforced a ban yet, and it will only be done after thorough deliberation.
Input.seg4: يہی نہيں، بی بی سی ہی کے مطابق ملک صاحب موصوف نے اس تاثر کو بھی پوری شدت کے ساتھ غلط قرار ديا ہے کہ دہشت گردوں کی گرفتارياں ’کسی کے کہنے پر‘ عمل ميں لائی جا رہی ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation4: Not just this, according to the BBC, Mr. Malik has also very forcefully called this impression wrong that the arrests of terrorists are being made "on someone's demand."
Input.seg5: بھئي، سُبحان اللہ!
Input.machine_translation5: Wow, Glory be to Allah!
Input.seg6: صلاحیت رکھنا يا نہ رکھنا يا يہ کہنا کہ نہيں چاہتا۔
Input.machine_translation6: Security forces raided an alleged camp of the banned Lashkar-e-Tayaba in the Pakistani controlled area of Kashmir.
Input.seg7: ہم يعنی پاکستانی کس کی جنگ لڑ رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation7: After the Mumbai attacks, increasing pressure is being placed on Pakistan to speed up its actions against extremist organizations.
Input.seg8: اور کيوں ہمارے بھی مفادات ہيں جنہيں جن کو ہم پوری کوشش کر کے بچائبگے۔
Input.machine_translation8: India accuses Lashkar-e-Tayaba of involvement in the Mumbai attacks.
Input.seg9: کسی کو کسی ملکی معاملات ميں مداخلت کرنے کا اختيار نہيں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: American foreign secretary Condoleeza Rice has urged the Pakistani leadership to take practical steps for an immediate and transparent action against the perpetrators of the Mumbai attacks.
Input.seg10: نوآباديات کا دور بظاہر نظرنہيں آتا۔
Input.machine_translation10: They say that the extremists who attacked Mumbai undoubtedly used Pakistani territory.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; GTB6.4; .NET CLR 2.0.50727)

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: اگر لوگوں کو انصاف کی توقع ہو يا اتحادی آزاد عدليہ کے نفاذ پر زور ديں جمہوري اداروں کا احترام کريں اور کسی آمر يا فوجی کی مدد نہ کريں تو تيسری دنيا بشمول پاکستان ميں امن قائم ہوگا اور جو اتحاديوں کو شاید قبول نہیں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: Meanwhile, authorities in Peshawar say that another center for the trucks that take goods to the allied forces in Afghanistan was destroyed by fire by unknown armed men, destroying more than fifty trucks.
Input.seg2: پاکستان تو ويسے ہی يورپی اور امريکی مقاصد کی اطاعت ميں لگا رہتا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: In the past 48 hours, this is the second attack on the NATO and American supplies in Peshawar.
Input.seg3: يہ پاکستان کي ايک غالب آبادی کی مخالفت کے باوجود کروايا جاتا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: In the meantime, Pakistan has raided an alleged camp of the banned Lashkar-e-Tayaba. Efforts were made even before this to disarm the armed groups from Karachi to the tribal areas, and those who surrendered their arms were assured that compensation would be given to them and that no action would be taken against them.
Input.seg4: اور يہ اس بات کو مزيد مخالف جزبات کو ابھارتا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: Events tell us that the former Soviet Union's intervention in Afghanistan during General Zia-ul-Haq's period, and efforts to eliminate the armed groups that were born as a result of the resistance to it with America-Saudi funding, to take Pakistan to the state it was in before 1980, were not successful.
Input.seg5: اگر امريکی اور اس کے اتحادی جمہوريت پر اعتماد رکھتے ہيں تو نوآبادی والے طرز عمل کو چھوڑ کر رياست کی خودمختاری کا احترام کرتے ہوئےاس خطے سے چلا جاۓ۔
Input.machine_translation5: The question is, does Pakistan want to do this?
Input.seg6: پاکستان ميں اتنی صلاحيت ہے کہ وہ خود مسلحہ يا غير مسلحہ کرے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Does Pakistan have the capacity to do this?
Input.seg7: پاکستان کے زیر انتظام کشمیر میں سکیورٹی فورسز نے کالعدم لشکر طیبہ کے ایک مبینہ کیمپ پر چھاپہ مارا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: What do you say?
Input.seg8: ممبئی حملوں کے بعد سے پاکستان پر دباؤ بڑھ رہا ہے کہ وہ شدت پسند تنظیموں کے خلاف کارروائی تیز کرے۔

Input.seg10: امریکی وزیرخارجہ کونڈو لیزا رائس نے پاکستانی قیادت سے کہا ہے کہ ممبئی حملوں کے ذمہ داروں کے خلاف فوری اور شفاف کارروائی کا عملی مظاہرہ ہونا چاہیے۔

Input.seg1: اس کے لیے آن سکرین کی بورڈ پر alt+shift دبا کر اردو سلیکٹ کریں)
Input.machine_translation1: Pakistan has the capability to arm or disarm itself.
Input.seg2: ميرا صرف ايک سوال تمام انسانيت کے علمداروں سے ہے:
Input.machine_translation2: I have only one question for all the flag-bearers of humanity:
Input.seg3: اگر آپ انکے بچے ماروگے تو وہ وہ آپ کے واسطے ہار لے کر آجائیں، يہ ناممکن ہے
Input.machine_translation3: If you kill their children, will they welcome you with garlands for you? This is impossible.
Input.seg4: Saeed، Multan
Input.machine_translation4: Saeed, Multan.
Input.seg5: اور ميرا آپ سے سوال کہ علوم اسلامی سے ليکر علوم مشرق و مغرب تک، کہيں کوئی منطق، دليل اور فلسفہ امريکی حملے کے بدلے بے گناہ عوام بشمول نمازي، مزدور اور نوکری پيشہ غريب ملازمين کے قتل کی اجازت ديتا ہے؟
Input.machine_translation5: And my question to you is do the teachings of Islam, or those of the East or West give any logic, philosophy, or reasoning that approves of the killing of innocent citizens, including people who are praying, laborers, and low-income workers, and employees, as a consequence of American attacks?
Input.seg6: اور اگر جواب نہ ميں ہے تو آپ کو اپنے نقطۂ نظر کی اصلاح کی اشد ضرورت ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: And if there is no answer, then you have a dire need to correct your point of view.
Input.seg7: لوگوں کو مسلح کيا گيا اس وقت يہ خدشہ تھا کہ روس افغانستان کے بعد پاکستان کارخ کرے گات لہذا ان لوگوں کو مسلح کيا گيا۔
Input.machine_translation7: At the time when people were given arms, it was feared that Russia, after Afghanistan, would turn its attention to Pakistan; therefore people were provided the arms.
Input.seg8: اب جب يہ خدشہ ہے کہ امريکہ افنستان کے راستے پاکستان پر چڑھ دوڑے گا جس کا موجودہ امريکی صدر اپنی صدارتی مہم ميں برملا اظہار کر چکے ہيں تو ہم ان لوگوں کو کيوں غير مسلح کريں؟
Input.machine_translation8: Now that we suspect America to attack Pakistan from Afghanistan, which the present American president has spoken about during his presidential campaign, why then should we disarm these people?
Input.seg9: صرف اسليے تاکہ امريکہ يا بھارت کو پاکستانی فوج کو زير کرنے کے بعد کسی قسم کی عوامی مزاحمت کا سامنا نہ کرنا پڑے؟
Input.machine_translation9: So that America or India, after subduing the Pakistani armed forces, do not have to face any kind of resistance from the people?
Input.seg10: ہاں اگر ان ميں سے کوئی کسی تخريبی کارروائی ميں ملوث ہو تو پاکستان صرف اس کے خلاف کارروائی کرے۔
Input.machine_translation10: However if anyone is involved in oppressive activities, Pakistan should take an action against them only.
Answer.comment: It is difficult to find exact same word but I have tried my best.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.17) Gecko/2009122116 Firefox/3.0.17
Answer.translation1: For this, press alt+shift on on-screen keyboard and select urdu.
Answer.translation2: I ask only one question from flag holders of humanity.
Answer.translation3: If you kill their children and they bring necklace for you, this is impossible.
Answer.translation4: Saeed, Multan.
Answer.translation5: And question from you that from islamic studies to western eastern studies, say any logic, argument and philosophy give permission to kill innocent civilians including praying men, laborers and poor workers of different occupations, in revenge of American attack?
Answer.translation10: Yes, if anyone of them is involved in any destructive actions then Pakistan should act against them.
Answer.translation6: If answer is in no then you have instant need of correcting your point of view.
Answer.translation7: People were armed, at that time their was a danger that Russia will turn toward Pakistan after Afghanistan, therefore people were armed.
Answer.translation8: Now when there is danger that America will overrun Pakistan through passage of Afghanistan of which American president had said out in his election campaign then why should we unarm these people?
Answer.translation9: Only because America or India army don't have to face any civil resistance after defeating Pakistani army?

Answer.translation1: For this, click Alt+Shift on the on-screen keyboard and select Urdu)
Answer.translation2: I have only one question for the standard bearers of the world.
Answer.translation3: If you kill their children, will they come to garland you? It is impossible.
Answer.translation4: Saeed, Multan
Answer.translation5: And I ask you, does any science, from Islamic sciences to the sciences of the East and the West, any logic or philosophy, anywhere, give the permission to kill innocent public, including worshipers, laborers, and poor workers, in revenge for the American attacks?
Answer.translation10: Yes, if any of them are guilty of being involved in any destructive work, Pakistan can take action against them alone.
Answer.translation6: If your answer is in negative, then you really need to fix your viewpoint.
Answer.translation7: The people were armed when there was the fear that Russia would head towards Pakistan after finishing Afghanistan, and that is why they were supplied arms.
Answer.translation8: Now, when there is the fear that America will capture Pakistan, via Afghanistan, as the president American president has clearly mentioned in his presidential mission, why should we disarm them now?
Answer.translation9: Only so that after defeating the American or Indian army, it does not have to face any resistance from the public?

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ليکن افسوس يہ ہے حکومت کا لشکر طيبہ کے دوالے ہوجانا نے بھارت کی بات کو صحيح قرار دے ديا ہے کہ اس ميں پاکستان ملوث ہے۔
Input.machine_translation1: Regretfully, the government's seizing of Lashkar-e-Tayaba has proven India right about Pakistan being involved in this affair.
Input.seg2: نجيب الرحمان سائکو، *لاہور* [P@KI$T@N]
Input.machine_translation2: *Najeeb-ur-Rehman Saiko*, Lahore, Pakistan.
Input.seg3: اگر يہ مان ليا جائے کہ لشکر طيبہ ملوث ہے تب بھی پاکستان حکومت کو الزام دينا صحيح نہيں۔
Input.machine_translation3: Even if it is accepted that Lashkar-e-Tayaba is involved, it is not right to blame Pakistan's Government.
Input.seg4: اور ايک سوال يہ بھی کہ کيا ان دہشتگردوں کو کسی سرکاری يا غير سرکاري بھارتی اہلکار کی مدد حاصل نہيں تھي؟
Input.machine_translation4: And another question is did these terrorists not have the support of some government or non-government officer in India?
Input.seg5: کيا دہشتگرد صرف پاکستان ميں پيدا يا تيار ہوتے ہيں اور بھارت اور دنيا کے ديگر ممالک ميں تيار نہيں ہوتے؟
Input.machine_translation5: Are terrorists born or trained only in Pakistan and not in India, or any other countries of the world?
Input.seg6: جہاں تک لشکر طيبہ کا تعلق ہے حاليہ دہشت گردی کا اس سے کوئی تعلق نہيں۔
Input.machine_translation6: As far as Lashkar-e-Tayaba is concerned, it has got nothing to do with the recent acts of terrorism.
Input.seg7: يہ بات ياد رکھنے کی ہے کہ حافظ سعيد ہی وہ پہلے ’جہادی رہنما‘ تھے جنہوں نے طالبان کی کارروئيوں کو ’فتنہ‘ قرار ديا تھا۔
Input.machine_translation7: A point to remember is that it was Hafiz Saeed who was the first "Jihadi leader" to label the acts of the Taliban as "chaos."
Input.seg8: مجھے پختہ يقين ہے کہ طالبان کی شورش امريکی منصوبوں کا جزو لانيفک ہے لہذا ہراس شخص اورگروہ کو راستے سے ہٹانا ضروری ہے جو کسی بھی حوالے سے طالبان کو چيلنج کرے۔
Input.machine_translation8: I am completely sure that the Taliban's invasion is [a part of] American plans. Therefore, it is necessary to remove every person and group from the way who should challenge the Taliban in any way.
Input.seg9: پوری قوم کے تعاون کے باوجود بھارتی دباؤ ميں آ کر لشکر کے خلاف کارروائی کرنا زردری اينڈ کو کی گبراہٹ اور چاپلوس طبعيت کی طرف اشارہ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Despite the consensus of the whole nation, under pressure from India carrying out an action against Lashkar reflects the nervous and servile nature of Zardari and company.
Input.seg10: امريکہ سعودی فنڈگ سے شروع ہونے والی مہم کو ختم کرنے کے لیے ان سے ہی درخواست کريں کہ خدارا اب اس گندگی کو بھی سميٹيں جو ہمارے معاشرے کو ذہر آلود کر چکی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: To bring an end to this campaign, which was started by the Saudi and American funding, a request should be made of them, for God's sake, to clean up this mess, which has poisoned our society.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: But the sad fact of the matter is that leaders of Lashkare Tayyaba declared the accusations of India correct that Pakistan was involved.
Answer.translation2: Najeeb Ur Rehman Psycho *Lahore*
Answer.translation3: Even if this is accepted that Lashkare Tayyaba is involved, still the blame cannot be placed on the Pakistani Government.
Answer.translation4: And another question arises that did these terrorists not have the aid of some government or non-government employee of India.
Answer.translation5: Are the Terrorist only born or prepared in Pakistan, and not prepared in India or other nations of the world.
Answer.translation10: The operations started with American and Saudi funding has to come to an end and to do so it should be requested of them that for god sake wipe out this filth that is consistently polluting our society.
Answer.translation6: As far as Laskare Tayyaba is concern it has no involvement in the recent incidents.
Answer.translation7: This should be kept in mind that Hafiz Saeed was the first Jihadi leader who claimed that the actions of Taliban were a Fitna.
Answer.translation8: I believe without a doubt that all the actions of the Taliban were an integral part of the American scheme, therefore it is necessary to eradicate anyone and everyone who stands in the way of Taliban.
Answer.translation9: Despite the co-operation of the entire nation, launching an operation under the pressure of India shows the stature and non existant leader ship qualities of Zerdari and Co.
