Input.seg9: پوری قوم کے تعاون کے باوجود بھارتی دباؤ ميں آ کر لشکر کے خلاف کارروائی کرنا زردری اينڈ کو کی گبراہٹ اور چاپلوس طبعيت کی طرف اشارہ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Despite the consensus of the whole nation, under pressure from India carrying out an action against Lashkar reflects the nervous and servile nature of Zardari and company.
Input.seg10: امريکہ سعودی فنڈگ سے شروع ہونے والی مہم کو ختم کرنے کے لیے ان سے ہی درخواست کريں کہ خدارا اب اس گندگی کو بھی سميٹيں جو ہمارے معاشرے کو ذہر آلود کر چکی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: To bring an end to this campaign, which was started by the Saudi and American funding, a request should be made of them, for God's sake, to clean up this mess, which has poisoned our society.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: But it is sad that the fact that Lashkar-e-Taiba is involved proves India's claim that Pakistan is guilty in this.
Answer.translation2: Najeebur Rahman Syco, Lahore
Answer.translation3: Even if we accept that Lashkar-e-Taiba is guilty, it is still not correct to blame the Pakistani government.
Answer.translation4: And another question is that were these terrorists not supported by an Indian governmental or non-governmental agent?
Answer.translation5: Are terrorists only born or prepared in Pakistan, and not in any other country of the world?
Answer.translation10: To stop the project that is running on Saudi-American funding, they must be requested themselves to regather, for God's sake, the filth that has polluted our society.
Answer.translation6: As for Lashkar-e-Taiba, the present terrorism is in no way connected to it.
Answer.translation7: It must be remembered that Hafiz Saeed is the first 'Jehadi leader' who called the Taliban actions 'mischief'.
Answer.translation8: I am sure that the Taliban effect is a inseparable result of American plans, and hence every person who can stand in the way of Taliban must be removed.
Answer.translation9: Despite the support of the whole nation, the fact that Zardari and co. took action against the Lashkar is a clear sign of their frigid and kiss-up nature.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ان سے احتجاج بھی کريں کہ کس اخلاقيات کے تحت امريکہ اور سعودی نے ہمارے ملک ميں خطرناک اسلحہ اور نام نہاد جہادی مگرحقيقتا نفرت انگيز لٹريچر اور کلچر کا وائرس پھیلايا، جس سے ہمارے ملک ميں انسانی ذبح خانے کھلے۔
Input.machine_translation1: A protest should also be lodge with them as under what guise did America and Saudi Arabia spread the virus of dangerous weapons in our country and so-called Jihadis, and truly hateful literature and culture, which opened human slaughterhouses in our country?
Input.seg2: بھارت کی طرف سے حملے کے خطرے کے بعد پاکستانی فوج کے اس اعلان نے کہ وہ افغان بارڈر سے فوج ہٹاکر بھارت کی طرف توجہ دے گا اور طالبان کا يہ اعلان کے کہ وہ افغان بارڈر سنبھالينگے امريکی بری طرح لڑکھڑا گئے اور اپنا پورا زور لگاديا کہ بھارت پاکستان پر حملہ نہ کرے۔
Input.machine_translation2: America was badly rattled when the Pakistani army declared, after fear of an Indian attack, that it would move its forces from the Afghan border and pay attention to India, and the Taliban announced that they would take care of the Afghan border. America used all means available to stop an Indian attack on Pakistan.
Input.seg3: اس سے خطہ ميں امريکی قوت کا سارا بھرم کھل گيا۔
Input.machine_translation3: And this exposed America's reputation in this area.
Input.seg4: حالانکہ بھارت نے نہ تو حملے کی دھمکی دی اور نہ ہی اسکی اتنی ہمت ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: Although India neither threatened to attack, nor does it have the guts to do so,
Input.seg5: رہی سہی کثر امريکی رسد پر طالبان کے حملوں نے پوری کردي۔
Input.machine_translation5: the rest has been taken care of by the Taliban's attacks on American supplies.
Input.seg6: ثابت ہوا کہ پاک فوج اور حکومت پاکستان کی سپورٹ کے بغير امريکہ کچھ نہيں۔
Input.machine_translation6: It proves that without the support of the Pakistani army and the Pakistani Government, America is nothing.
Input.seg7: کراچی پاکستان کا کاروباری مالياتی مرکز سارے پس ماندہ علاقوں کا دبئی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: Karachi, Pakistan's trade and finance hub is like the Dubai of all undeveloped areas.
Input.seg8: لاکھوں يہاں سے خالی ہاتھ کبھی نہيں لوٹتے، مگر جب سے مغربي سرحدی علاقوں ميں قانون کی بالادستی مفقود ہوئی ہے سبوں کی توجہ کراچی نے لی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Millions do not leave this place empty-handed. But ever since the western border areas have become lawless, Karachi has become the focus of everyone's attention.
Input.seg9: اب وہ اس شہر کی اغوا کے درپے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation9: Now they are on the verge of taking this city hostage.
Input.seg10: پہلی بار پٹھانوں کو پختون کہا جانے لگا ہے، جو ايک شہر کے لوگوں کو اجنبی بنا کر لڑايا جا رہا ہے، حالانکہ ضرورت يک جہتی کی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: For the first time, Pathans are being referred to as Pakhtuns, and inhabitants of the same city are being considered outsiders to make them fight each other, although the need is for unity.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: And also protest against them asking them based on what ethics, America and Saudi spread dangerous weapons and so called Jihadi, but in reality hate inciting and cultural virus enticing literature in our country, because of which our country has become a human slaughterhouse.
Answer.translation2: After facing the risk of attack from India, the Pakistani Army's announcement that it would remove forces from the Afghan border and post them at the Indian border, and the announcement of the Taliban that it would handle the Afghan border, caused America to stumble, and pressurize India not to attack Pakistan.
Answer.translation3: This showed the strength of America in the region.
Answer.translation4: Though India did not warn that they would attack, and nor do they have that much courage.
Answer.translation5: The Taliban attacked and finished most of the remaining American supplies.
Answer.translation10: For the first time, Pathans began to be called Pukhtons, and the people of a single town are made foreigners and are being made to fight, while the need is for unity.
Answer.translation6: That proves that without the Pakistani Army and tha Pakistani government, America is nothing.
Answer.translation7: Karachi is the trade and financial center of Pakistan, and the Dubai of the backward regions.
Answer.translation8: Hundreds of thousands never return from here empty handed, but ever since the law and order situation in the western border regions was lost, all people diverted their attention here.
Answer.translation9: Now they waant to kidnap this city.

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: مسئلے کا ايک حل تو يہ ہے کہ يا تو اردو بولنے والے پشتو سيکھ ليں يا پشتو بولنے والے اردو، يا سبھی انگلش سيکھ ليں تو اور اچھا۔
Input.machine_translation1: One solution to the problem is that either the Urdu-speaking people should learn Pashto, or the Pashto-speaking people should learn Urdu, or everyone learns English, that would be even better.
Input.seg2: آپ يقيناً اسے ايک مضحکہ خيز تجويز سمجھيں گےليکن آپ کو تصادم کی وجہ کيا مضحکہ خيز نہيں لگتي؟
Input.machine_translation2: You would definitely find this suggestion amusing, but don't you find the reason of the clash amusing?
Input.seg3: کہ تشدد کي وجہ زبان ہو؟
Input.machine_translation3: That the reason for violence is language?
Input.seg4: ظہير چغتائی
Input.machine_translation4: Zaheer Chughtai.
Input.seg5: جناب يہ تجويز حقيقت ميں ميں نے اپنے دوستوں کو جن ميں ہر مذہبي اور لساني طبقے کے لوگ شامل تھے بچپن ميں بار ہا دی، پر يار لوگ ان باتوں پر ہنسا کرتے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Actually, sir I gave this suggestion many times as a child to my friends who belonged to different religious and linguistic groups, but they used to laugh it off.
Input.seg6: اس وقت ان لسانی اور مذہبی منافرتوں کے جن کي حالت آج سی جاندار اور توانا نہ تھي بس اندر ہی اندر پک رہی تھي۔
Input.machine_translation6: In those days, these linguistic and religious differences were not as strong and active as they are now. They were just percolating beneath the surface.
Input.seg7: سمجھ ہی نہيں آتا کہ يہ کيا اور کيوں ہو رہا ہے؟
Input.machine_translation7: It is hard to understand what is happening and why it is happening?
Input.seg8: کيا قيامت کی يہی نشانياں ہيں؟
Input.machine_translation8: Are these the signs of the Day of Judgment?
Input.seg9: معصوم اور بيگناہ کس جرم ميں مارے جا رہے ھيں؟
Input.machine_translation9: For what reason are the innocent and blameless people being killed?
Input.seg10: وجوہات سبکے سامنے ہيں جو پاکستان کو ٹکڑے کرنا چاھتے ہيں وہی سرگرم ہيں اور جو يہ سب کرتے ہيں انکا نہ تو کوئی مذھب ہے اور نہ ملک۔
Input.machine_translation10: The reasons are obvious. Those who want to break up Pakistan are the ones who are emotional and they do not belong to any religion or country.

Answer.translation1: One solution to the problem is that the Urdu speaking learn Pushto or the Pushto speaking learn Urdu, or its better that everybody learns English.
Answer.translation2: You must be thinking its a funny suggestion, but don't you think the cause of the conflict is also funny?

Input.seg2: آپ يقيناً اسے ايک مضحکہ خيز تجويز سمجھيں گےليکن آپ کو تصادم کی وجہ کيا مضحکہ خيز نہيں لگتي؟
Input.machine_translation2: You would definitely find this suggestion amusing, but don't you find the reason of the clash amusing?
Input.seg3: کہ تشدد کي وجہ زبان ہو؟
Input.machine_translation3: That the reason for violence is language?
Input.seg4: ظہير چغتائی
Input.machine_translation4: Zaheer Chughtai.
Input.seg5: جناب يہ تجويز حقيقت ميں ميں نے اپنے دوستوں کو جن ميں ہر مذہبي اور لساني طبقے کے لوگ شامل تھے بچپن ميں بار ہا دی، پر يار لوگ ان باتوں پر ہنسا کرتے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation5: Actually, sir I gave this suggestion many times as a child to my friends who belonged to different religious and linguistic groups, but they used to laugh it off.
Input.seg6: اس وقت ان لسانی اور مذہبی منافرتوں کے جن کي حالت آج سی جاندار اور توانا نہ تھي بس اندر ہی اندر پک رہی تھي۔
Input.machine_translation6: In those days, these linguistic and religious differences were not as strong and active as they are now. They were just percolating beneath the surface.
Input.seg7: سمجھ ہی نہيں آتا کہ يہ کيا اور کيوں ہو رہا ہے؟
Input.machine_translation7: It is hard to understand what is happening and why it is happening?
Input.seg8: کيا قيامت کی يہی نشانياں ہيں؟
Input.machine_translation8: Are these the signs of the Day of Judgment?
Input.seg9: معصوم اور بيگناہ کس جرم ميں مارے جا رہے ھيں؟
Input.machine_translation9: For what reason are the innocent and blameless people being killed?
Input.seg10: وجوہات سبکے سامنے ہيں جو پاکستان کو ٹکڑے کرنا چاھتے ہيں وہی سرگرم ہيں اور جو يہ سب کرتے ہيں انکا نہ تو کوئی مذھب ہے اور نہ ملک۔
Input.machine_translation10: The reasons are obvious. Those who want to break up Pakistan are the ones who are emotional and they do not belong to any religion or country.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: One possible solution to the problem is this that either Urdu speaking learn Pashto or Pashto speaking learn Urdu, or whats better is they all learn English.
Answer.translation2: You will surely think this as a ridiculous suggestion but do you think that reason of this conflict is not ridiculous?
Answer.translation3: That reason of violence is language?
Answer.translation4: Zaheer Chughtai
Answer.translation5: Sir i gave this suggestion  in childhood in reality to my friends in which there were people according to classification from every religion and dialect but friends used to laugh on my talks.
Answer.translation10: The reasons are in front of everyone who wants to divide Pakistan in pieces same are active here and who do this they neither have religion and nor country.
Answer.translation6: At that time the condition of Jinn of hatred of dialectal and religious was not that alive and strong but it was brewing internally.
Answer.translation7: Do not understand what and why is this happening?
Answer.translation8: Are these the very same signs of Last day?
Answer.translation9: For what crime are innocent and guiltless being killed?

Answer.translation1: One solution to this problem is that either the Urdu speaking people learn Pushtun or the Pushtun speaking people learn Urdu, or better yet, both learn English.
Answer.translation2: You might think that this is a funny proposal, but does the cause of the conflict not seem funny?
Answer.translation3: That the cause of extremism be language?
Answer.translation4: Zaheer Chughtai
Answer.translation5: Sir, I actually shared this proposal many times in my childhood with my friends, which included people from all religious and linguistic groups, but these people used to laugh at me.
Answer.translation10: The reasons are in front of everybody. Those who want to break up Pakistan are the active ones, and those who do such things, have neither religion, nor country.
Answer.translation6: At that time, the religious and linguistic hate, which was not as lively and strong as they are today, were still developing within.
Answer.translation7: I can never understand what is happening and why?
Answer.translation8: Are these the signs of the Day of Judgement?
Answer.translation9: For what crime are innocent people being killed?

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: کراچی ہو يا ممبئی گھر کو آگ لگی ہے گھر کے چراغوں سے۔
Input.machine_translation1: Be it Karachi or Mumbai, the home has been set on fire by its own inhabitants.
Input.seg2: جو حکومت آتی ھے وہ صرف جگہوں کے نام تبديل کر کے نام کمانے ميں لگ جاتے ہيں، جيسا کہ آجکل ائرپورٹ، روڈز، بلڈ نگز سب بينظیر۔
Input.machine_translation2: Whichever government comes in, it tries to make a name for itself simply by changing the names of places; like these days, airports, roads, buildings, everything is being named after Benazir.
Input.seg3: کيا بينظير کے يہی معنی ہيں جو کراچی اور پاکستان کےعوام کے ساتھ ہو رہا ہے؟
Input.machine_translation3: Does the name Benazir represent whatever is happening to the people of Karachi and Pakistan?
Input.seg4: ممبئی حملوں کے عين عروج پر را کی طرف سے کراچی ميں لسانی فسادات شروع کروانے کی کوشش کا ناکام ہونا يہ ثابت کرتا ہے کہ ماضی ميں را کے پے رول پر کام کرنے والے سياسی عناصر اب اس نوکری سے مستعفی ہو چکے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation4: At the peak of the Mumbai attacks, the failure of RAW that instigated riots based on linguistic differences in Karachi is proof that the political elements that used to work on RAW's payroll in the past have resigned from their job.
Input.seg5: پشتو بولنے والے محنت کشوں کے خون ناحق اور بھارتی دھمکيوں نے کراچی سے خيبر تک سوئی ہوئی پاکستانيت کو جگا ديا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: The unwarranted killings of the Pashto-speaking laborers and India's threats have awakened Pakistani nationalism from Karachi to Khyber.
Input.seg6: تمام سياسي، مذہبي، لسانی و قومی جماعتوں کے حب الوطنی سے بھر پور يکساں ردعمل نے جہاں بھارت کو سفارتی آداب سکھائے ہيں وہاں امريکی منصوبہ سازوں کو سوچنے کا ايک اور موقع بھي فراہم کيا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: While this strong display of patriotism from all the political, religious, linguistic, and national parties has taught a diplomatic lesson to India, it has also given the American policy makers another opportunity to think.
Input.seg7: کراچی ميں حالات خرابی کی ذمہ دارمتحدہ اور اے اين پی ہيں اور انتظاميہ جانبداری برت رہی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: Muttahida and ANP are responsible for the deterioration of the situation of Karachi, and the administration is being biased.
Input.seg8: انتظاميہ 1گھنٹہ ميں حالات کنٹرول کر سکتی ہے مگر جان بوجھہ کر اس کو ہوا دي جا رہي ہے
Input.machine_translation8: The administration can control the situation in an hour, but it is consciously adding fuel to the fire.
Input.seg9: ، پوليس اور رينجر پرسياسی جماعتوں کا دباؤ ہونے کی وجہ سے کارروائی کرنے سےگريز کرتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: Police and Rangers avoid taking any action due to the pressure of the political parties.
Input.seg10: اتحاد کرنے کي باتيں صرف بيانات تک محدود ہيں، سياسی جماعتوں کو اپنے مفادات ترک کرکے عام انسان کے مفاد کے ليے کام کرنا چاہيے۔
Input.machine_translation10: The talk of unity is only limited to talk. Political parties should forget about their political gains and work for the betterment of the common man.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Be it Karachi or Mumbai, house set fire by its own resident (this is an phrase used to say that the inhabitants to the city destroying their own city)
Answer.translation2: which ever government comes to power changes the name of important infrastructure projects like airports, major roads, buildings, presently this is the case and buildings, airports etc have been renamed as Baynazeer (name of a very famous political leader of Pakistan assassinated during a public speech)
Answer.translation3: Does Baynzeer means what is going on with the people of Karachi and Pakistan ?
Answer.translation4: While Mumbai attack was on peak, the initiative taken by RAW(Indian spy agency)to start sectarian violence was busted and this event proves that in past political figures on RAW's payroll have now given up the job.
Answer.translation5: Spilling of innocent blood of Pushto speaking people and by India threatening many a times, have waked up the Pakistani's from Karachi to Khyber.
Answer.translation10: The talks about a unity amongst political parties on the issue is limited to paper only. Party will have to forgo their own vested interests and work for the interests of a common man
Answer.translation6: All strict applause of anger from political, religious, sectarian and national bodies is now teaching India the manners of diplomatic speech. They have provided American strategists a chance to think again.
Answer.translation7: Thosse responsible for the turmoil in Karachi are Mutahida and Awami National Party ANP where as the establishment is inclined towards one party and nor neutral.
Answer.translation8: The establishment could had controlled the events in an hour but intentionally allowed to the event to escalate.
Answer.translation9: Police and Rangers abstained from taking any action since they were in pressure from political parties.

Answer.translation1: Whether it is Karachi or Bombay, our homes are burnt with their own lamps( we  have destroyed our homes ourselves)
Answer.translation2: When the government comes, they just change names of the places to build a name for themselves. Just like these days airports, roads, buildings are all named Benazir.
Answer.translation3: What has happened in Karachi, is this what Benazir means?
Answer.translation4: When Bombay attacks were at their peak, the failure of efforts of RA to initiate turmoil in Karachi proves this that in the past political elements working on the payroll of RA have now resigned from their posts.
Answer.translation5: unjustified killing of Pashto speaking hard workers and Indian threats have awaken sleeping Pakistanis from Karachi to Khyber.
Answer.translation10: Talks of getting united are only limited to statements, political parties should let go of their self interests and work for the interest of a common man.
Answer.translation6: Where reaction full of patriotism of all political, religious, lingual and national parties have taught diplomatic manners to India, at the same time they have also given American planners one more chance to think.
Answer.translation7: MQM and ANP are responsible for the turmoil in Karachi and management is showing self interest.
Answer.translation8: Management can control the situation in 1 hour but it is being given wind on purpose.
Answer.translation9: Pressure of political parties on police and rangers keeps them from doing the operation.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: اعجاز اعوان
Input.machine_translation1: Ejaz Awan
Input.seg2: جناب اس سے پہلے کہ اپ بھی راتوں رات تجويز کندگان کا جم غفير جمع کر ليں، آپ کو بتاتا چلوں کہ حقيقی بدمعاشی کی کھلی نشانيان آپ کو آج کل کراچی کی ديواروں پر وال چاکنگ اور پوسٹروں کی صورت ميں بھی مل رہی ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation2: Sir, before you gather a crowd of purveyors of obscenity overnight, let me tell you that the signs of real trouble makers can be seen these days as graffiti and posters on the walls of Karachi.
Input.seg3: ہم دونوں طرح کی بدمعاشيان سہتے آ رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation3: We have been suffering from the mischief of both types.
Input.seg4: ويسے بدمعاشوں نے تو پاکستان اور بانی پاکستان کو بھی نہ بخشا، انہيں تو کسی ردعمل کا سامنا نہ کرنا پڑا۔
Input.machine_translation4: Mischief makers did not leave Pakistan or even the founder of Pakistan alone; they did not have to face any consequences.
Input.seg5: الٹا اسی پاکستان کے سينے پہ مونگ دل رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: On the contrary, they're flourishing at the expense of Pakistan.
Input.seg6: ایک مسلم لیگ ن رہتی تھی اس نے بھی اٹھارہویں ترمیم کا مسودہ بنا کر پیپلز پارٹي کے حوالے کر دیا۔
Input.machine_translation6: Only Muslim League (N) was left. It also prepared a draft of the eighteenth amendment and handed it over to the People's Party.
Input.seg7: اس سے قبل ایم کیو ایم اور مسلم لیگ ق اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسودے قومی اسمبلی اور سینٹ میں جمع کرا چکی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: Before this, MQM and Muslim League (Q) had already submitted drafts of the eighteenth amendment in the National Assembly and the Senate.
Input.seg8: ابھی تک تو یہی لگتا ہے کہ اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسدودے ایک سیاسی چال ہیں اور کوئی بھی اس ترمیم کو منظور کرانے میں مخلص نہیں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Until now, it appears as if these drafts of the eighteenth amendment are a political ruse and no one is sincere about getting this amendment approved.
Input.seg9: یہی وجہ ہے کہ ابھی تک کسی نے اسمبلی یا سینٹ کے فلور پر اس ترمیم کے حق میں واویلہ نہیں مچایا اور نہ ہی ایوان کو مجبور کیا ہے کہ وہ اس ترمیم کو منظور کرے۔
Input.machine_translation9: This is why no one has spoken up on the floor of the Assembly or Senate in support of this amendment nor forced the House to approve this amendment.
Input.seg10: ایسے لگتا ہے اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسودے جمع کرا کے ان پارٹيوں نے گونگلوؤں سے مٹی جھاڑ لی ہے یعنی کل کو یہ کہنے کے قابل ہو گئے ہیں کہ ہم نے تو ترمیم جمع کرا دی تھی حکومتی سپیکر نے کاروائی ہی نہیں کی۔
Input.machine_translation10: It seems as if by submitting the drafts of the eighteenth amendment, these parties have completed a formality that will allow them to say tomorrow that, well, we did submit the amendment. It was the government speaker who did not take action.

Answer.translation1: Consequences of noises.
Answer.translation2: many of us who live in large towns and cities have grown used to working in noise which comes from several different sources. There is the noise of moving trains which is heard at almost all hours of the day.
Answer.translation3: The Jet planes that fly over head produce noise of even greater loudness and intensity.
Answer.translation4: Most of us have no time to think of noises on one type or another.
Answer.translation5: They become part of our daily lives.
Answer.translation10: If we live in industrial areas which are growing with every passing year, there is the deafening noise produced by the speakers in house or shops, radio sets in the neighborhood, school children at play or at chorus practice of arithmetical tables, and so on.
Answer.translation6: But there is something to be thought of-does noise affect our lives in some harmful ways.
Answer.translation7: already there is evidence that it does so in several ways. It has been recognized for a long time.
Answer.translation8: Now that exposure to noise high intensity leads to loss of hearing. There have been cases of boiler-makers, for example, whose suffer from occupational deafness.
Answer.translation9: More recently it has also been found that people who are continuously exposed to other loud noises require protection of the ear.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: اعجاز اعوان
Input.machine_translation1: Ejaz Awan
Input.seg2: جناب اس سے پہلے کہ اپ بھی راتوں رات تجويز کندگان کا جم غفير جمع کر ليں، آپ کو بتاتا چلوں کہ حقيقی بدمعاشی کی کھلی نشانيان آپ کو آج کل کراچی کی ديواروں پر وال چاکنگ اور پوسٹروں کی صورت ميں بھی مل رہی ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation2: Sir, before you gather a crowd of purveyors of obscenity overnight, let me tell you that the signs of real trouble makers can be seen these days as graffiti and posters on the walls of Karachi.
Input.seg3: ہم دونوں طرح کی بدمعاشيان سہتے آ رہے ہيں۔
Input.machine_translation3: We have been suffering from the mischief of both types.
Input.seg4: ويسے بدمعاشوں نے تو پاکستان اور بانی پاکستان کو بھی نہ بخشا، انہيں تو کسی ردعمل کا سامنا نہ کرنا پڑا۔
Input.machine_translation4: Mischief makers did not leave Pakistan or even the founder of Pakistan alone; they did not have to face any consequences.
Input.seg5: الٹا اسی پاکستان کے سينے پہ مونگ دل رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: On the contrary, they're flourishing at the expense of Pakistan.
Input.seg6: ایک مسلم لیگ ن رہتی تھی اس نے بھی اٹھارہویں ترمیم کا مسودہ بنا کر پیپلز پارٹي کے حوالے کر دیا۔
Input.machine_translation6: Only Muslim League (N) was left. It also prepared a draft of the eighteenth amendment and handed it over to the People's Party.
Input.seg7: اس سے قبل ایم کیو ایم اور مسلم لیگ ق اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسودے قومی اسمبلی اور سینٹ میں جمع کرا چکی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: Before this, MQM and Muslim League (Q) had already submitted drafts of the eighteenth amendment in the National Assembly and the Senate.
Input.seg8: ابھی تک تو یہی لگتا ہے کہ اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسدودے ایک سیاسی چال ہیں اور کوئی بھی اس ترمیم کو منظور کرانے میں مخلص نہیں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: Until now, it appears as if these drafts of the eighteenth amendment are a political ruse and no one is sincere about getting this amendment approved.
Input.seg9: یہی وجہ ہے کہ ابھی تک کسی نے اسمبلی یا سینٹ کے فلور پر اس ترمیم کے حق میں واویلہ نہیں مچایا اور نہ ہی ایوان کو مجبور کیا ہے کہ وہ اس ترمیم کو منظور کرے۔
Input.machine_translation9: This is why no one has spoken up on the floor of the Assembly or Senate in support of this amendment nor forced the House to approve this amendment.
Input.seg10: ایسے لگتا ہے اٹھارہویں ترمیم کے مسودے جمع کرا کے ان پارٹيوں نے گونگلوؤں سے مٹی جھاڑ لی ہے یعنی کل کو یہ کہنے کے قابل ہو گئے ہیں کہ ہم نے تو ترمیم جمع کرا دی تھی حکومتی سپیکر نے کاروائی ہی نہیں کی۔
Input.machine_translation10: It seems as if by submitting the drafts of the eighteenth amendment, these parties have completed a formality that will allow them to say tomorrow that, well, we did submit the amendment. It was the government speaker who did not take action.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: I'jaz A'wan
Answer.translation2: Sir, before you get a large number of people with proposals, I shall tell you that the open signs of this mischief is also found on the walls of Karachi, in the form of posters and wall chalking.
Answer.translation3: We have been bearing both types of mischief.
Answer.translation4: Mischief mongers did not leave Pakistan or the founder of Pakistan. They did not have to face any reaction.
Answer.translation5: Contrary to that, they are pecking at the chest of Pakistan.
Answer.translation10: It looks as if the parties just wanted to get the thing off their backs by submitting the rough versions, so that tomorrow, they may say that we had submitted our versions of the amendment, but the government speaker did not take action.
Answer.translation6: There used to be one Muslim League (n), but they also made the rough version of the 18th amendment and handed it over to the Peoples Party.
Answer.translation7: Before that, MQM and Muslim League (q) had already handed in rough versions of the 18th amendment to the national assembly and senate.
Answer.translation8: It still seems that the copies of the 18th amendment is a political trickery, and no one is sincere about accepting that amendment.
Answer.translation9: This is why no fuss was made in the assembly or on the floor of senate over this amendment, and the parliament was not forced into accepting the amendment.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ایم کیو ایم حکومت کی اتحادی، مسلم لیگ ن حکومت کی درپردہ حلیف اور مسلم لیگ ق سترہویں ترمیم پاس کرنے والی جماعت تو پھر کیسے ہو سکتا ہے یہ جماعتیں سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے میں مخلص ہوں۔
Input.machine_translation1: MQM, the government's ally; Muslim League (N), the government's ally behind the scenes; and Muslim League (Q), the party that got the seventeenth amendment passed - how then can these parties be sincere in getting the seventeenth amendment annulled?
Input.seg2: یہ تو رنگ لگا کر شہیدوں میں نام لکھوانے کا بہانہ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: This is a way for them to appear to be martyrs.
Input.seg3: پیپلز پارٹي کو تو ویسے ہی سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے کی جلدی نہیں ہے۔
Input.machine_translation3: The People's Party is in no hurry to get the seventeenth amendment annulled anyway.
Input.seg4: بھلا کوئی کیسے اپنے ہاتھ کٹوانے کا سوچ سکتا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation4: Why would anyone want to get their own hands cut off?
Input.seg5: جب تک ذرداری صدر ہیں سترہویں ترمیم ختم ہونے والی نہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: As long as Zardari is president, the seventeenth amendment is not about to be annulled.
Input.seg6: یہی ہمارے ایک سروے میں اکثریت کی رائے تھی اور ہے بھی سچ۔
Input.machine_translation6: This was the majority opinion in one of our surveys, and it's true as well.
Input.seg7: اگر سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنی ہوتی تو پھر ذرداری صدر کبھی نہ بنتے۔
Input.machine_translation7: If the seventeenth amendment had been annulled, Zardari would have never become president.
Input.seg8: اب تو وہ صدر پرویز سے بھی زیادہ طاقتور شخص ہیں کیونکہ وہ صدر ہونے کیساتھ ساتھ پیپلز پارٹی کے چیئرمین بھی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation8: Now he is even more powerful than President Musharraf because he, along with being the president, is also the chair of the People's Party.
Input.seg9: جب تک وہ صدر ہیں سترہویں ترمیم قائم ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: As long as he is president, the seventeenth amendment will remain in place.
Input.seg10: سیاسی جماعتوں کو سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے کیلیے پہلے صدر ذرداری کو ایوان صدارت سے رخصت کرنا پڑے گا۔
Input.machine_translation10: To get rid of the seventeenth amendment, political parties will first have to get President Zardari out of the presidential house.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; GTB6.4; .NET CLR 2.0.50727)
Answer.translation1: MQM is i coalation with government, Muslim League(N) is secret partnership with government and Muslim League(Q) is the party that passed 17Th ammendment, then how it is possible that these parties are sincere in abolishing the 17Th Amendment
Answer.translation2: This is the way to get ones name entered in the list of martyrs by just getting painted.
Answer.translation3: The Peoples Party is otherwise not in hurry to end the seventeenth ammendment.
Answer.translation4: How any one can think of getting his own hands cut.
Answer.translation5: Seventeenth Ammendment cannot be abolished till Zardari is the President.
Answer.translation10: Political Parties will have to remove President Zardari first, in order to abolish  the seventeenth ammendment.
Answer.translation6: This was the opinion of majority in one of our survey and it is also correct.
Answer.translation7: Zardari would not have opted to be the President, if seventeenth ammendment was to be abolished.
Answer.translation8: Now he is more powerful than President Musharraf, since along with President he is also  the chairman of Peoples Party.
Answer.translation9: The seventeenth ammendment is there till he is the president.

Input.machine_translation4: Why would anyone want to get their own hands cut off?
Input.seg5: جب تک ذرداری صدر ہیں سترہویں ترمیم ختم ہونے والی نہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: As long as Zardari is president, the seventeenth amendment is not about to be annulled.
Input.seg6: یہی ہمارے ایک سروے میں اکثریت کی رائے تھی اور ہے بھی سچ۔
Input.machine_translation6: This was the majority opinion in one of our surveys, and it's true as well.
Input.seg7: اگر سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنی ہوتی تو پھر ذرداری صدر کبھی نہ بنتے۔
Input.machine_translation7: If the seventeenth amendment had been annulled, Zardari would have never become president.
Input.seg8: اب تو وہ صدر پرویز سے بھی زیادہ طاقتور شخص ہیں کیونکہ وہ صدر ہونے کیساتھ ساتھ پیپلز پارٹی کے چیئرمین بھی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation8: Now he is even more powerful than President Musharraf because he, along with being the president, is also the chair of the People's Party.
Input.seg9: جب تک وہ صدر ہیں سترہویں ترمیم قائم ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: As long as he is president, the seventeenth amendment will remain in place.
Input.seg10: سیاسی جماعتوں کو سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے کیلیے پہلے صدر ذرداری کو ایوان صدارت سے رخصت کرنا پڑے گا۔
Input.machine_translation10: To get rid of the seventeenth amendment, political parties will first have to get President Zardari out of the presidential house.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.1.8) Gecko/20100202 Firefox/3.5.8 GTB6 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Answer.translation1: MQM the government, Muslim League N in the opposition and Muslim League Q was the party who passed 17th amendment so how is it possible that these parties will be sincere in finishing the 17th amendment.
Answer.translation2: This is what is called getting credit for nothing.
Answer.translation3: People's party is already not in a hurry about finishing 17th amendment.
Answer.translation4: How can someone think of cutting their own hands?
Answer.translation5: 17th amendment will not be canceled until Zardari is the President.
Answer.translation10: In order to finish the 17th amendment, the political parties will have to bid Zardari farewell from the president house.
Answer.translation6: This was the opinion of the majority in our survey and it is also true.
Answer.translation7: If 17th amendment was to be discarded then Zardari would have never become the president.
Answer.translation8: Now he is even more powerful than President Parvez Musharaf. Because with being the president, he is also the chairman of the People's Party.
Answer.translation9: 17th amendment is valid until he is the president.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ایسا نہ ایم کیو ایم چاہتی ہے اور نہ دوسری جماعتیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: This is something neither MQM nor the other parties wants.
Input.seg2: ہمارے خاندان کے اکثر بزرگ مزدور طبقے سے تعلق رکھتے تھے
Input.machine_translation2: Most of the elders of my family belong to the working class.
Input.seg3: اور جب بچپن میں ہم اپنے چچا، ماموں وغیرہ کو دیہاڑی لگاتے دیکھتے تو دل میں یہی خواہش پیدا ہوتی کہ اللہ ہمیں جسمانی مشقت والی مزدوری سے بچانا۔
Input.machine_translation3: When I used to see my paternal and maternal uncles and the rest of them working for daily wages, I used to pray in my heart that God would save me from such physically rigorous labor.
Input.seg4: اس سے بچنے کیلئے ہم نے روزنامہ امروز کے ایڈیٹر کو خط لکھا اور پوچھا کہ ہم میٹرک کے بعد کیا کریں کہ ہمیں جسمانی مشقت نہ کرنی پڑے۔
Input.machine_translation4: To get out of this, I wrote a letter to the editor of the Amroze daily newspaper and asked what I should do after graduation so that I don't have to do hard labor.
Input.seg5: ایڈیٹر نے جواب میں لکھا کہ ڈاکٹر یا انجنئر بن جاؤ اور فلاں فلاں مضامین پکڑ لو۔
Input.machine_translation5: The editor wrote back that I should become a doctor or an engineer or take such-and-such subjects.
Input.seg6: ہمارا رجحان شروع سے ہی انجنئرنگ کی طرف تھا اور ہم نے میٹرک میں بھی بیالوجی کی بجائے ٹیکنیکل ڈرائنگ ہی پڑھی۔
Input.machine_translation6: My inclination had always been towards engineering, and I had even taken technical drawing in school instead of biology.
Input.seg7: لیکن ایف ایس سی میں داخلے کے وقت بڑے بھائی نے مجبور کیا کہ ہم میڈیکل میں ایف ایس سی کر کے ڈاکٹر بنیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: But at the time of the F. Sc. admissions, my older brother forced me to do my F. Sc. in medicine and become a doctor.
Input.seg8: ہم نے بمشکل ایک ماہ ہی بیالوجی پڑھی اور جب کچھ بھی پلے نہ پڑا تو اس کے بدلے حساب کا مضمون لے لیا۔
Input.machine_translation8: I studied biology with difficulty for a month, but when I couldn't make heads or tails of it, I changed the subject and took math instead.
Input.seg9: یعنی جسمانی مشقت سے ڈر نے ہمیں انجنئر بنا دیا اور اب ہم اپنے خاندان کے بہت سے ہمجولوں میں اچھی پوزیشن پر ہیں جس پر ہم خدا کا ہر وقت شکر ادا کرتے رہتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: It means the dread of physical labor made me an engineer and now I have a better job than most of my peers in the family, for which I constantly thank God.
Input.seg10: یہ بات ہمیں اس وقت یاد آئی جب ہم اپنے دو جوان بیٹوں کیساتھ پرانے گھر کے قالین اٹھانے کی کوشش کر رہے تھے۔
Input.machine_translation10: I was reminded of this when I was trying to lift a carpet with our two young sons at our old home.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: This is not the will of MQM nor of other parties.
Answer.translation2: In our family, most of the people are of the laborer type.
Answer.translation3: And in our childhood, when we used to see our uncles toil, we used to wish in our hearts that Allah save us from labor that is hard on the body.
Answer.translation4: To save ourselves from this, we wrote a letter to the editor of the Amroz daily, asking him what we can do after metric to save ourselves from having to toil.
Answer.translation5: The editor wrote in reply to become a doctor or engineer and take such and such subjects.
Answer.translation10: I remembered this when I was trying to lift the carpet of my old house along with my two young sons.
Answer.translation6: My focus was always on engineering, and after metric, instead of Biology, I took Technical Drawing.
Answer.translation7: But while entering the FSC, my elder brother forced me to do FSC in medicine and become a doctor.
Answer.translation8: I studied Biology for a month with great difficulty, and when I still could not understand anything, I took maths as a subject instead.
Answer.translation9: So the scare of having to work made me an engineer, and today I am in a very good condition compared to many of my same aged relatives, for which I am always thanking Allah.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ابھی کام کرتے آدھا گھنٹہ بھی نہیں ہوا تھا کہ چھوٹا بیٹا بولا “ڈیڈ لگتا ہےمیں اس کام کیلیے پیدا نہیں ہوا”۔
Input.machine_translation1: Not even half an hour had passed when my younger son said, "Dad, looks like I wasn't made to do this kind of work."
Input.seg2: ہم نے کہا اگر یہ سچ ہے تو پھر ہماری طرح خوب پڑھو اور جسمانی مشقت سے جان چھڑا لو۔
Input.machine_translation2: I said, "If this is true, then study hard like me and save yourself from having to do hard labor."
Input.seg3: بیٹا کہنے لگا پڑھ تو میں رہا ہوں اور پڑھ بھی جاؤں گا مگر یہ کام میرے سے نہیں ہوتا۔
Input.machine_translation3: My son said, "I am studying and I'll keep doing it, but I can't do this work."
Input.seg4: جیسے تیسے ہم تینوں نے تین گھنٹے میں وہ کام ختم کیا اور گھر لوٹ آئے۔
Input.machine_translation4: We got the job done as best we could in three hours and returned home.
Input.seg5: کہنے کا مطلب یہ ہے کہ آدمی اگر منزل کا تعین کر لے چاہے اس کے پیچھے جو بھی وجہ کارفرما ہو تو کوئی اسے منزل پانے سے نہیں روک سکتا۔
Input.machine_translation5: The point is that if a man sets his sights on something, whatever his reason is behind that, nothing can stop him from getting what he wants.
Input.seg6: ہاں اگر آپ کو پتہ ہی نہیں ہے کہ کرنا کیا ہے تو پھر آپ کا اللہ ہی حافظ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: But if you don't even know what you want to do, only Allah can save you.
Input.seg7: کہتے ہیں کہ مرے ہوئے کو برا مت کہو مگر کیا کریں ہمیں بینظیر کی پہلی برسی پر بھِی ان میں برائیاں ہی نظر آتی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: They say not to say bad things about the dead, but what should we do - we see nothing but Benazir's misdeeds even a year after she died.
Input.seg8: بینظیر نے اپنے مفاد کی خاطر آزادی کی جنگ لڑنے والے سکھوں کی لسٹ بھارت کو مہیا کر کے ایک طرف سکھوں کی تحریک آزادی کو کچل دیا اور دوسری طرف بھارت کو پنجاب کی تحریک دبانے کے بعد کشمیر میں پوری توجہ مرکوز کرنے کا موقع فراہم کیا۔
Input.machine_translation8: For the sake of her own interests, Benazir provided India a list of names of the Sikhs who were fighting for their independence, whereby on the one hand she crushed their independence movement, and on the other she gave India the opportunity to suppress the Punjab movement and focus all its attention on Kashmir.
Input.seg9: بینطیر اور نواز شریف کی اقتدار کی رشہ کشی تاریخ کا حصہ ہے جس نے ملک کو کئِ سال پیچھے کی طرف دھکیل دیا۔
Input.machine_translation9: It was Benazir and Nawaz Sharif's tug-of-war for power that set the country many years behind.
Input.seg10: بینظیر نے جلاوطنی کے دوران کشمیر اور ایٹمی پروگرام پر منفی بیانات کا سلسلہ جاری رکھا۔
Input.machine_translation10: Benazir, during her exile, continued to make negative statements about Kashmir and the atomic program.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Translation of the first sentence goes here.
Answer.translation2: Translation of the second sentence goes here.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ابھی کام کرتے آدھا گھنٹہ بھی نہیں ہوا تھا کہ چھوٹا بیٹا بولا “ڈیڈ لگتا ہےمیں اس کام کیلیے پیدا نہیں ہوا”۔
Input.machine_translation1: Not even half an hour had passed when my younger son said, "Dad, looks like I wasn't made to do this kind of work."
Input.seg2: ہم نے کہا اگر یہ سچ ہے تو پھر ہماری طرح خوب پڑھو اور جسمانی مشقت سے جان چھڑا لو۔
Input.machine_translation2: I said, "If this is true, then study hard like me and save yourself from having to do hard labor."
Input.seg3: بیٹا کہنے لگا پڑھ تو میں رہا ہوں اور پڑھ بھی جاؤں گا مگر یہ کام میرے سے نہیں ہوتا۔
Input.machine_translation3: My son said, "I am studying and I'll keep doing it, but I can't do this work."
Input.seg4: جیسے تیسے ہم تینوں نے تین گھنٹے میں وہ کام ختم کیا اور گھر لوٹ آئے۔
Input.machine_translation4: We got the job done as best we could in three hours and returned home.
Input.seg5: کہنے کا مطلب یہ ہے کہ آدمی اگر منزل کا تعین کر لے چاہے اس کے پیچھے جو بھی وجہ کارفرما ہو تو کوئی اسے منزل پانے سے نہیں روک سکتا۔
Input.machine_translation5: The point is that if a man sets his sights on something, whatever his reason is behind that, nothing can stop him from getting what he wants.
Input.seg6: ہاں اگر آپ کو پتہ ہی نہیں ہے کہ کرنا کیا ہے تو پھر آپ کا اللہ ہی حافظ ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: But if you don't even know what you want to do, only Allah can save you.
Input.seg7: کہتے ہیں کہ مرے ہوئے کو برا مت کہو مگر کیا کریں ہمیں بینظیر کی پہلی برسی پر بھِی ان میں برائیاں ہی نظر آتی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: They say not to say bad things about the dead, but what should we do - we see nothing but Benazir's misdeeds even a year after she died.
Input.seg8: بینظیر نے اپنے مفاد کی خاطر آزادی کی جنگ لڑنے والے سکھوں کی لسٹ بھارت کو مہیا کر کے ایک طرف سکھوں کی تحریک آزادی کو کچل دیا اور دوسری طرف بھارت کو پنجاب کی تحریک دبانے کے بعد کشمیر میں پوری توجہ مرکوز کرنے کا موقع فراہم کیا۔
Input.machine_translation8: For the sake of her own interests, Benazir provided India a list of names of the Sikhs who were fighting for their independence, whereby on the one hand she crushed their independence movement, and on the other she gave India the opportunity to suppress the Punjab movement and focus all its attention on Kashmir.
Input.seg9: بینطیر اور نواز شریف کی اقتدار کی رشہ کشی تاریخ کا حصہ ہے جس نے ملک کو کئِ سال پیچھے کی طرف دھکیل دیا۔
Input.machine_translation9: It was Benazir and Nawaz Sharif's tug-of-war for power that set the country many years behind.
Input.seg10: بینظیر نے جلاوطنی کے دوران کشمیر اور ایٹمی پروگرام پر منفی بیانات کا سلسلہ جاری رکھا۔
Input.machine_translation10: Benazir, during her exile, continued to make negative statements about Kashmir and the atomic program.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: It was not half an hour since we started working, that the younger son said "Dad, it looks as if I was not made for this job"
Answer.translation2: We said, if that is true, then study a lot like us, and free yourself from bodily pain.
Answer.translation3: The son said that I am studying and will continue studying, but I cannot do this work.
Answer.translation4: Anyway, the three of us finished that work in three hours and returned.
Answer.translation5: My purpose of saying this is that if a person has set a goal, whatever be the reason behind it, no one can stop him from achieving his goal.
Answer.translation10: Benazir continued to speak ill about Kashmir and the atomic program throughout exile.
Answer.translation6: But if you do not even know what you have to do, then Allah alone is your protector.
Answer.translation7: They say that you should not speak bad about the dead, but what can I do, even after one year of Benazir's death, I can only see faults in her.
Answer.translation8: For personal interests, Benazir handed over the list of Sikhs who were fighting for independence to India, at the same time crushing the Sikhs independence movement and also allowing India to transfer its complete attention to Pakistan, having taken care of the Punjab movement.
Answer.translation9: The Russia wars in the regimes of Benazir and Nawaz Sherif have become a part of history, which pushed the country many years back.

Answer.translation1: It was only half an hour since he started working that the little boy said " Daddy, I am not born to do this"
Answer.translation2: I said that if this is true then study a lot like us and get rid of the physical labor.
Answer.translation3: The son said, "I am studying and I will get through it also but it is the work that I can not do"
Answer.translation4: Whatsoever we did that work in three hours  and came back home.
Answer.translation5: The point of saying is that if a person picks his destiny, whatever is the reason behind it, no one can stop him from achieving that destiny.
Answer.translation10: Benazir continued to give negative comments on Kashmir and the nuclear program after being exiled.
Answer.translation6: Here if you do not know what you have to do then God help you!
Answer.translation7: It is said that do not say bad about the dead. But what shall we do, we see only bad things in Benazir even on her first death anniversary.
Answer.translation8: Benazir, for her selfish purpose, crushed the independence movement of the Sikhs after giving the list of their names who were fighting for freedom on one hand and on the other gave India the chance to keep its full attention on Kashmir after them helping to suppress Punjab Movement.
Answer.translation9: Tug of war between Benazir and Nawaz Sharif rule is part of the history, which has pushed the country back many years.

Answer.translation1: Now it hasn't been half an hour while we were working that the small son said "Daddy it seems that I am not born for this job"
Answer.translation2: We said that if so study good like us and build up your body.
Answer.translation3: The son started saying I am studying already, will be studying more but this work is not done by me.

On one side the independent movement of the Sikhs was collapsed and on the other side gave chance for India to concentrate on Kashmir after pushing down the Punjab movement.
Answer.translation9: It is the part of the distraction from the leadership of Benazeer and Nawaz Sharif which have pushed the country to many years backwards.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: بینظیر نے نواز شریف کیساتھ لندن معاہدے کی خلاف ورزی کرتے ہوئے جنرل مشرف کیساتھ ڈیل کر لی۔
Input.machine_translation1: Violating the London agreement she had made with Nawaz Sharif, Benazir made a deal with General Musharraf.
Input.seg2: بینظیر نے اپنے دور اقتدار میں اپنے خاوند کو کھل کر پیسہ کمانے کا موقع دیا اور اسی وجہ سے وہ مسٹر ٹین پرسینٹ کہلائے
Input.machine_translation2: Benazir, during her time in office, freely gave her husband the opportunity to make money, and this is why he was called Mr. Ten Percent.
Input.seg3: بینظیر کے دور میں اس کا بھائی قتل ہوا اور جس کے قاتل ابھِی تک سزا سے بچے ہوئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: During Benazir's time, her brother was murdered and his murderers have still not been punished.
Input.seg4: بینظیر نے عورت ہونے کے باوجود عورتوں کے حقوق کی جنگ لڑنے سے گریز کیا۔
Input.machine_translation4: Despite being a woman herself, Benazir avoided fighting for women's rights.
Input.seg5: جس طرح بینظیر نے اپنے والد کی لاش پر سیاست کی اسی طرح اب ان کے رنڈوے خاوند ان کی لاش پر سیاست کر رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: In the same way Benazir thrived as a politician because of her father's death, her widowed husband is now thriving as a politician because of hers.
Input.seg6: بینظیر کو دو دفعہ حکومت ملی مگر وہ اپنے والد کے سیاسی قتل کے مجرموں کو سزا تو کیا ان کیخلاف مقدمہ بھی درج نہ کرا سکیں۔
Input.machine_translation6: Benazir got control of the government twice, but she couldn't even file a case against those responsible for her father's political murder, let alone get them punished.
Input.seg7: مشرقی پاکستان کو ہم سے الگ ہوئے سینتیس سال ہو گئے اور ہمارے عوام اور حکمرانوں کی بے حسی کی انتہا دیکھیں کہ کسی نے اس دن نہ سوگ منایا اور نہ اپنی غلطیوں پر ماتم کیا۔
Input.machine_translation7: It has been 37 years since East Pakistan separated from us, but look at the insensitivity of our people and our rulers - we neither mourned on this day nor lamented our mistakes.
Input.seg8: ہونا تو یہ چاہیے تھا کہ ہم سولہ دسمبر والے دن کو عبرت کے طور پر مناتے اور اس طرح کی تدابیر کرتے کہ ایسا حادثہ دوبارہ وقوع پذیر نہ ہو۔
Input.machine_translation8: What we should have done was to commemorate December 16 as a lesson and come up with the kinds of strategies that could prevent such a misfortune from recurring.
Input.seg9: اس دن ہم بنگلہ دیش کے لوگوں کو خیرسگالی کے پیغامات بھیجتے اور انہیں دوبارھ اپنےقریب لانے کی کوشش کرتے۔
Input.machine_translation9: We should have sent goodwill messages to the people of Bangladesh on this day and tried to bring them close to us again.
Input.seg10: حکمران حمودالرحمن کمیشن کی فائل کو کھولتے اور اس میں مشرقی پاکستان کی علیحدگی کی وجوہات پر غور کرتے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Rulers should have opened the Hamood-ur-Rehman Commission's file and deliberated on the reasons for East Pakistan's separation.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1021 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: Benazir Bhutto struck a deal with Musharraf, going against her London Treaty with Nawaz Sharif
Answer.translation2: Benazir allowed her husband to openly earn money, in her era, which is why he came to be known as Mr. Ten Percent.
Answer.translation3: In Benazir's era, her brother was killed, and his killer is still not been punished.
Answer.translation4: Despite being a woman, Benazir avoided fighting for women rights.
Answer.translation5: In a way similar to how Benazir did politics on her father's corpse, her widower husband is now doing politics on her corpse.
Answer.translation10: The ruler should have opened the Jamudur Rahman commission file and pondered over the causes of separation of West Pakistan, mentioned therein.
Answer.translation6: Benazir came to power twice, but let alone bring the people guilty for the political killing of her father to justice, she could not even file a case against them.
Answer.translation7: It is 37 years since East Pakistan was separated from us, and look at the height of insensitivity on the part of the public and the rulers, that no one ever mourned or expressed sorrow over their mistakes.
Answer.translation8: We should have been observing 16th December as a day of reflection, and made plans to prevent the re occurrence of such incidents.
Answer.translation9: We should have been sending greetings to the people of Bangladesh on this day and been trying to bring them closer to ourselves.

Input.seg5: جس طرح بینظیر نے اپنے والد کی لاش پر سیاست کی اسی طرح اب ان کے رنڈوے خاوند ان کی لاش پر سیاست کر رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: In the same way Benazir thrived as a politician because of her father's death, her widowed husband is now thriving as a politician because of hers.
Input.seg6: بینظیر کو دو دفعہ حکومت ملی مگر وہ اپنے والد کے سیاسی قتل کے مجرموں کو سزا تو کیا ان کیخلاف مقدمہ بھی درج نہ کرا سکیں۔
Input.machine_translation6: Benazir got control of the government twice, but she couldn't even file a case against those responsible for her father's political murder, let alone get them punished.
Input.seg7: مشرقی پاکستان کو ہم سے الگ ہوئے سینتیس سال ہو گئے اور ہمارے عوام اور حکمرانوں کی بے حسی کی انتہا دیکھیں کہ کسی نے اس دن نہ سوگ منایا اور نہ اپنی غلطیوں پر ماتم کیا۔
Input.machine_translation7: It has been 37 years since East Pakistan separated from us, but look at the insensitivity of our people and our rulers - we neither mourned on this day nor lamented our mistakes.
Input.seg8: ہونا تو یہ چاہیے تھا کہ ہم سولہ دسمبر والے دن کو عبرت کے طور پر مناتے اور اس طرح کی تدابیر کرتے کہ ایسا حادثہ دوبارہ وقوع پذیر نہ ہو۔
Input.machine_translation8: What we should have done was to commemorate December 16 as a lesson and come up with the kinds of strategies that could prevent such a misfortune from recurring.
Input.seg9: اس دن ہم بنگلہ دیش کے لوگوں کو خیرسگالی کے پیغامات بھیجتے اور انہیں دوبارھ اپنےقریب لانے کی کوشش کرتے۔
Input.machine_translation9: We should have sent goodwill messages to the people of Bangladesh on this day and tried to bring them close to us again.
Input.seg10: حکمران حمودالرحمن کمیشن کی فائل کو کھولتے اور اس میں مشرقی پاکستان کی علیحدگی کی وجوہات پر غور کرتے۔
Input.machine_translation10: Rulers should have opened the Hamood-ur-Rehman Commission's file and deliberated on the reasons for East Pakistan's separation.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Baenazir went against the pact made with Nawaz Shareef in London by making a deal with General Musharaf
Answer.translation2: During the time of Baenazir's leadership she gave an open hand policy to her family members to earn money, and due to this he got to be known as Mr 10 Percent.
Answer.translation3: In the time of Baenazir her brother got murdered, and his murderers are still at large.
Answer.translation4: Besides being a woman Baebnazir did not fight for the rights of women.
Answer.translation5: The way in which Baenazir did politics on her fathers dead body, in the same way her followers are doing politics on the dead bodies of her family.
Answer.translation10: Now we look at the reasons why eastern Pakistan was separated.
Answer.translation6: Baenazir got to be a leader twice and in that time punishing her fathers murders at one side she didn't even file charges against them.
Answer.translation7: It has been 37 years since the separation of eastern Pakistan, and sadly no leader condemns this day nor do they call it a black day.
Answer.translation8: It should have been so that we would celebrate this 16th September as a black day, and take steps so such a sad incident never takes place again.
Answer.translation9: On this day we should have send the Bangali's letters of consolation and tried to bring them closer to ourselves.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: بنگلہ دیش میں پھنسے ہوئے بہاریوں کو واپس لانے کی تدبیر کرتے اور ان کی حوصلہ افزائی کیلیے انہیں تحائف بھیجتے۔
Input.machine_translation1: They should have come up with a strategy for bringing back the Biharis stuck in Bangladesh, and sent them gifts to encourage them.
Input.seg2: لیکن ہم بے حس ہو چکے ہیں ہمارے پڑوس میں کوئی مر جائے ہمیں اس کی اب اطلاع نہیں ہوتی۔
Input.machine_translation2: But we have become insensitive. If someone dies in our neighborhood, we do not even find out about it.
Input.seg3: ہمیں اپنے بہن بھائیوں کی فکر نہیں رہی کیونکہ ہم خودغرض ہو چکے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation3: We don't care about our sisters and brothers anymore because we've become selfish.
Input.seg4: بڑے سے بڑا سانحہ گزر جائے ہم اگلے دن پھر اپنے معمولات زندگی میں کھو جاتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation4: Even if a great tragedy occurs, the next day we get tied up in our day-to-day affairs.
Input.seg5: کاش جس طرح مشرقی اور مغربی جرمنی دوبارہ ایک ہو گئے اسی طرح مشرقی اور مغربی پاکستان بھی دوبارہ ایک ہو سکتے۔
Input.machine_translation5: I wish East and West Pakistan could reunite the same way that East and West Germany did.
Input.seg6: ہم دوبارہ ایک ہو سکتے ہیں اگر دونوں ایک دوسرے کیلیے قربانی ديں اور خودغرضی کے خول سے باہر نکل آئیں۔
Input.machine_translation6: We can be one again if both make sacrifices for each other and break out of the shell of selfishness.
Input.seg7: لیکن یہ خواہش مستقبل قریب میں پوری ہوتی نظر نہیں آتی۔
Input.machine_translation7: But it doesn't look like this wish will be fulfilled anytime in the near future.
Input.seg8: آج جب خبروں میں بتایا گیا کہ امریکی ریاست الی نوائے کا گورنر کرپشن چارجز میں گرفتار کر لیا گیا
Input.machine_translation8: Today, when it was stated in the news that the governor of the American state of Illinois was arrested on charges of corruption
Input.seg9: اور اسے گورنری سے ہٹانے کیلیے صوبائی کانگریس جلد سے جلد اس کا محاسبہ کرنے کی تیاری کرنے لگ Edit ی ہے تو ہمارے ایک امریکی گورے ساتھی جن کی پاکستان کے حالات پر گہری نظر ہوتی ہے نے ہمیں شیخی بگھارتے ہوئے لکارا کہ دیکھو جمہوریت اسے کہتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: and that to take him out of office, the Provincial Congress has started to make preparations to call him to account as soon as possible, one of our white American friends who keeps a close watch on the situation in Pakistan challenged us as he boasted, "See, this is what democracy is."
Input.seg10: امریکہ میں بڑے سے بڑا آدمی بھی قانون سے ماورا نہیں ہے
Input.machine_translation10: Not even the most important person in America is above the law.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: to help the people who are sick and in trouble in Bangladesh and for their safe return planning and for motivation gifts are sent to them.
Answer.translation2: we have no feeling, our neighbors get died and we dont even know about it
Answer.translation3: we don't  care about brothers and sisters because we are selfish.
Answer.translation4: big crisis get over and we became normal and return to our routines.
Answer.translation5: As eastern Germany and western Germany merges together i wish if East and West Pakistan get together.
Answer.translation10: In USA Every man is equal under Law.
Answer.translation6: we can be one again, if we scarifies for each other and get over with our selfishness.
Answer.translation7: This wish (dream) cant seem to come true in near Future.
Answer.translation8: Today in new it was said that Governor of  illinois is arrested for corruption.
Answer.translation9: to remove him from the office of Governor, State Congress is preparing to start trial against him as soon as possible. one of our friend who has keen eye on the current affairs of Pakistan proudly said that this is democracy.

Answer.translation1: He would plan on bringing back the people of Bihar who were stuck in Bangladesh and he would send them gifts to keep their spirits up.
Answer.translation2: We have become so insensitive that if someone dies in our neighborhood, we are not even aware of it.

Answer.translation4: Even if a great accident occurs, we are busy in our daily routines of life from the next day.
Answer.translation5: Only if East and West Pakistan could be one together just like East and West Germany was united once again.
Answer.translation10: In America, even the higher level people can not transcendence the law.

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: یہ تصویر تو ایسے اتروائی گئی ہے جیسے کسی خاندان کی ہو۔
Input.machine_translation1: This photograph has been taken just like a family picture.
Input.seg2: اس سے قبل کبھی اس طرح کی فوٹو اخبارات میں نہیں چھپی یعنی ایک صدر کیساتھ تین تین امریکی اہلکار۔
Input.machine_translation2: Before this, such a photograph with one president and six American officials was never allowed to be published.
Input.seg3: لگتا ہے امریکہ کا کام پاکستان میں بڑھ گیا ہے اور اب ایک سے زیادہ کارندوں کو مل کر اسے نپٹانا پڑ رہا ہے یا پھر ان کا نئے غلام پر وہ بھروسہ نہیں رہا جو اس سے پہلے والے پر تھا۔
Input.machine_translation3: It seems as if America's work in Pakistan has increased so much that not just one official can take care of it, they have to team up - either that or they don't trust their new slave the way they trusted the one before him.
Input.seg4: یہ بھی ہو سکتا ہے صدر زرداری کی وعدہ خلافی کی مشہوری کو مدںظر رکھتے ہوئے یہ بندوبست کیا گیا ہو۔
Input.machine_translation4: It could also be that this arrangement was made while keeping in mind President Zardari's notoriety for going back on his promises.
Input.seg5: اگر کوئی سمجھدار حکمران ہوتا تو کم از کم اس تصویر میں اپنے دانت نہ دکھاتا اور اس کے چہرے پر غلامی کے طوق کی شرمندگی ضرور عیاں ہوتی۔
Input.machine_translation5: Had it been some sensible ruler, at least he would not have sported such a smile in the photograph; at least there would have been some shame on his face because of the collar of slavery he's wearing.
Input.seg6: اگر جمہوریت کا اصول اس تصویر پر لاگو کیا جائے تو صدر زرداری اقلیت میں ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation6: If the principle of democracy is applied to this photograph, President Zardari is in the minority.
Input.seg7: جمہوریت کے مطابق اکثریت ہی ملک کی حکمران ہوتی ہے اور وہ کون ہے یہ تصویر بول رہی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation7: In a democracy, only a majority rules the country, and this photograph shows who the majority is.
Input.seg8: جنت نظیر سوات کو پاکستان کا سویٹزرلینڈ بھی کہا جاتا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: In spite of army operations underway for over a year in the Frontier Province's insurgency-ridden area of Swat, the situation has been going from bad to worse.
Input.seg9: اب تک کی حکومتی حکمت عملی کے مطابق طاقت کے ساتھ ساتھ مزاکرات کئے جا رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: On the one hand, the government's writ in this area has been reduced to approving condemnatory resolutions in the National Assembly; on the other, Taliban's illegal FM radio channel's influence seems to be increasing in Swat.
Input.seg10: لیکن طاقت کا استمال طالباں کی طاقت بڑھانے اور عوام میں ان کے لئے ہمدردی پیدا کرنے کے علاوہ کچھ فائدا نہیں دے رہا۔
Input.machine_translation10: Thirdly, the common citizen thinks the only way to be safe is to listen to whoever has the power in the area.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Answer.translation1: Thus psychotherapy gained popularity.
Answer.translation2: Whether there is madness in method or method in madness, there is certainly a method in dealing with madness.
Answer.translation3: That said, mental health care has come a long way from merely addressing dementia to dealing with problems such as stress, depression, anxiety and relationship problems.

Answer.translation10: Research has revealed that there are conditions which can be cured without medication.

Input.machine_translation9: On the one hand, the government's writ in this area has been reduced to approving condemnatory resolutions in the National Assembly; on the other, Taliban's illegal FM radio channel's influence seems to be increasing in Swat.
Input.seg10: لیکن طاقت کا استمال طالباں کی طاقت بڑھانے اور عوام میں ان کے لئے ہمدردی پیدا کرنے کے علاوہ کچھ فائدا نہیں دے رہا۔
Input.machine_translation10: Thirdly, the common citizen thinks the only way to be safe is to listen to whoever has the power in the area.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: ضرورت اس امر کی ہے کہ طاقت کے استمال کی جگہ حکومت اس مثلے کی وجوہات ختم کرے۔
Input.machine_translation1: During the operations in Swat carried out by security forces, it is claimed that gunship helicopters and bombings of arsenals killed many extremists, but in spite of these killings, not only has the Taliban grown stronger - according to one estimate, their control has been established in 80 percent of Swat.
Input.seg2: وجوہات کے خاتمے سے فضل اللہ اور طالبان خود بہ خود ختم ہو جائیں گے۔
Input.machine_translation2: In conclusion, the government is not ready to accept its failure, and the Taliban is stronger.
Input.seg3: اے این پی حکومت کی جانب سے مجوزا شرعیت بل کا فی حد تک سوات کے مثائیل کے حل کا سبب بنے گا۔
Input.machine_translation3: The ones who got stuck in the middle were the poor citizens.
Input.seg4: مگر شریعت کے نفاظ کے ساتھ ساتھ حکومت کو معاشی مثائیل پر بھی توجہ دینا ہو گی
Input.machine_translation4: It is said that someone in Swat asked what kind of people Taliban members are - the answer came that they are very good people because they are protectors of religion and they fight against the "enemies of Allah and religion."
Input.seg5: جنرل مشرف کے شروع کےاقدامات سے يہ لگا تھا کہ شايد اس قوم کونا اھل سياست دانوں سے نجات ملے گی ليکن اقتدار کے حوس نے ان کے سارے ارادے بدل ديے
Input.machine_translation5: When asked what the army is like, the answer came that it's very good because it "protects our homeland" and fights against "the country's enemies."
Input.seg6: جو بھی اميديں تھيں وہ &quot;وار اف ٹيرر&quot;ميں شموليت سےوہ اپنےاپ کو حقيقت ميں لازوال سمجھنے لگے
Input.machine_translation6: Then when asked who the enemies of religion and our homeland are; the answer came "we the citizens."
Input.seg7: اور جن اقدامات کی توقع تھی وہ ختم ہوگيی۔
Input.machine_translation7: The heavenly Swat is also called the Switzerland of Pakistan.
Input.seg8: جيسےہی بش کےدور کا خاتمہ ہونےلگا تو ان کواپنے اقتدار کے خاتمے کی فکر ہونے لگی اور بوکلاہٹ ميں چوروں سے ڈيل کر دی۔
Input.machine_translation8: Until now, according to government strategy, negotiations are being held along with the use of power.
Input.seg9: جنرل مشرف پھر بھی فوج کو کنٹرول کر سکتے تھے ليکن موجودہ حکومت کو پتہ ہی نہيں کہ کيا ہورہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation9: But the use of force is having no benefit other than to increase the strength of the Taliban and create sympathy for them among the people.
Input.seg10: باجوڑ ہو يا سوات فوج ٹيرر کو کنٹرول نہيں کرتی اور بمباری &quot;دشمن&quot;يعنی عوام پر کرتی ہے جانی 'مالی نقصان کے ساتھ ساتھ 'دشمن'کو ذہنی مريض بنا دیے تو دشمن ہم ہی ہوے نہ
Input.machine_translation10: There is a need for the government to eliminate the reasons for this problem instead of using force.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.1.249.1025 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: It is required that the government finish the causes of this problem, rather than use force.
Answer.translation2: By finishing the causes, Fazlullah and the Taliban will be finished themselves.
Answer.translation3: The proposed Shariah bill of the ANP government will become a moderate solution to the problems in Swat.
Answer.translation4: But alongside the establishment of the Shariah, the government will also have to take care of economic problems.
Answer.translation5: From General Musharraf's initial few steps, it looked as if the nation would be freed of useless politicians, but the love for power changed all his plans.
Answer.translation10: Whether in Bajod or Swat, the army cannot control terror, and instead they bomb the 'enemy', i.e. the public. Apart from loss of life and money, if they are making the 'enemy' psychologically ill, then we are the enemies, aren't we?
Answer.translation6: Whatever expectations were, after joining the 'war of terror', he began to consider himself irremovable.
Answer.translation7: And whatever steps were expected were no more.
Answer.translation8: Just as Bush's rule began to close, he started to worry about the end of his own rule, and he struck a deal with thieves in the dark.
Answer.translation9: Even then, General Musharraf could have commanded the army, but the present government does not even know what is happening.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: صوبہ سرحد کے شورش زدہ علاقے سوات میں ایک سال سے زائد عرصے سے فوجی کارروائی جاری ہونے کے باوجود حالات بد سے بدتر ہوتے جا رہے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation1: By eliminating the reasons, Fazlullah and the Taliban will fall apart on their own.
Input.seg2: ایک طرف حکومت کی اس علاقے میں رٹ صرف قومی اسمبلی میں مذمتی قرارداد منظور کرنے کی حد تک رہ گئی ہے، اور دوسری طرف طالبان کے غیر قانونی ریڈیو ایف ایم چینل کا اثر و رسوخ سوات میں کہیں زیادہ ہوتا جا رہا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation2: The Sharia Bill proposed by the ANP government will go a long way to help solve the problems of Swat.
Input.seg3: تیسری طرف عام شہری اسی میں عافیت سمجھتا ہے کہ اس علاقے میں جس کی عملاً عملداری ہے اسی کی سنی جائے۔
Input.machine_translation3: But along with enforcing Sharia, the government will also need to focus on the economic problems.
Input.seg4: سوات میں سکیورٹی فورسز کی کارروائی کے دوران تقریباً گن شپ ہیلی کاپٹروں اور توپ خانوں کی بمباری سے کئی شدت پسندوں کی ہلاکت کے دعوے کیے جانتے ہیں، لیکن ان ہلاکتوں کے باوجود طالبان نہ صرف زیادہ مستحکم ہوئے ہیں بلکہ ان کی عملداری ایک اندازے کے مطابق اسی فیصد سوات پر قائم ہوگئی۔
Input.machine_translation4: From the initial steps taken by General Musharraf, it looked like the nation might be rid of incompetent politicians but the lust for power changed all his plans.
Input.seg5: نتیجہ یہ کہ ایک طرف حکومت اپنی ناکامی ماننے کے لیے تیار نہیں اور دوسری طرف طالبان مستحکم۔
Input.machine_translation5: Whatever the hopes were in becoming a part of the &quot;war of terror&quot; he started thinking of himself as truly immortal
Input.seg6: بیچ میں پسا کون، بے چارے شہری۔
Input.machine_translation6: and the expected steps he would take were disappointed.
Input.seg7: سوات میں اب کہا جاتا ہے کہ کسی نے پوچھا کہ طالبان کیسے لوگ ہیں تو جواب ملا بہت اچھے کیونکہ وہ دین کے محافظ ہیں اور 'اللہ اور دین کے دشمنوں' کے خلاف لڑتے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: Just like when Bush's term in office was coming to an end, he started worrying about the end of his power and in the confusion made a deal with thieves.
Input.seg8: پھر پوچھا گیا کہ فوج کیسی ہے تو جواب ملا کہ بہت اچھی کیونکہ وہ 'وطن کی حفاظت کرتے ہیں اور ملک کے دشمنوں کے خلاف' لڑتی ہے۔
Input.machine_translation8: General Musharraf could still control the army but the current government does not even know what is happening.
Input.seg9: تو پھر پوچھا گیا کہ دین اور وطن کے دشمن کون ہیں تو جواب ملا ہم شہری۔
Input.machine_translation9: Be it Bajaur or Swat, the army does not control terror and bombs the people, causing physical loss and loss of property, making the &quot;enemy&quot; a mental patient, which means we are the enemy.
Input.seg10: میں حیران ہوں کہ پاکستانی فوج بھارتی فوج کے ساتھ کیسے لڑے گی جو وہ طالبان کے ایک چھوٹے سے گروپ کو کنٹرول نہیں کر سکی۔
Input.machine_translation10: I don't know how the Pakistani army will fight against the Indian army when it could not control a small Taliban group.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; GTB6.4; .NET CLR 2.0.50727)
Answer.translation1: The conditions in the  terrorism struck area Swat in the Frontier Province are continuously deteriorating in spite of continuous Army action in the area
Answer.translation2: On the one side the governments writ in the area is restricted to the extent of just getting the condemnation resolution passed from the National Assembly and on the other side the effect of Taliban's unlawful radio is increasing everday in Swat.
Answer.translation3: On the third side the common folk consider it safe to listen to those who are in control of the area.
Answer.translation4: The security forces claim killing many extremists during Gunship Helicopter attacks and Artillery Bombardment but in spite of these killings the Taliban's has not only gained strength but according to estimate they have established their control over eighty percent of Swat.
Answer.translation5: The result is that on the one side the government is not ready to accept its defeat and on the other hand the Taliban has established their hold.
Answer.translation10: I am astonished, how the Pakistan Army will fight with the Indian Army, while it is unable to control a small group of Taliban's.
Answer.translation6: In between who got grinded, the poor citizens.
Answer.translation7: It is said that in Swat somebody asked, which type of people are the Taliban's are? The answer was  "very good people because they are the custodians of the religion and they are fighting a war against the enemies of the country".
Answer.translation8: Then asked how is Army, the answer was that the Army is very good since they protect the country and they fight with the enemies of the country.
Answer.translation9: Then it was asked, who are the enemies of religion and country, the answer was "the citizens"

Input.machine_translation10: I don't know how the Pakistani army will fight against the Indian army when it could not control a small Taliban group.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 YFF35 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Despite the military operation in Swat, a war-torn area of NWFP, things are getting worse.
Answer.translation2: On one hand the writ of GOVT is limited to a resolution of condemnation passed by National assembly while on other hand the influence of Taliban's FM channel is increasing in swat.
Answer.translation3: The common citizen has no choice but to obey the rule of power.
Answer.translation4: In swat security forces have used lethal weapons and have claimed to kill many extremists. But despite these causalities, Taliban's Power is rising. They are controlling nearly 80% area of Swat.
Answer.translation5: Result: GOVT is not accepting its failure and Talibans are getting stronger
Answer.translation10: I am greatly astonished, how the Army of Pakistan will fight against Indian Army. It has failed to  control a small group of Talibans.
Answer.translation6: The poor citizen is the only looser.
Answer.translation7: "how are the Talibans" asked by someone in Swat. It is answered as "They are very good; they are fighting the war against the enemies of God"
Answer.translation8: Then asked about the army. Answer was "very good, it is fighting against the enemies of our country"
Answer.translation9: Who are the enemies of religion and country? "The poor citizens", it was answered.
