Input.seg2: جلی گیس پٹرول کا نہیں ملنا ایک عذاب ہوگیا ہے
Input.machine_translation2: The shortage of electricity, petrol, and gas has become a disaster.
Input.seg3: حکومت کا اداروں پہ کوئی کنٹرول نہیں ہے
Input.machine_translation3: The government has no control over its institutions.
Input.seg4: لاء اینڈ آرڈر کی صورتحال روز بہ روز بگڑ رہی ہے اللہ اس ملک پہ اپنا رحم فرمائے
Input.machine_translation4: The law and order situation is worsening every day. May Allah have mercy on this country.
Input.seg5: نئے سال کا آغازہوگیاہے۔
Input.machine_translation5: The new year has started.
Input.seg6: گذشتہ سال ہنگامہ خیزیوں اور سیاسی نشیب و فراز کا سال تھا ، دہشت گردی کے حوالے سے بھی اسے یاد رکھا جائے گا۔
Input.machine_translation6: Last year saw a lot of tumult and political ups and downs. It will also be remembered for terrorism.
Input.seg7: صدر مشرف کی اقتدار سے علیحدگی اور صدر بش کے آٹھ سالہ دور کا خاتمہ ، بش پر جوتوں کی بارش اور پاکستان میں جمہوری حکومت کا قیام، ناگہانی آفات ، بلوچستان میں زلزلہ، دنیا بھر میں مالیاتی بحران، کساد بازاری۔
Input.machine_translation7: President Musharraf's removal from power, the end of President Bush's eight-year term, a rain of shoes on Bush, the establishment of a democratic government in Pakistan, unexpected catastrophes, the earthquake in Balochistan, the worldwide financial crisis, the market recession.
Input.seg8: اب نئے سال کی آمد ہے آپ آنے والے سال کو کس طرح دیکھتے ہیں؟
Input.machine_translation8: Now that the new year is coming, how do you see it?
Input.seg9: آپ کے نزدیک سیاسی یا جغرافیائی صورتحال کیا رنگ لائے گی اوبامہ کی حکمت عملی کیا ہوگی؟
Input.machine_translation9: In your view, what results come from the political or geographical situation? What will Obama's strategy be?
Input.seg10: کیا دہشت گردی کے خاتمے میں کسی پیش رفت کی امید ہے؟
Input.machine_translation10: Is there hope for success in bringing an end to terrorism?
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.3) Gecko/2008092417 Firefox/3.0.3
Answer.translation1: I wonder those who shout slogans for an administration of the public create nuisance to the public.
Answer.translation2: It is torture not to get jelly, petroleum and gas.
Answer.translation3: Government departments have lost control.
Answer.translation4: Law and order has been degenerated. May Allah show his mercy  on this country of ours.
Answer.translation5: A new year has begun.
Answer.translation10: Is it possible to predict an end to the threatening terrorism?
Answer.translation6: Last year was a year of political turmoil and chaos. The year will be remembered for terrorism too.
Answer.translation7: President Musharaf's stepping down from power, the end of President Bush's eight years' reign, the slinging of chappals to Bush, the rethroning of democracy in Pakistan,the unexpected disasters, the earthquake in Baloochistan, the financial melt down all over the world,the depression in the market
Answer.translation8: The new year has set in. How do you feel now at the new year's arrival?
Answer.translation9: In your opinion, What colour will the political and geographical situations in the country take? What tricks will Obama adopt?

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: کیا پاکستان میں عدالتی بحران ختم ہوجائے گا؟
Input.machine_translation1: Will the judicial crisis in Pakistan end?
Input.seg2: پاک بھارت تعلقات کیا رخ اختیار کریں گے؟
Input.machine_translation2: What direction will Pak-India relations take?
Input.seg3: سرجیکل اسٹرائک یا بھرپور جنگ کا امکان ہے؟
Input.machine_translation3: Is there a chance of a surgical strike or an all-out war?
Input.seg4: نئے سال سے آپ کو کیا توقعات وابستہ ہیں؟
Input.machine_translation4: What do you expect from the new year?
Input.seg5: اپنی رائے سے آگاہ کریں۔
Input.machine_translation5: Tell us what you think.
Input.seg6: بے نظیر بھٹو شہید کی پہلی برسی منائی جا رہی ہے،انہیں 27دسمبر2007ء کوراولپنڈی کے لیاقت باغ میں ایک انتخابی جلسے کے بعد شہید کردیا گیاتھا۔
Input.machine_translation6: The first anniversary of Benazir Bhutto's martyrdom is being observed. She was assassinated on December 27, 2007, after an election rally in Liaquat Bagh of Rawalpindi.
Input.seg7: بے نظیر آج ہم میں نہیں ہیں،وہ ایک مدبر، سیاست دان اور عالمی شہرت کی حامل شخصیت تھیں ، ملکی سیاست میں ان کا منفرد مقام تھا۔
Input.machine_translation7: Benazir is not with us anymore. She was a statesman, a politician and a world-famous persona. She had a unique position in national politics.
Input.seg8: ایک سال کا عرصہ گزرنے کے باوجود ان کی شہادت کا معمہ آج تک حل نہ ہوسکا۔
Input.machine_translation8: Even though a year has passed, the mystery of her assassination has not been solved to this day.
Input.seg9: پاکستان میں جمہوریت اور حکومت کے قیام میں ان کی محنت رائیگاں نہیں گئیں۔
Input.machine_translation9: Her hard work toward the establishment of democracy and government in Pakistan were not in vain.
Input.seg10: آج پاکستان میں ایک جمہوری حکومت قائم ہے اور ان کے شوہر آصف زرداری صدر مملکت کے عہدے پر فائز ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation10: Today Pakistan has a democratic government, and her husband, Asif Ali Zardari, holds the rank of President.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: will the judicial crisis in Pakistan come to an end?
Answer.translation2: what direction will the Indo-Pak relation take?
Answer.translation3: is there a chance of surgical strikes or a full fledge war?
Answer.translation4: what are you expectation from the new year?
Answer.translation5: please provide your feedback.
Answer.translation10: Today Pakistan has a democratic government and her husband Asif Ali Zardari is holding the chair of the president.
Answer.translation6: First death anniversary of Benazir Bhutto Shaheed is being celebrated. she was martyred on 27th of December, 2007 after a  congregation at the Liaqat Bagh in Rawalpindi.
Answer.translation7: Benazir is no more amongst us, she was a statesman, politician and world famous personality and had a unique status in national politics.
Answer.translation8: One year has gone by but the mystery of her martyrdom has not yet been resolved.
Answer.translation9: her efforts in bringing democracy in Pakistan and formation of government have not gone in vain.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: پاکستان کی سیاست میں بے نظیر بھٹو شہید کے کردار آپ کس طرح دیکھتے ہیں؟
Input.machine_translation1: How do you see role of the assassinated Benazir Bhutto in Pakistani politics?
Input.seg2: ان کی شہادت کے پیچھے کس کا ہاتھ ہوسکتا ہے؟
Input.machine_translation2: Who could be behind her assassination?
Input.seg3: حال ہی میں انہیں انسانی حقوق کا عالمی ایوارڈ سے بھی نوازا گیا،ان کی سیاسی اور جمہوری خدمات کے بارے میںآ پ کیا کہنا چاہیں گے۔
Input.machine_translation3: Recently, she was also given the international human rights award. What do you have to say about her services to politics and democracy?
Input.seg4: صدر بش8 سال امریکا پر حکومت کرنے کے بعد وائٹ ہاوس سے رخصت ہو کر صدارتی کیمپ آفس کیمپ ڈیوڈ منتقل ہوگئے تاکہ وائٹ ہاؤس کو نئے صدر بارک اوبامہ کی مرضی کے مطابق تزئین و آرائش کرکے تیار کیا جاسکے،
Input.machine_translation4: President Bush, after ruling America for eight years, left the White House for the presidential office at Camp David so that the White House could be redecorated according to preferences of President-elect Barack Obama.
Input.seg5: بش کے آٹھ سالہ دور صدارت میں امریکا میں ورلڈ ٹریڈ سینٹر پر تاریخی حملہ اور تباہی، پنٹا گون پر حملہ اور پھر دہشت گردی کے خلاف عالمی جنگ کی آڑ میں افغانستان اور عراق میں فوجی کارروائی کرتے ہوئے مختلف ملکوں کی افواج کو اس جنگ میں گھسیٹنے اور اس جنگ میں امریکی وسائل کا بھرپور استعمال بش دور کی یادگار مثالیں بن گئیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: During Bush's eight years as president, the historical attack and destruction of the World Trade Center, the attack on the Pentagon, then under the pretense of a global war against terror, America's dragging of the armies of other countries into its military operations in Afghanistan and Iraq and the full use of its resources in this war, became the memorabilia of Bush's term.
Input.seg6: اس جنگ سے خود امریکا کو تاریخ کے بدترین معاشی اور مالیاتی بحران کا سامنا کرنا پڑا۔
Input.machine_translation6: Because of this war, America itself has had to face the worst economic and financial crisis in its history.
Input.seg7: آپ کے خیال میں اس جنگ سے دنیا نے کیا کھویا اور کیا پایا؟
Input.machine_translation7: In your opinion, what did the world lose and what did it gain from this war?
Input.seg8: کیا صدر بش کی پالیسیاں کامیاب رہیں؟
Input.machine_translation8: Were the policies of President Bush successful?
Input.seg9: صدر بش کے دور حکومت پر آپ کی کیا رائے ہے؟
Input.machine_translation9: What is your opinion about President Bush's term of office?
Input.seg10: بھارتی حکومت نے بھارتی کرکٹ ٹیم کو دورہ پاکستان سے روک دیا ہے۔
Input.machine_translation10: The Indian government has refused to allow the Indian cricket team to tour Pakistan.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: How do you see the role of Shaheed Benazir Bhutto in Pakistan politics?
Answer.translation2: whose hand is behind the killing of her?
Answer.translation3: recently she has been awarded by the Human right Organization for her work in politics and democracy, what do you have to say on it
Answer.translation4: President Bush after completing his 8 years tenure of the Government from white house he reached Presidential Camp Office Camp David so that white house can be decorated according to the wish of President Barack Obama
Answer.translation5: In 8 years tenure of President Bush ,America has witness historical attack on World trade Center and its destruction, Pentagon attack and in a wake of war against terrorist entered in to military invasion in Afghanistan and Iraq and dragging different countries into this war and using American resources on it became the memorable things.
Answer.translation10: Indian Government has stop Indian cricket team to visit Pakistan
Answer.translation6: due to this war America is facing the historically Economic and Monetary crisis
Answer.translation7: what do you think, this war resulted in benefit or loss for the world?
Answer.translation8: did the policy of President bush was successful ?
Answer.translation9: what is your opinion on President bush tenure?

Title: Urdu to English Translation

Input.seg1: غیر ملکی خبر رساں ایجنسی کے مطابق عراق کے الوداعی دورے پر آئے امریکی صدر بش نے وزیر اعظم نور المالکی کے ہمراہ بغداد میں واقع ان کے دفتر میں پریس کانفرنس کے دوران اس وقت صورتحال مضحکہ خیز ہوگئی جب ایک عراقی صحافی نے صدر بش کو مخاطب کرتے ہوئے کہا”کتے یہ الوداعی بوسہ ہے“۔
Input.machine_translation1: According to a foreign news agency, on President Bush's farewell visit to Iraq during a press conference with Prime Minister Nuri al-Maliki in his Baghdad office, the situation turned amusing when an Iraqi journalist, addressing President Bush, said, "This is a farewell kiss, dog."
Input.seg2: اس کے بعد اس صحافی نے اپنا ایک جوتا اتارتے ہوئے بش کی جانب پھینکا ، صدر بش نے مہارت سے جوتا لگنے سے پہلے ہی اپنا سر جھکا دیا اور اپنے آپ کو بچالیا۔
Input.machine_translation2: After this, the journalist took off one of his shoes and threw it at Bush. President Bush dexterously saved himself by ducking his head before the shoe hit him.
Input.seg3: دوسرا جوتا امریکی پرچم کو لگا۔
Input.machine_translation3: The second shoe hit the American flag.
Input.seg4: سیکیورٹی اہلکار اس صحافی کو گھسیٹتے ہوئے کو اس جگہ سے لے گئے۔
Input.machine_translation4: Security workers dragged the journalist off the scene.
Input.seg5: اس موقع پر صدر بش نے کہا کہ مجھے نہیں معلوم اس نے ایسا کیوں کیا، جوتا10نمبر کا تھا، مجھے کوئی پریشانی نہیں ہوئی۔
Input.machine_translation5: On the occasion, President Bush said, "I don't know why he did this. The shoe was a size ten; I wasn't upset."
Input.seg6: آپ کے خیال میں کیاصحافی کا یہ عمل عراقی عوام کی طرف سے صدر بش کے خلاف غصے کا اظہار نہیں تھا؟
Input.machine_translation6: Don't you think this act of the journalist was an expression of the anger that the Iraqi people have for President Bush?
Input.seg7: اس واقعہ پر آپ کیا کہیں گے؟
Input.machine_translation7: What would you say about this incident?
Input.seg8: ممبئی میں ہونے والی دہشت گردی کے واقعات کے بعد پاکستان اور بھارت کے تعلقات میں پیدا ہونے والی کشیدگی اس وقت سنگین صورتحال اختیار کرگئی جب بھارتی فضائیہ کے جنگی طیاروں نے لاہور اور کشمیر سیکٹرز میں پاکستان کی فضائی حدود کی خلاف ورزی کی۔
Input.machine_translation8: The tension that had been created in relations between Pakistan and India after the incidents of terrorism in Mumbai took a serious turn when warplanes of the Indian Air Force violated Pakistani air space in the Lahore and Kashmir sectors.
Input.seg9: پاک فضائیہ کی جوابی کارروائی کے باعث بھارتی طیارے واپس جانے پر مجبور ہوگئے۔
Input.machine_translation9: The Indian planes were forced to return because of the response by the Pakistan Air Force.
Input.seg10: ذرائع کے مطابق دونوں بھارتی طیارے اسلحہ اور گولہ بارود سے لیس تھے۔
Input.machine_translation10: According to sources, both of the Indian planes were equipped with arms and ammunition.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.89 Safari/532.5
Answer.translation1: according to a foreign news agency, during his final visit to Iraq when American president Bush along with Iraqi president Noori Almaliki were in a press conference in his office, the situation went ludicrous when an Iraqi journalist while addressing President Bush said "You dog this is a farewell kiss"
Answer.translation2: after that the journalist removed his shoe and threw it towards Bush. president Bush expertly ducked before the shoe could hit and saved himself.
Answer.translation3: second shoe hit the American Flag.
Answer.translation4: Security personnels dragged the journalist away from there.
Answer.translation5: at this point, president Bush said that he didn't know why he had done so , Shoe was of number 10, I had no problem.
Answer.translation10: sources say that both Indian planes were loaded with ammunition.
Answer.translation6: do you think this reaction of the journalist wasn't an expression of deprecation or President bush from the Iraqi people?
Answer.translation7: what would you say on this incident?
Answer.translation8: The tension between Pakistan and India's relations after the terrorism in Mumbai got further intense when the fighter planes from the Indian Air force violated the Pakistani airspace in Lahore and Kashmir sectors.
Answer.translation9: as a result of retaliation from Pak Air force, the Indian planes were forced to go back.

Title: Urdu to English Translation
Keywords: Urdu, English, translation, writing, Wikipedia, WikiTrans, machine translation, research
Input.seg1: لیکن جب تک لوہے کی کلہاڑی ملاکر دستہ نہیں لگتا کلہاڑی پر کو نہیں کاٹ سکتی
Input.machine_translation1: In the list of terrorists approved by the Security Council's Al-Qaeda and Taliban Sanctions Committee, the names of Pakistanis include Jamiat-ud-Daawa's leader Hafiz Muhammad Saeed, banned organization Lashkar-e-Tayaba's chief of operations Zaki Rehman Lakhvi, and head of the finance division Haji Muhammad Ashraf.
Input.seg2: ہمارے حکمرانوں کو انداز یہی کچھ ہے وہ خفیہ طریقے اپنا رہے ہیں اسی وجہ سے ملک پہ آفتیں آرہی ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation2: In addition, the name of Saudi resident Mahmood Ahmed Bazik is also included in the list of terrorists.
Input.seg3: اللہ ہمارے حکمرانوں کو ہدایت دے۔
Input.machine_translation3: These organizations include Jamiat-ud-Daawa, Pasban-e-Kashmir, Ar-Rashid Trust, and Al-Akhtar Trust International.
Input.seg4: اقوام متحدہ کی سلامتی کونسل کے پینل نے حافظ محمد سعید سمیت تین پاکستانی شہریوں اور جماعت الدعوة سمیت پانچ تنظیموں کے نام دہشت گردوں کی فہرست میں شامل کردیئے ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation4: Member countries will immediately freeze the assets of all these persons and organizations. They will not be allowed to travel, and they will be arrested.
Input.seg5: سلامتی کونسل کی القاعدہ اور طالبان سینکشنز کمیٹی نے جن پاکستانیوں کے نام دہشت گردوں کی فہرست میں شامل کرنے کی منظوری دی ہے ان میں جماعت الدعوة کے امیرحافظ محمد سعید ، کالعدم تنظیم لشکر طیبہ کے آپریشنز چیف ذکی رحمن لکھوی، شعبہ مالیات کے سربراہ حاجی محمد اشرف شامل ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation5: They will be faced with court cases.
Input.seg6: اس کے علاوہ ایک سعودی باشندے محموداحمد بازیک کا نام بھی دہشت گردوں کی فہرست میں شامل ہے۔
Input.machine_translation6: Are these restrictions under the influence of Indian propaganda?
Input.seg7: ان تنظیموں میں جماعت الدعوة ، پاسبان کشمیر،الرشید ٹرسٹ اورالاختر ٹرسٹ انٹرنیشنل شامل ہیں۔
Input.machine_translation7: Why is India accusing these organizations of the Mumbai attacks without any proof?
Input.seg8: رکن ممالک فوری طور پران شخصیات اور تنظیموں کے تمام اثاثے منجمد کردیں گے اور سفر پہ پابندی ہوگی اور انہیں گرفتار کرلیا جائے گا۔
Input.machine_translation8: Are there no terrorist organizations in India?
Input.seg9: انہیں مقدمات کا سامنا ہوگا۔
Input.machine_translation9: Are global organizations not aware of the oppression being done in India against the minorities?
Input.seg10: کیا یہ پابندیاں بھارتی پروپیگنڈے کے زیر اثر تو نہیں؟
Input.machine_translation10: Tell us what you think.
Answer.browserInfo: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2) Gecko/20100115 Firefox/3.6
Answer.translation1: Until the metal of the axe has a grip attached to it till then it cannot chop off the wings.
Answer.translation2: And our leaders have a idea of this therefore they are using it to make secret plans.
Answer.translation3: God help our leaders.
Answer.translation4: The security council of United Nations included the names of Hafiz Saeed and 3 other Pakistani's along with the Jamat Al Dawa and 5 other groups into the Terrorists list.
Answer.translation5: The Taliban and Al Qaeda sanctions committee of the United Nations gave the approval of including the names of the following individuals into the Terrorists list, they are Hafiz Muhammad Saeed of Jameetae Dawa, The operations Chief of Lashkarae Tayyaba Hafeez Zaki ur Rehman and leader of Shoiaba Al Maliyat Haji Muhammad Ashraf.
Answer.translation10: Are these sanctions under the influence of Indian propaganda?
Answer.translation6: other than these a Saudi individual Mehmood Ahmed Bazeek has also been included in the Terrorist list.
Answer.translation7: Among these groups Jametae Dawa, Pasbane Kashmir, Al Rasheed Trust and Al Akhtar Trust International are included.
Answer.translation8: The allied nations will instantly cease their accounts and funds, and have sanctions on travel and they will be arrested.
Answer.translation9: They will face a formal trial.
